Taken individually, the boys are all brilliant but, due to the strong competition, they fail to work as a team, despite former astronaut and captain Roy Manley teaching them, even harshly, how to behave. Gradually realizing that only by working together they can become stronger, the kids will turn into heroes when called upon to solve a dangerous crisis aboard the International Space Station.

title: Devil's Due
actors: Zach Gilford, Allison Miller, Robert Belushi, Kurt Krause, Steffie Grote, Sam Anderson, Sloane Coe, Joseph Fischer, Griff Furst, Catherine Kresge
description: After a mysterious night on their honeymoon, Zach (Zach Gilford) and Samantha (Allison Miller) find themselves dealing with a pregnancy that has come earlier than expected. Recording all phases of waiting as a memory for the future, Zach begins to notice a strange behavior in Samantha. While at first he believes that it is only a matter of nerves, as the months pass it becomes evident that the changes in a woman's body and mood have a much more sinister origin.
notes: It is enough to have seen the promotional video (Larry Cohen's Baby Killer style walking around New York), or to have just read the initial epigraph from John's Apocalypse, to understand the playing field. This is the limit of the film, which cannot be considered "the Rosemary's Baby of the new generations". Shooting quality is high: even the “films” now have a Hollywood definition.

title: Run All Night
actors: Liam Neeson, Ed Harris, Joel Kinnaman, Boyd Holbrook, Vincent D'Onofrio, Genesis Rodriguez, Bruce McGill, Common, Nick Nolte, Beau Knapp, Holt McCallany, Patricia Kalember, James Martinez
description: In Brooklyn, Jimmy Conlon (Liam Neeson), a killer once nicknamed "the Digger", is not in top form. Longtime friend of Shawn Maguire (Ed Harris), 55-year-old Jimmy is obsessed with his crimes and the hunt for a police inspector who for thirty years has never given up on investigating him. Recently addicted to whiskey, Jimmy is forced to take the defense of Mike (Joel Kinnanan), the son he has not seen for years and in danger of life. He thus finds himself at any moment having to choose between belonging to the criminal clan and that of his family, abandoned for too long, with only one night to resolve the situation.
notes: In his third collaboration with Neeson, the director increases the character's pulp load, along with the moral load. The soul weighs more than the body for Conlon, the judgment is passed, only one opportunity remains, already posthumous: to become an exterminating angel and prevent his son from scoring even a single blow. In this impossible undertaking there is the whole spectacle of the film, all its sentiment.

title: Ring of Fire
actors: Michael Vartan, Lauren Lee Smith, Terry O'Quinn, Ian Tracey, Agam Darshi, Brian Markinson, Brendan Fletcher, Adam Greydon Reid, Patrick Gilmore, Andy Nez, Connor Christopher Levins, Brendan Penny
description: An oil multinational is the main cause of a volcanic eruption in a small country. This is a first effect of what is called the "ring of fire", a disastrous event which, if it spread throughout the world, would cause the planet itself to become extinct. The first to realize the danger is Dr. Matthew Cooper, called to stop the catastrophe before it's too late.

title: Christmas Bounty
actors: Francia Raisa, Mike 'The Miz' Mizanin, Will Greenberg, Michael Hanus, April Telek, Chelan Simmons, Aleks Paunovic, Fraser Aitcheson, Scott Patey, James Yi
description: Tory Bell, a former bounty hunter who has now become an elementary school teacher, is determined to have a normal life and keep her past life a secret. Reluctantly, however, she is forced to return home for Christmas and save the family business by catching a runaway bounty. As her boyfriend decides to spend the party day with her, Tory will be forced to hide what her loved ones are doing and deal with an ex-boyfriend, a bounty hunter too, whom she believed she had left behind.

title: Eve of Destruction
actors: Steven Weber, Christina Cox, Treat Williams, Aleks Paunovic, Colin Lawrence, Jessica McLeod, Leah Gibson, Eli Goree, Michael P. Northey, Katharine Isabelle
description: When two scientists attempt to discover a form of unlimited energy, their experiment is sabotaged by two ecoterrorists. The result is an irreparable disaster that threatens to destroy planet Earth.

title: Swelter
actors: Jean-Claude Van Damme, Mindy Robinson, Alfred Molina, Lennie James, Freya Tingley, Catalina Sandino Moreno, Grant Bowler, Guy Wilson, Arie Verveen, Jonny Beltran
description: One of the most notorious robberies in Las Vegas history saw five men, nicknamed "the Rat Pack", steal over $ 100 million from the Luxor Casino. Four of the five men were soon captured while one managed to escape. Ten years later, the four arrested return to freedom, setting out on the trail of the former accomplice and the remaining 10 million dollars. Arriving in a desolate city in the desert, they discover that he is no longer the criminal he once was and that he has become a sheriff, ready to defend even with violence what he holds most dear in the world.

title: Freezer
actors: Dylan McDermott, Peter Facinelli, Yuliya Snigir, David McNally, Milan Malisic, Pascal Petardi, Andrey Ivchenko
description: Robert, an ordinary boy with an equally common existence, finds himself having to test his human stamina when he wakes up stuck inside an industrial freezer by a group of Russian criminals. The bandits threaten to kill him if he does not return the eight million dollars he stole from them. Without knowing what the Russians are talking about, Robert in a corner discovers battered Sam and, as the two fight for their survival, the truth about their situation slowly becomes clearer.

title: Bloodeaters
actors: Charles McCrann, Beverly Shapiro, Dennis Helfend, Kevin Hanlon, Judith Brown, Pat Kellis, Roger Miles, Phillip Garfinkel, Bob Larson, Hariet Miller
description: American federal agents set out on a mission to destroy a marijuana plantation run by a community of hippies. hemp crops are sprayed with herbicide from an airplane, with unexpected and horrifying effects. In fact, the herbicide ends up affecting even the farmers and these, from quiet "hairs", are transformed into creatures similar to zombies, thirsty for blood and human flesh. Ranger Tom Cole, who scours the area every 3 months on behalf of the government and who this time is traveling with his wife Polly and stepbrother, will find himself in the middle of events and will have to face the situation trying to save himself and his loved ones. .

title: Growth
actors: Mircea Monroe, Christopher Shand, Nora Kirkpatrick, Brian Krause, Richard Riehle, Lou Richards, Ian Patrick Williams, Jill Hoiles, Jessica Dercks, Robert Pike Daniel, Alexi Wasser
description: In 1989 at Cuttyhunk Island a scientific research on parasites made it possible to discover something very important about human evolution. The first tests showed human subjects whose physical and mental strength was greatly increased. However, the experiment went terribly wrong and the island mysteriously lost three quarters of its inhabitants. Twenty years later, Jamie Akerman returns with her boyfriend and half-brother to the island to sell the family property, uncovering horrific long-hidden secrets and a new threat to the island.

title: The Outsider
actors: Shannon Elizabeth, Jason Patric, James Caan, Melissa Ordway, Johnny Messner, Craig Fairbrass, William deVry, Brittney Alger, Greg Sproles, Kevin Wayne
description: Lex Walker, a British Army contractor, is told that his daughter is dead. As soon as he arrives in Los Angeles to recognize her body, Lex discovers a very different truth and sets out on the trail of the one who lured the girl via the internet and then kidnapped her, putting the whole city on fire in order to find and save her.

title: Tracers
actors: Taylor Lautner, Marie Avgeropoulos, Rafi Gavron, Adam Rayner, Luciano Acuna Jr., Josh Yadon, Sam Medina, José Báez, Woon Young Park, Johnny M. Wu
description: Bike messenger from New York, Cam (Taylor Lautner) is the best on two wheels but is indebted to a gang of mafia criminals. When he runs into the unknown and sexy Nikky (Marie Avgeropoulos), Cam is immediately seduced by her and the exciting world of parkour.
notes: The plot and psychological development of the characters proceed by stereotypes but it is the tribute that must be paid to a genre that is also reflected in the breakbeat and progressive soundtrack and in the wild rhythm of Peter Amundson's editing. Respecting the packaging, Benmayor focuses everything on the surprise effect of a well-written neuralgic twist and on the undeniable charisma of Lautner's body. Although some protagonists get lost in the street and gangster moments make you smile, Tracers is among the best products of the recent acrobatic action. We wish Lautner to become an icon.

title: Shark Week
actors: Yancy Butler, Patrick Bergin, Joshua Michael Allen, Bart Baggett, Erin Coker, Frankie Cullen, Valerie K. Garcia, Billy Ray, Meredith Thomas, Robert Matthew Wallace
description: A group of complete strangers find themselves stranded alone by a rich madman at his island resort. They will be forced to survive the attacks of one of the deadliest species of sharks.

title: Wicked Blood
actors: Alexa PenaVega, Abigail Breslin, Sean Bean, James Purefoy, Lew Temple, Jake Busey, Ritchie Montgomery, Dodie Brown, Ricky Wayne, Thomas Francis Murphy
description: Hannah Lee (Abigail Breslin) is a brilliant teenager trapped in the dark and underground world of the Southern States of violence, guns, drugs and motorcycle gangs. Neglected by her angry sister Amber (Alexa Vega), Hannah has her only refuge with Uncle Donny, a troubled drug addict. But both live in fear of "Uncle Frank" Stinson (Sean Bean), the man who runs the illegal family business with an iron fist and with the help of his psychopathic younger brother Bobby. When Amber falls in love with Wild Bill (James Purefoy), a member of a rival family, Hannah realizes that the ruthless Stinson brothers will leave them no way out and deftly plans a cunning game of revenge, destined to pit them against each other. .

title: Battledogs
actors: Craig Sheffer, Dennis Haysbert, Kate Vernon, Ariana Richards, Bill Duke, Wes Studi, Ernie Hudson, Benjamin James, Anthony Pacella, Darin Cooper
description: A frightening epidemic looms from New York to Manhattan: whoever is affected turns into a ravenous and bloodthirsty werewolf. Quarantine is declared and the army intervenes, but the danger seems to be greater than expected.

title: Project Almanac
actors: Jonny Weston, Sam Lerner, Allen Evangelista, Virginia Gardner, Sofia Black-D'Elia, Amy Landecker, Ginny Gardner, Gary Grubbs, Sir Maejor, Patrick Johnson, Gabriela Fraile, Alexandra Bartee
description: David discovers instructions for time travel in his father's notes and would like to use that discovery to win the high school science competition and to attract the attention of the most beautiful girl in school. However, some of David's friends would like to resort to time travel to earn money with betting and lotteries. The situation will soon get out of hand.

title: Dracula Untold
actors: Luke Evans, Dominic Cooper, Sarah Gadon, Charles Dance, Art Parkinson, Samantha Barks, Charlie Cox, Diarmaid Murtagh, William Houston, Ferdinand Kingsley, Zach McGowan, Paul Kaye, Thor Kristjansson, Arkie Reece, Noah Huntley, Ronan Vibert
description: Young Prince Vlad leads the charge to repel the Ottoman Empire's attempts to use Romania as a foothold to conquer the rest of Europe. In a moment of desperation dictated by the need to protect his own family, Vlad climbs a mountain where a dark power resides in the hope of finding something to keep the Turkish hordes at bay. That power will help him defeat the Turks, but this will be done by paying the price of Vlad's transformation into a creature of the night.
notes: The film explores the origins of the Dracula myth, intertwining vampire mythology with the true story of Prince Vlad the Impaler. The goal is to portray Dracula as an imperfect hero, who ends up involved in a tragic love story set in a period darkened by magic and war. Melodramatic plot too consumed by use, with abuse of special effects from fantasy spots and with the hope - of the producers - of launching a new franchise on Universal monsters copied from the one on the Marvel Avengers. Remaining "untold", ultimately, was a better idea.

title: Everly
actors: Salma Hayek, Jennifer Blanc, Togo Igawa, Caroline Chikezie, Gabriella Wright, Uros Certic, Masashi Fujimoto, Jelena Gavrilovic, Akie Kotabe, Hiroyuki Watanabe, Laura Cepeda, Damijan Oklopdzic, Aisha Ayamah
description: A woman (Salma Hayek), who has become an FBI informant, finds herself stuck in her apartment repelling the assassination attacks sent by her ex, a mafia boss.

title: Cell
actors: Samuel L. Jackson, John Cusack, Isabelle Fuhrman, Owen Teague, Stacy Keach, Wilbur Fitzgerald, Catherine Dyer, Joshua Mikel, Michael Beasley, Anthony Reynolds, Alex ter Avest, Rey Hernandez
description: A strange signal is propagating through mobile phone networks around the world. Thus begins a lethal epidemic of epic proportions that turns users into bloodthirsty creatures. Among the few survivors there is a group of people from New England, called to deal with the chaos generated.

title: The Equalizer
actors: Denzel Washington, Chloë Grace Moretz, Melissa Leo, Marton Csokas, Haley Bennett, Vladimir Kulich, Johnny Messner, David Harbour, Robert Wahlberg, David Meunier
description: Robert McCall (Denzel Washington), a veteran secret agent seeking redemption for his dark and evil deeds, has been away from the world of crime for years now, living a secluded existence and working in a DIY store. However, his help with the young prostitute Teri (Chloë Grace Moretz), met by chance one evening, will end up getting him into trouble with the Russian mafia.
notes: Based on the popular TV series A Criminal in New York, The Equalizer is very strong and incredibly distant for the duo of Training Day, weakened by its own temper. Net of the heart, there remains a feast for the eyes that puts at least one grandiose scene - the escalation of slow-motion violence in the home furnishings store.

title: Stonados
actors: Paul Johansson, Thea Gill, Sebastian Spence, William B. Davis, Jessica McLeod, Miranda Frigon, Patrick Baynham, Fraser Corbett, Nicolas Dahm, Katherine Evans
description: When a tornado appears in the waters south of Boston, former storm chaser Joe Randall is intrigued by the unusual event. However, when several cyclones begin to hit the whole coast, Joe realizes that he is facing something never seen before. With the whole city under siege, Joe, his sister Maddy and his old storm hunting companion Lee, soon realize that they are facing a strange and unprecedented meteorological phenomenon known as "stonado", capable of unleashing gigantic rains and destructive stones.

title: Delete
actors: Keir Gilchrist, Erin Karpluk, Ryan Robbins, Gil Bellows, Seth Green, Matt Frewer, Janet Kidder, John Stewart, Andrew Airlie, Mark Brandon
description: When a virus almost triggers a meltdown in a nuclear reactor, journalist Jesse and friend hacker Daniel are forced to confront a sad reality: an artificial intelligence has become autonomous and aims to destroy the world by causing one disaster at a time. To avoid the worst, the only solution remains to create a second artificial intelligence, equally dangerous.

title: Fast & Furious 7
actors: Vin Diesel, Paul Walker, Dwayne Johnson, Michelle Rodriguez, Kurt Russell, Jason Statham, Tyrese Gibson, Ludacris, Jordana Brewster, Djimon Hounsou, Nathalie Emmanuel, Lucas Black, Romeo Santos
description: A year after returning to the United States, Dom Toretto (Vin Diesel) and his gang of pilot friends find themselves forced to face the revenge plan of Deckard Shaw (Jason Statham), determined to do justice in his own way for the death of the brother happened years before. To help Toretto and his men will be an enigmatic government agent (Kurt Russell), who offers them in exchange for help to test a secret federal device on their cars.
notes: Reinventing 007's exotic travelogue, Dom and his team travel from Azerbaijan to Abu Dhabi in a succession of dizzyingly virtuosic set pieces, assembled with scientific, molecular precision. Everything is over the top. Pure Corman gangsta rap. With moments of open stage applause.

title: Selfless
actors: Ryan Reynolds, Natalie Martinez, Matthew Goode, Victor Garber, Derek Luke, Michelle Dockery, Ben Kingsley, Jaynee-Lynne Kinchen, Sandra Ellis Lafferty, Teri Wyble, Mariana Paola Vicente, John L. Armijo
description: A very rich old man, destined to die of cancer, undergoes an experimental and innovative medical procedure that transfers his mind and consciousness into the body of a healthy young man. However, not everything goes as smoothly as it should and the man begins to unravel the mystery linked to the origin of his body and the secret organization ready to kill to protect his intentions.
notes: Tarsem Singh abandons his pompous kitsch aesthetic in the golden house of the protagonist, and seeks the Spartan effectiveness of cinema B: the result is a sloppy entertainment that staggers badly on the road of twists, but which remains poignant in proposing to the society of the easy oblivion the need (literal and radical) to take charge of the dead, their stories, making a pop and trivial spectacle of the moral worry of so much high literature, from José Saramago to Winfried Sebald, up to Javier Marías.

title: The Signal
actors: Brenton Thwaites, Laurence Fishburne, Sarah Clarke, Lin Shaye, Olivia Cooke, Beau Knapp, Robert Longstreet, Jeffrey Grover
description: Three college students go missing under mysterious circumstances while tracking down a hacker in the Southwest.

title: 22 Jump Street
actors: Channing Tatum, Jonah Hill, Peter Stormare, Wyatt Russell, Amber Stevens, Jillian Bell, Ice Cube, Jimmy Tatro, Nick Offerman, Rob Riggle, Dave Franco, Dax Flame, Johnny Pemberton, Joe Chrest
description: After returning on an undercover mission to a high school, more big surprises await young officers Schmidt (Jonah Hill) and Jenko (Channing Tatum) when they go undercover at a local college. But when Jenko finds a kindred spirit on the football team and Schmidt infiltrates the bohemian art scene, their partnership begins to be questioned. They will find themselves not only having to solve the new case but also having to figure out which direction to take to their relationship.
notes: Lord & Miller raise their craft to power, making the hyper-aware shooting of models / characters / dynamics a springboard for countless sequels, the ineptitude of the figures put on the field - bodies with a grandiose comic range - is reaffirmed until the emanation in tangible form of the guiding spirit (Seth Rogen). Sequel to 21 Jump Street (2012).

title: Alien Raiders
actors: Carlos Bernard, Mathew St. Patrick, Rockmond Dunbar, Courtney Ford, Jeffrey Licon, Samantha Streets, Derek Basco, Bonita Friedericy, Bryan Krasner, Keith Hudson
description: Supermarket customers are taken hostage by alleged robbers. But when night falls, alien presences trigger panic and a struggle for survival begins.
notes: Based on a Carpenterian imprint and with references to the more complex The Mist, Rock builds some good repulsive moments.

title: Earth to Echo
actors: Teo Halm, Astro, Reese Hartwig, Ella Wahlestedt, Jason Gray-Stanford, Cassius Willis, Drake Kemper, Tiffany Espensen, Mary Pat Gleason, Peter Mackenzie
description: After a new construction project is started in their neighborhood, friends Tuck, Munch and Alex inexplicably start getting weird coded messages on their cell phones. Convinced that something big is happening, they warn parents and authorities but all refuse to take them seriously. The three friends then decide to figure out for themselves what lies behind the code, discovering that a mysterious being from another world needs their help.

title: The Atomic Submarine
actors: Arthur Franz, Dick Foran, Brett Halsey, Tom Conway, Paul Dubov, Bob Steele, Victor Varconi, Joi Lansing, Selmer Jackson, Jack Mulhall
description: In the future and distant 1968, ships and planes cross the North Pole carrying goods and passengers. However, in recent times, more than eight ships and seven submarines have mysteriously disappeared. Commander Vandover is sent to investigate what is happening in those parts, who with his crew will encounter something that cannot be fought even with the most modern technological weapons.

title: Crawlspace
actors: Klaus Kinski, Talia Balsam, Barbara Whinnery, Carole Francis, Tane McClure, Sally Brown, Jack Heller, David Abbott, Kenneth Robert Shippy
description: Karl Gunther (Klaus Kinski) runs a women-only condominium. The demented son of a Nazi surgeon, Gunther has a house full of secret passages, hidden rooms and instruments of torture and murder, which he does not hesitate to use.

title: Hell's Half Acre
actors: Wendell Corey, Evelyn Keyes, Elsa Lanchester, Marie Windsor, Nancy Gates, Leonard Strong, Jesse White, Keye Luke, Philip Ahn, Robert Shield
description: A woman, after learning that her missing husband is in prison in Hawaii on a murder charge, decides to go to the scene to see what reality is up close. However, the man escapes before she sees him when he finds out that his current mistress has been murdered. So while his wife goes after him and he is looking for the killer of his mistress, the underworld hunts them both.

title: Miami Magma
actors: Brad Dourif, Rachel Hunter, Melissa Ordway, Anna Adair, Stacey Asaro, Cleavant Derricks, Joseph Diaz, Miles Doleac, J.D. Evermore, Griff Furst, Lauren Graham
description: The prodigious volcanologist Antoinette Vitrini and her sister Emily attempt to end illegal oil drilling before a super volcano erupts beneath the city of Miami.

title: Black Forest
actors: Tinsel Korey, Dhaffer L'Abidine, Andy Clemence, Oliver James, Lally Percy, Sapphire Elia, Howard Charles, Ben Cross, Tobias Hewitt, Jesse Steele
description: Germany. A group of tourists, escorted by a guide, travels to the mysterious Black Forest where the Brothers Grimm are said to have written their famous fairy tales. But they soon realize that those fairy tales have come to life and become frightening nightmares and that ferocious magical creatures are lurking.

title: Prison
actors: Viggo Mortensen, Chelsea Field, Lane Smith, Lincoln Kilpatrick, Tom Everett
description: In 1956, prisoner Charlie Forsythe (Viggo Mortensen), sentenced to death for a murder he had not committed, was executed in an electric chair. Thirty years later that same prison reopens its doors, but it will not be empty: Charlie Forsythe is back, still charged with that electricity, and is waiting for Eaton Sharpe (Lane Smith), the man who carried out that sentence. His revenge will be ferocious.

title: Tusk
actors: Genesis Rodriguez, Haley Joel Osment, Justin Long, Michael Parks, Ralph Garman, Harley Morenstein, Kevin M. Conte, Matthew Shively
description: Journalist and host Wallace Bryton (Justin Long) goes missing in the forests of Manitoba while interviewing Mr. Howe (Michael Parks), a mysterious adventurer with incredible stories and a curious fondness for walruses. Colleague and co-host Teddy Craft (Haley Joel Osment) then decides to track him down, teaming up for research with Allison (Genesis Rodriguez), Wallace's girlfriend.

title: Stretch
actors: Patrick Wilson, Ed Helms, James Badge Dale, Brooklyn Decker, Jessica Alba, Ray Liotta, David Hasselhoff, Randy Couture, Matthew Willig, Mindy Robinson
description: When he realizes he only has one night to get the money to pay off a huge debt, a limo driver (Patrick Wilson) panics. Ready to do anything to find the sum, he will take a rather crazy client around the city. As the night progresses, to satisfy the wishes of his client the driver will encounter very dangerous encounters.

title: Barely Lethal
actors: Hailee Steinfeld, Samuel L. Jackson, Jessica Alba, Sophie Turner, Jaime King, Dove Cameron, Rachael Harris, Thomas Mann, Alexandra Krosney, Autumn Dial
description: Megan Walsh (Hailee Steinfeld) is a teenager trained from childhood to become a spy and ruthless killer at Prescott School, a top secret government agency run by Maxwell Hardman (Samuel L. Jackson). During an espionage operation, aimed at capturing the arms dealer Victoria Knox (Jessica Alba), Megan loses contact with her team and driven by the desire for a normal adolescence, she simulates her own death to register, from there to little, as a student in an American high school. He will quickly learn that surviving high school can be more difficult than an international espionage operation.

title: The Prince
actors: Jason Patric, Bruce Willis, 50 Cent, John Cusack, Jessica Lowndes, Gia Mantegna, Johnathon Schaech, Tara Holt, Rain, Don Harvey, Tyler J. Olson
description: Paul Brennan (Jason Patric), a widowed mechanic and father of two, discovers that college daughter Beth (Gia Mantegna) hasn't cashed her latest check. Worried about this, he decides to join her and discovers that the girl has gone missing in Las Vegas, the last place in the world Paul would like to go. Arriving in the city of sin, Paul will be forced to confront his past and with the gangster Omar (Bruce Willis), the one who killed his daughter in 1993 and permanently scarred the face.

title: Atlantic Rim
actors: Graham Greene, Anthony 'Treach' Criss, David Chokachi, Jackie Moore, Nicole Alexandra Shipley, Larry Gamell Jr., Steven Marlow, Jinhi Evans, Sara Bond, Melissa Foster
description: When giant monsters emerge from the waters of the Atlantic Ocean attacking the entire east coast, the US government is forced to rely on highly intelligent robots to defend the country.

title: Crimson Peak
actors: Mia Wasikowska, Jessica Chastain, Tom Hiddleston, Charlie Hunnam, Burn Gorman, Jim Beaver, Javier Botet, Kimberly-Sue Murray, Emily Coutts
description: In the aftermath of a family tragedy, an aspiring writer is torn between love for her childhood friend and the temptation of a mysterious stranger. Trying to escape the ghosts of her past, however, she will remain anchored to a house that breathes, bleeds and struggles to forget.
notes: Crimson Peak is not only a tribute to the Gothic, but also and above all a political rewriting of a codified canon with strongly hallucinatory hues that lead us to think of Roger Corman's Poe cycle.

title: Ouija
actors: Ana Coto, Bianca A. Santos, Vivis Colombetti, Douglas Smith, Erin Moriarty, Matthew Settle, Olivia Cooke, Robyn Lively, Daren Kagasoff, Bill Watterson
description: After the sudden death of her friend Debbie, Laine and her friend Pete find an old Ouija board in the deceased's room, used for séances. Trying, through her, to get in touch with Debbie to understand the reasons for her death, Laine realizes that a spirit named DZ does not want to end the session, letting strange events begin to occur. With the help of her younger sister Sarah, friend Isabelle, boyfriend Trevor and Pete, Laine will try to find out who DZ really is and what she wants from them.
notes: The first two sequences bode well, however, once the investigation of the poor hanged woman's friends has begun, Ouija wraps herself up for almost half an hour, preparing the field for a final "shock" that cannot be more derivative. The iconic paraphernalia is stale, the references are confused, and unfortunately they do not help the ineffective performances of the anonymous protagonists.

title: Alien Tornado
actors: Jeff Fahey, Kari Wuhrer, Stacey Asaro, Willard E. Pugh, Marcus Lyle Brown, Claire Conti, David Jensen, Terry Kiser, Caleb Tourres
description: Alien forces invade Earth using electromagnetic tornadoes as a weapon of mass destruction. A brilliant student fights against time to prevent a disaster and stop the conquest of the planet.

title: Exists
actors: Chris Osborn, Dora Madison Burge, Roger Edwards, Denise Williamson, Samuel Davis, Brian Steele
description: Brothers Brian and Matt Tover secretly travel to their uncle's abandoned house in East Texas for a weekend party with their friends when they find themselves chased by the legendary sasquatch. Cut off from the world and with no hope of help, the boys will try to get out of the woods alive and survive a creature that is smarter, stronger and more terrifying than they ever thought.

title: Late Phases
actors: Nick Damici, Ethan Embry, Erin Cummings, Tom Noonan, Lance Guest, Karen Lynn Gorney, Rutanya Alda, Caitlin O'Heaney, Tina Louise
description: Crescent Bay is not the ideal place to spend idyllic days, as the once peaceful location has become the subject of a series of deadly attacks by animals from the threatening nearby forest. Ambrose McKinley, a war veteran, is however forced to move there with his son Will, meeting the resistance of his fellow citizens with his unfriendly attitude. Ambrose's attitude will come in handy to man when it becomes clear that the deadly attacks are not of animal or human origin but conceal something sinister.

title: Starry Eyes
actors: Alex Essoe, Amanda Fuller, Noah Segan, Fabianne Therese, Shane Coffey, Natalie Castillo, Pat Healy, Nick Simmons, Maria Olsen, Marc Senter
description: Determined to become a Hollywood actress, Sarah Walker spends her days working, hanging out with friends and showing up to numerous castings. After a series of strange auditions, Sarah is cast as the star of a new film produced by a mysterious production company. The opportunity will soon have bizarre consequences that will transform it both mentally and physically into something beautiful and terrifying at the same time.

title: Android Cop
actors: Michael Jai White, Charles S. Dutton, Kadeem Hardison, Randy Wayne, Larissa Vereza, Kaiwi Lyman, Duane Avery, Morgan Benoit, Jay Brothers, Jay Gillespie
description: A policeman and his robotic partner enter the Zone, a forbidden section of the city inhabited by the population affected by a disease. Together, they discover the real reason behind the evil and attempt to stop the epidemic with the help of the android cop's powerful technology and weapons.

title: Bad Country
actors: Amy Smart, Willem Dafoe, Neal McDonough, Matt Dillon, Tom Berenger, Chris Marquette, Bill Duke, J.D. Evermore, Kevin Chapman, Frederick Weller
description: In Louisiana, investigations by Detective Bud Carter lead to the arrest of Jesse Weiland, a criminal association killer. Facing the hard life of prison and losing his family, Weiland decides to put his trust in Carter and become an informant. The case draws the attention of the FBI, which in turn attempts to rein in Carter. When not everything goes as it should, the boss Lutin Adams through dishonest politicians and lawyers identifies the person to be hit in Weiland, attacking their loved ones. Moved by a feeling of revenge, the detective loses control and lets himself go on a no holds barred manhunt.

title: Monsterwolf
actors: Leonor Varela, Robert Picardo, Marc Macaulay, Steve Reevis, Jason London, Jon Eyez, Griff Furst, Ricky Wayne, Nicole Barré, Amber Bartlett
description: Representatives of an oil company stumble upon an excellent ground to drill but in the operation a monstrous wolf-like creature is accidentally released, which wreaks havoc in the nearby village. The only person who can stop her is the last living Native American.

title: Hunger
actors: Lori Heuring, Linden Ashby, Joe Egender, Lea Kohl, Julian Rojas, Bjorn Johnson, Britton Partain, Laura Albyn, John Cooley, Ian Hopper
description: 5 strangers find themselves locked in an underground hole for a perverse experiment on survival skills.

title: Absentia
actors: Katie Parker, Courtney Bell, Dave Levine, Morgan Peter Brown, Justin Gordon, James Flanagan, Scott Graham, Doug Jones, Ian Gregory, Connie Ventress
description: Daniel, Trisha's husband, has been missing for seven years and she lives with her younger sister Callie and is trying to get on with her life again. But when Callie discovers a strange tunnel near her home and begins to link it to her brother-in-law's absence and other mysterious disappearances, it becomes quite clear that Daniel's alleged death is anything but natural.

title: Before I Wake
actors: Kate Bosworth, Thomas Jane, Jacob Tremblay, Annabeth Gish, Dash Mihok, Rigby Flanagan-Bell, Scottie Thompson, Antonio Evan Romero, Kyla Deaver, Courtney Bell, Lance E. Nichols, Justin Gordon, Jason Alan Smith
description: Jessie and Mark lose their only child and to try to overcome the pain they take with them the little Cody, who was orphaned following the death of his mother. Loving like all children, however, Cody does not like to sleep: every time he falls asleep, his dreams and nightmares take shape and manifest themselves physically, bringing with them false hopes and demonic presences.

title: The Den
actors: Melanie Papalia, David Schlachtenhaufen, Matt Riedy, Adam Shapiro, Brian Bell, Ron Bottitta, Kirk Bovill, Tristian Chase, John Grady, Lily Holleman
description: Elizabeth, a young woman who studies the habits of those who use video chat for her graduation thesis, witnesses a brutal online murder from the lock of her apartment. She will thus find herself at the center of a nightmare in which she and her loved ones seem destined for the same gruesome end that the first victim suffered.

title: Jessabelle
actors: Sarah Snook, Mark Webber, David Andrews, Joelle Carter, Ana de la Reguera, Larisa Oleynik, Chris Ellis, Fran Bennett, Amber Stevens, Brian Hallisay, Barbara Weetman
description: Returning to her childhood home in Louisiana to recover from a terrible car accident, Jessabelle comes face to face with a haunted spirit who has long been waiting for her return and has no intention of letting her escape.

title: August Underground
actors: Kyle Dealman, Casey Eganey, Dan Friedman, Alexa Iris, Victoria Jones, Aaron LaBonte, Ben LaBonte, Andrew Lauer, Peter Mountain, AnnMarie Reveruzzi
description: Two boys film their sadistic performances with a digital camera against men and women, indifferently. The two search the streets for their victims and take them to the dirty closet of the house of one of the two, where they rage on their bodies with unprecedented violence.
notes: Shot entirely in "mockumentary" style.

title: Alien Abduction
actors: Katherine Sigismund, Corey Eid, Riley Polanski, Jillian Clare, Jeff Bowser, Peter Holden, Walter Phelan, Jordan Turchin, Kelley Hinman, Ben Sharples
description: A family on vacation comes face to face with an alien threat.
notes: Based on real events related to the Brown Mountain Lights phenomenon in North Carolina.

title: Haunted
actors: Tobin Bell, Luke Kleintank, Alex McKenna, Anthony Rey Perez, Zack Ward, Lacey Anzelc, Ethan S. Smith, Lesley-Anne Down, Charles Agron, Tonya Carter
description: When he learns that his father is not only alive but may also reveal the origins of his son's dark gift, Nick Di Santo sets out on a journey that takes him to an abandoned house, which he believed existed only in his imagination.

title: Indigenous
actors: Zachary Soetenga, Lindsey Mckeon, Sofia Pernas, Pierson Fode, Jamie Anderson, Juanxo Villaverde, Laura Penuela, Jaime Newball, Yana Galuz
description: Five American friends travel to Panama to relax and finally spend some time together. Here, they befriend a local woman and, despite some disturbing rumors, she breaks her brother's instructions and takes the group on a trip to pristine jungle waterfalls. What begins as an innocent hike will take a terrifying turn as friends realize as night approaches that they are being followed by the legendary bloodthirsty chupacabra.

title: Preservation
actors: Pablo Schreiber, Aaron Staton, Wrenn Schmidt, Nick Saso, Cody Saintgnue, Michael Chacon
description: Three family members decide to go into the depths of the woods for a hunting trip that should allow them to distract themselves a little from domestic problems. But when their equipment disappears into thin air, the three begin to accuse each other before realizing that they are victims of some dark forces at work.

title: Zombeavers
actors: Cortney Palm, Rachel Melvin, Bill Burr, Jake Weary, Hutch Dano, Lexi Atkins, Rex Linn, Brent Briscoe, Robert R. Shafer, Peter Gilroy
description: A group of busty girls head to a house on a remote lake for a weekend of fun and sex when something starts to upset their serenity and claim victims. This will take an even more sinister turn when they discover that a group of furious zombie beavers are forcing them into an anomalous struggle for survival.

title: Boogeyman
actors: Eddie McClintock, Amy Bailey, Maya Angelova, Christian Hammerdorfer, Danny Horn, Cindy R. Johnson, Adriana Kalcheva, Emilia Klayn, Vladimir Koev, Boyan Levchev
description: Wandering around an old building known to be inhabited by a disturbed old man, a gang of young people accidentally unleashes a threat trapped there for decades. The black man, the legendary monster, returns free and determined to find a new guardian, spreading terror to the city.

title: Midnight Chronicles
actors: Charles Hubbell, Matt Amendt, Steve Sweere, Dawn Brodey, Sam L. Landman, Melissa Anne Murphy, Joseph Papke, Richard Ooms, Claudia Wilkens, Pat Hammond
description: In a dark world shrouded in darkness, after three centuries of intrigue and wars with which he has defeated the heroes and armies of the free races, the god Izrador reigns with an iron fist and forces men to live an oppressed existence while elves and dwarves have retreated to distant forests and mountains. To investigate the disappearance of a priest, the infamous Mag Kiln is ordered to go on behalf of the Church to the small town of Blackweir, where he becomes involved in an ancient mystery that will make him discover not only the history behind the place. but also a prophetic evil force that lives within him.

title: 40 Days and Nights
actors: Alex Carter, Monica Keena, Alex Arleo, Alex Ball, Victoria Barabas, Ty Barnett, David Bittick, Adam Burch, Hector Luis Bustamante, Christianna Carmine
description: When a colossal shift in the tectonic plate causes sea water levels to rise, a microbiologist begins collecting DNA from all the species she can as the army creates a special "ark" in a desperate attempt to save life on Earth.

title: Horizons West
actors: Robert Ryan, Julie Adams, Rock Hudson, Judith Braun, John McIntire, Raymond Burr, James Arness, Dennis Weaver, Frances Bavier, Tom Powers
description: Two brothers, Neil and Dan Hammond, return to Texas after the civil war ends, but life begins again for them on opposite sides. Neil resumes his old habits and the trade as a law-abiding good boy breeder, Dan begins to go down a bad road that soon leads him to clash with his brother, who has become Marshal of Austin in the meantime.

title: Age of Dinosaurs
actors: Treat Williams, Ronny Cox, Jillian Rose Reed, Joshua Michael Allen, Max Aria, Johannes Goetz, Julia Paul, Arthur Richardson, Jose Rosete, Laura Tuny
description: Using revolutionary technology, a biotech company creates a series of living dinosaurs. But when the creatures flee from an exhibition terrorizing the city of Los Angeles, a former firefighter must work to save his daughter from the chaos created.

title: Hack!
actors: Danica McKellar, Jay Kenneth Johnson, William Forsythe, Sean Kanan, Juliet Landau, Justin Chon, Travis Schuldt, Adrienne Frantz, Gabrielle Richens, Noah Guy
description: Seven university students go to a private island to study its wildlife. But a mysterious killer starts killing the students one by one.

title: American Ultra
actors: Kristen Stewart, Jesse Eisenberg, John Leguizamo, Topher Grace, Walton Goggins, Bill Pullman, Tony Hale, Lavell Crawford, Monique Ganderton, Stuart Greer
description: The life of Mike (Jesse Eisenberg), a seemingly unlucky and unmotivated guy who lives in a small town with girlfriend Phoebe (Kristen Stewart), is suddenly turned upside down. Unbeknownst to him, Mike is actually a highly trained and "hibernating" agent, the result of a CIA experiment, which is suddenly "reactivated". His secret past thus returns to haunt him, forcing him to return to the fray due to a dangerous government operation.

title: It Follows
actors: Maika Monroe, Keir Gilchrist, Jake Weary, Daniel Zovatto, Olivia Luccardi, Lili Sepe, Linda Boston, Heather Fairbanks, Ruby Harris, Bailey Spry
description: For 19-year-old Jay, fall should be just school, kids, and weekends at the lake. However, after a seemingly innocent sexual encounter, Jay finds herself plagued by strange visions and the inevitable feeling that someone or something is following her. Faced with this reality, Jay and her teenage friends must find a way to escape the horrors that seem to lie within walking distance of them.

title: Pan
actors: Levi Miller, Hugh Jackman, Garrett Hedlund, Rooney Mara, Amanda Seyfried, Cara Delevingne, Nonso Anozie, Kathy Burke, Adeel Akhtar, Tae-joo Na, Jack Charles, Kurt Egyiawan, Lewis MacDougall, Leni Zieglmeier
description: During a magical night, 12-year-old orphaned and rebellious Peter is transported away to the magical world of Neverland. Here, he will find amusement and danger before discovering the fate that will make him the legendary figure forever known as Peter Pan.
notes: New interpretation of the origins of the characters created by J.M. Barrie who seeks inspiration both in Disney fairy tales and in the Spielberghian imaginary in a film product that has not been awarded by the public, revealing, for the production company Warner, one of the most significant flops of 2015.

title: Zombie Night
actors: Anthony Michael Hall, Daryl Hannah, Alan Ruck, Rachel G. Fox, Shirley Jones, Jennifer Taylor, Daniel Ross Owens, Gibson Bobby Sjobeck, Zoe Canner, Tia Robinson
description: During the course of a night populated by ferocious zombies, two families must struggle to survive until morning arrives.

title: Fallen
actors: Addison Timlin, Jeremy Irvine, Harrison Gilbertson, Joely Richardson, Sianoa Smit-McPhee, Lola Kirke, Daisy Head, Malachi Kirby, Hermione Corfield, Chris Ashby
description: Seventeen-year-old Luce Price with strong willpower leads a seemingly normal life until the day she is accused of an unspoken crime. Sent to a rigid reformatory, Luce is courted by two boys to whom she feels inexplicably linked. Haunted by strange visions, she begins to reveal secrets related to her past, discovering that the two boys are nothing more than fallen angels in love with her for centuries. In clarifying her feelings, Luce will have to choose which side to take sides in an epic battle between Heaven and Hell.

title: Airline Disaster
actors: Meredith Baxter, Lindsey Mckeon, Scott Valentine, Geoff Meed, Jude Gerard Prest, Matt Lagan, Bart Baggett, Londale Theus, Chip Bent, Nicholas J. Leinbach
description: When she learns that terrorists have taken possession of the plane on which her brother is traveling, Harriet Franklin, president of the United States, is called upon to choose between her family and the safety of the people in the cities below.

title: Dracula's Daughter
actors: Otto Kruger, Gloria Holden, Marguerite Churchill, Edward Van Sloan, Gilbert Emery, Irving Pichel, Halliwell Hobbes, Billy Bevan, Nan Grey, Hedda Hopper, Claude Allister, Edgar Norton, E.E. Clive
description: The professor. Von Helsing (Edward Van Sloan) manages to eliminate Dracula, who moved to London from his homeland but, despite his fame as a great scientist, the story he tells is not believed. Accused of murder and arrested, he asks for the help of one of his pupils, the psychiatrist Jeffrey Garth (Otto Kruger), assisted by the beautiful and ever-present secretary Janet (Marguerite Churchill). Meanwhile, the vampire's body is stolen and burned by his daughter, Countess Marya Zeleska (Gloria Holden) who, after her father dies, hopes to escape the curse of the undead that chains her. She too asks for help from Dr. Garth, but new victims, preferably women, are found with the vampire's bite on their neck.
notes: Universal production well acted and full of atmosphere, sequel to the famous Dracula (1931) with Bela Lugosi. Van Helsing is referred to here as Von Helsing.

title: Time Lapse
actors: Danielle Panabaker, Matt O'Leary, George Finn, John Rhys-Davies, Amin Joseph, Jason Spisak, David Figlioli, Sharon Maughan, Judith Drake, Mark C. Hanson
description: In a quiet apartment building, three 20-year-old roommates discover that their neighbor scientist is dead. Inside his apartment, they also find a giant machine capable of seeing ahead twenty-four hours. By showing glimpses of their next day's life in advance, the machine will push young people to want to exploit its potential before disturbing images begin to unfold, pushing them into a darkness over which they no longer have any control.

title: Flash Gordon
actors: Buster Crabbe, Jean Rogers, Charles Middleton, Priscilla Lawson, Frank Shannon, Richard Alexander, Jack 'Tiny' Lipson, Theodore Lorch, Richard Tucker, George Cleveland
description: The mysterious planet Mongo approaches Earth, causing violent climatic changes. The handsome Flash Gordon (Buster Crabbe) and the beautiful Dale Arden (Jean Rogers), who jumped with parachutes from a damaged plane, accidentally land at the laboratory of Doctor Zarkov (Frank Shannon). The scientist thinks of diverting Mongo's trajectory with a rocket, on board which the three land on the planet. Here, however, they are taken prisoner by the men of the evil emperor Ming (Charles Middleton).
notes: First film serial based on the comic of the same name created by Alex Raymond. There are condensed versions (broadcast on television), which have different titles and minutes.

title: The Tingler
actors: Vincent Price, Judith Evelyn, Darryl Hickman, Patricia Cutts, Pamela Lincoln, Philip Coolidge
description: Dr. Chapin is a pathologist who regularly performs autopsies on executed inmates in the state prison and who has a strange theory about fear. In fact, he argues that fear is the effect of the presence of something inside us and that the screams of fear we emit are intended to annihilate that presence. When he meets Ollie and Martha Higgins, who run a second-rate cinema, he finally gets a chance to put his theory to the test. Martha is in fact deaf and dumb and therefore cannot scream: this, according to Chapin, should be able to make evident the presence of the being if she were faced with great fright. Thus administering LSD to Martha, she begins her experiments.

title: V/H/S: Viral
directors: Justin Benson, Gregg Bishop, Todd Lincoln, Aaron Moorhead, Marcel Sarmiento, Nacho Vigalondo
actors: Carrie Keagan, Justin Welborn, Jessica Luza, Randy McDowell, Emilia Zoryan, Emmy Argo, Michael Aaron Milligan
description: A police chase catches the attention of dozens of fame-obsessed kids. With their cameras and cell phones they crowd the streets of Los Angeles to take pictures that are destined to go viral. They ignore, however, that they will soon become the protagonists of a subsequent video, in which they will find themselves facing their own death.

title: Terminator: Genisys
actors: Arnold Schwarzenegger, Emilia Clarke, Jai Courtney, Jason Clarke, Byung-hun Lee, Matt Smith, J.K. Simmons, Aaron V. Williamson, Sandrine Holt, Michael Gladis
description: When John Connor, leader of the human resistance, sends Sergeant Kyle Reese back in time in 1984 to protect Sarah Connor and safeguard the future, it unleashes an unexpected event that creates a rift in the timeline. Thus, Sergeant Reese will find himself in a new and unknown past, in which he will have to face unlikely allies, including a new T-800 terminator, the Guardian, new dangerous enemies and an unexpected new mission: restore the future.
notes: Between action scenes that mock the laws of physics and recitations below guard level, Schwarzenegger just has to take cover in self-irony. But two smiles here and there do not make this empty mess digestible. Original reinterpretation of the Terminator saga.

title: Dark Relic
actors: James Frain, Clemency Burton-Hill, Tom Basden, Alyy Khan, Marija Karan, Samuel West, Christian Cooke, Atanas Srebrev, Don Andersen, Velizar Binev
description: Holy Land, 1099 AD. At the end of the first Crusade, the Christian knight Sir Gregory was left with less than a dozen men when, discovering a sacred relic, he embarks on a journey to Rome to visit the pope. However, arriving in the capital of the Christian empire will be an arduous undertaking, since strange and obscure events will begin to haunt the group with the intent of destroying what they try to protect at all costs.

title: Zorro the Avenger
actors: Guy Williams, Charles Korvin, Henry Calvin, Gene Sheldon, George J. Lewis, Jay Novello, Ralph Clanton, Henry Rowland, Michael Pate
description: Don Diego de la Vega secretly wears the clothes and mask of the executioner Zorro again. Armed with his trusty sword and ready to brand every place with his usual acronym, he prepares to counter the conspiratorial policy of Jose Sebastian Varga, a corrupt dictator, intent on selling the territory of California to a foreign power.

title: A Bucket of Blood
actors: Dick Miller, Barboura Morris, Antony Carbone, Julian Burton, Ed Nelson, John Brinkley, John Herman Shaner, Judy Bamber, Myrtle Vail, Bert Convy
description: Walter Paisley is an introverted waiter. Enraptured by the charm of the artistic personalities who frequent the place where he works, he decides to devote himself to sculpture. It does this in a rather unusual way: it first uses animals, then humans as models.

title: Ride Clear of Diablo
actors: Audie Murphy, Susan Cabot, Dan Duryea, Abbe Lane, Russell Johnson, Paul Birch, William Pullen, Jack Elam, Denver Pyle
description: After the killing of his father and brother, Clay O'Mara decides to leave town and return to the family farm to take revenge. Along the way, after being able to get elected deputy sheriff, he will find the help of the outlaw Whitey Kincade, with whom he will plan revenge against the one who exterminated his family.

title: Tomorrowland
actors: George Clooney, Britt Robertson, Hugh Laurie, Raffey Cassidy, Keegan-Michael Key, Kathryn Hahn, Tim McGraw, Thomas Robinson
description: Linked by a common destiny, a brilliant and optimistic teenage girl, driven by a lot of scientific curiosity, and a disillusioned former child prodigy inventor join forces to embark on a dangerous mission to uncover the secrets of an enigmatic place, located somewhere in the time and space and that exists in their collective memory as "Tomorrowland", the land of tomorrow.
notes: Lindelof messes with the theme of fate vs free will as always, but finds the best moments when he can play with the contrast between the bleak teen dystopias of today and the confident hope for tomorrow a few decades ago. The pair of authors does not collect all that it sows, but the main objective - cinema for children, light entertainment with an accompanying uplifting message - hardly ever loses sight of it.

title: Last Knights
actors: Clive Owen, Morgan Freeman, Cliff Curtis, Tsuyoshi Ihara, Aksel Hennie, Ayelet Zurer, Shohreh Aghdashloo, Lee Ingleby, Noah Silver, Michael Lombardi, Peyman Moaadi
description: Raiden, commander of the knights, is honored to be named heir to Bartok, his childless lord. His happiness is destroyed, however, when Mott, the emperor's evil emissary, forces him to behead his father in law and drives him out of the castle, depriving him of all title and means of subsistence. As the paranoid Mott attempts to erase all traces of Bartok's clan and legacy, Raiden will be forced to organize a daring plan of revenge.

title: Animal
actors: Jeremy Sumpter, Elizabeth Gillies, Joey Lauren Adams, Keke Palmer, Amaury Nolasco, Parker Young, Eve, Paul Iacono, Thorsten Kaye
description: When plans for a holiday weekend come to a dead end, a group of close friends find themselves stuck in unfamiliar territory and threatened by a bloodthirsty predator. Holed up in a secluded bay, the boys will have to contend with their survival and the tensions associated with long-buried old secrets.

title: Beneath the Dark
actors: Josh Stewart, Jamie-Lynn Sigler, Chris Browning, Angela Featherstone, Afemo Omilami, Trevor Morgan, Christopher Gessner, Robert Maxhimer, Jeannetta Arnette, Grainger Hines
description: Heading for a wedding in Los Angeles, Paul and Adrianne as they cross the Mojave Desert leave the highway to stop at a small motel. Strange and surreal, the place is the crossroads of disturbing travelers, who force the couple to discover what secret is hidden there.

title: The Walking Dead
actors: Andrew Lincoln, Steven Yeun, Chandler Riggs, Norman Reedus, Melissa McBride, Lauren Cohan, Emily Kinney, Danai Gurira, Scott Wilson, Sarah Wayne Callies, Michael Rooker, Laurie Holden, Jon Bernthal, Jeffrey DeMunn
description: Rick Grimes (Andrew Lincoln) is seriously injured at a roadblock in an attempt to stop a runaway thug. He will wake up in a completely abandoned and devastated hospital room. In the corridors and outside, traces of struggle and piled up corpses. He soon discovers that he has survived an epidemic where the dead return to walk and bite.

title: Point Break
actors: Edgar Ramirez, Luke Bracey, Ray Winstone, Teresa Palmer, Delroy Lindo, Matias Varela, Clemens Schick, Nikolai Kinski
description: Johnny Utah (Luke Bracey), a young FBI agent, is tasked with infiltrating a gang of extreme athletes led by Bodhi (Edgar Ramirez), who is suspected of committing an unprecedented series of sophisticated attacks against many businesses. In his dangerous undercover mission, Utah will have to fight not only for his own life, engaging in the most extreme sports but also to save the global financial markets, severely threatened by a man capable of concocting increasingly insane crimes.
notes: Remake of Point Break (1991).

title: Hitman: Agent 47
actors: Rupert Friend, Hannah Ware, Zachary Quinto, Ciarán Hinds, Thomas Kretschmann, Angelababy, Emilio Rivera, Dan Bakkedahl, Rolf Kanies, David Brückner, Joe Toedtling
description: A genetically modified assassin (Rupert Friend) tries to upset the plans of a multinational, who wants to exploit the secret of his strength to create an army of ruthless super killers.
notes: The character of Hitman, born for a video game, was already brought to the big screen in 2007 (Hitman. The assassin) but, compared to the previous version, Hitman: Agent 47 chooses to present the action in the 'real world', qualifying like a real reboot based on special effects and with simple references to a certain (noble) action cinema in the style of Terminator and Jason Bourne.

title: Apocalypse Pompeii
actors: Adrian Paul, Jhey Castles, Georgina Beedle, John Rhys-Davies, Dylan Vox, Dan Cade, Constantine Trendafilov, Assen Vukushev, Alexandra Petrova-Emisti, Yordam Yositov
description: When a former Special Department agent visits Pompeii with his family, his wife and daughter are trapped by a massive eruption of Vesuvius. As the two struggle to survive the deadly onslaught of heat and lava, the man reunites his former teammates in an attempt to carry out an operation as daring as it is courageous in the ruins of the town of Campania.

title: Airplane vs Volcano
actors: Dean Cain, Robin Givens, Tamara Goodwin, Matt Mercer, Morgan West, Lawrence Hilton-Jacobs, Graham Denman, Mike Jerome Putnam, Anthony Marks, David Vega
description: When a scheduled flight becomes trapped due to some erupting volcanoes, passengers and crew must find a way to survive in flight since no landing is possible. However, the incessant onslaught of lava and ash generates even more fear, spreading distrust among the people on board, who will have to learn to collaborate in order not to endanger their lives.

title: Dead Season
actors: Scott Peat, Marissa Merrill, James C. Burns, Corsica Wilson, Marc L. Fusco, Todd Pritchett, Grant Beijon, Kevin O. Matta, Anna Vawser, Greg Weisman
description: An epidemic of over a year has destroyed the earth and zombies have taken the place of humans, causing chaos and destruction. Elvis and Tweeter are two of the last people left alive and together they decide to leave the United States for a remote island in the Caribbean. Once at their destination, they find a new community of survivors, armed to the teeth to fight against the army of corpses.

title: Julia
actors: Ashley C. Williams, Tahyna Tozzi, Jack Noseworthy, Joel de la Fuente, Cary Woodworth, Darren Lipari, Ryan Cooper, Brad Koed, Sean Kleier, Bridget Megan Clark
description: Julia Shames, a mild-mannered girl in the growing plastic surgery business, meets the wrong person and ends up being drugged and raped. In a catatonic state after the trauma suffered, he learns of a new type of rehabilitation therapy exercised by the mysterious Dr. Sgundud. She then decides to undergo the treatment, ignoring that shortly thereafter she will transform from victim to powerful avenger.

title: Wrong Turn 6
actors: Sadie Katz, Anthony Ilott, Aqueela Zoll, Rollo Skinner, Roxanne Pallett, Bobby Campo, Rhys Coiro, Chris Jarvis, Brian Boland, Talitha Luke-Eardley
description: A sudden and mysterious inheritance takes Danny and his friends to Hobb Springs, a forgotten village deep in the hills of West Virginia. The place is under the watchful eye of Jackson and Sally, a socially awkward couple who take Danny to family never known before: the Hillicker clan. Soon, the young man discovers that the relatives for generations have their own way of life far from all normality and linked to ancient traditions of cannibalism. Tempted by the forbidden, he will have to choose between the lives of his friends and his offspring, with all the horror that this entails.

title: A Walk in the Woods
actors: Robert Redford, Nick Nolte, Nick Offerman, Emma Thompson, Kristen Schaal, Mary Steenburgen, Linds Edwards, Sandra Ellis Lafferty, Andrew Vogel, Derek Krantz
description: After returning with his family to the United States after years spent abroad, acclaimed travel writer Bill Bryson (Robert Redford) decides to his wife's chagrin to explore his country. With in mind to explore the 2,200 miles of the famous 'Appalachian Trail', to leave Bill must comply with his wife's request to find a travel companion, who he identifies in old friend Stephen Katz (Nick Nolte), an alcoholic womanizer and cocaine addict. The excursion into the desert, amidst exhilarating encounters, wild animals and deadly dangers, will test their very friendship.

title: Transformations
actors: Rex Smith, Lisa Langlois, Patrick Macnee, Christopher Neame, Michael Hennessy, Cec Verrell, Benito Stefanelli, Donald Hodson, Pamela Prati, Ann Margaret Hughes
description: Astronaut Wolfgang is traveling in space when a monster appears in his spaceship, taking the form of a beautiful woman and seducing him. The spaceship is then forced to land on a planet where there is a penal colony: there the astronaut meets the beautiful Miranda who falls in love with him. Later a group of prisoners are determined to use Wolfgang and his spaceship to escape, but they have not reckoned with the monster, which is always lurking.

title: Pixels
actors: Kevin James, Adam Sandler, Peter Dinklage, Michelle Monaghan, Ashley Benson, Josh Gad, Jane Krakowski, Brian Cox, James Preston Rogers, Matthew Lintz
description: When aliens attack Earth, President Will Cooper (Kevin James) recruits childhood best friend and former 1980s video game champion Sam Brenner (Adam Sandler) to form the best arcader team and save the world.
notes: The old wizard Chris Columbus steps aside to let the film's real author, Adam Sandler direct: producer with his Happy Madison, he makes Pixels his weekend as big babies in sci-fi sauce, bastardizing the adventure for families with his wacky comic times, putting every possible target of the film to the test.

title: Annabelle
actors: Annabelle Wallis, Ward Horton, Alfre Woodard, Tony Amendola, Eric Ladin, Brian Howe, Michelle Romano, Gabriel Bateman, Shiloh Nelson, Tree O'Toole
description: John Form gives his pregnant wife Mia a rare vintage doll, dressed in a wedding dress. During a terrible night, however, the couple sees their home violently attacked by members of a satanic sect. Blood and terror aren't the only thing the assault leaves them. The followers have in fact evoked a diabolical entity that nothing seems to be able to scratch: Annabelle.
notes: Wan and Leonetti trace the roots of postmodern horror, almost entirely based on the undermining of traditional institutions, to package a product whose vintage dimension marries a fully contemporary staging. Wan disseminates the text with references to The Evocation but on stage there are disconnected jumble of references and gender figures. Ghosts, rebel technology, killer dolls, atmospheric rebellions; Rosemary's Baby, The Shining, The Exorcist, The Strangers. Built as an obsessive vortex with an irrelevant ending, Annabelle never raises the bar of 10's horror.

title: The Remaining
actors: Johnny Pacar, Shaun Sipos, Bryan Dechart, Alexa PenaVega, Italia Ricci, Liz E. Morgan, John Pyper-Ferguson, Kim Pacheco, Hayley Lovitt, Erin Murphy
description: Friends are preparing for Skylar and Dan's wedding when, as the apocalypse breaks out on Earth, they witness a series of events that endanger their own lives. In search of shelter, they will have to confront an army of nocturnal creatures they have never heard of before, understand what is happening in them and find a way to survive the new world order.

title: Gods of Egypt
actors: Gerard Butler, Nikolaj Coster-Waldau, Brenton Thwaites, Geoffrey Rush, Elodie Yung, Chadwick Boseman, Courtney Eaton, Rufus Sewell, Abbey Lee, Yaya Deng
description: Set, the merciless god of darkness, sits on the throne of Egypt and plunged the once peaceful and prosperous empire into chaos and conflict. Few dare to rebel against his power but a young thief, whose beloved woman has been taken prisoner, will try to dethrone him with the help of the powerful god Horus.

title: Breaking Point
actors: Tom Berenger, Busta Rhymes, Armand Assante, Musetta Vander, Frankie Faison, Sticky Fingaz, Curtiss Cook, Devin Ratray, Quisha Saunders, Robert LuPone
description: Steven Luisi, once a promising lawyer, is looking to return to his job after a fight against drug addiction and a family tragedy when he comes across a complex murder case. In an attempt to solve the case, Steven teams up with Richard "Beanz" Allen, a former athlete turned criminal, to stand up to Bowen, a gang leader and Steven's old drug dealer, uncovering intricate relationships between crime and crime. corrupt police.

title: Ghost Town
actors: Jessica Rose, Randy Wayne, Gil Gerard, Billy Drago, Cian Barry, Joey Ansah, Annabelle Wallis, Elize du Toit, Vlado Mihailov, Alexander Nikolov
description: Reb Halland, who lived in the days of the Wild West, made a pact with the devil to obtain immortality for his gang. Instead, preacher McCready tried to protect his small town from Halland by placing five totem poles. One day, however, a passing collector saw one of the totem poles and decided to take it away. His gesture caused Halland and his men to reveal themselves by killing everyone before committing a ritual suicide. Years and years later, a group of university students suddenly find themselves in those parts and are forced to confront some strange events. After several killers follow one another, the youngsters will have to figure out how to annihilate Halland forever and end the curse.

title: Operation Rogue
actors: Mark Dacascos, Treat Williams, Sofia Pernas, Billy Campbell, Nicco Manalo, Chris Elassad, Henry Strzalkowski, Joe Suba, Bon Vibar, Jeremy Ian
description: Deep in the jungle of Southeast Asia, a terrorist organization has stolen material to create a dangerous chemical bomb. It is up to Captain Max Randall and the team of marines to stop the criminals but, when the military kills the son of the enemy leader, the terrorists respond by kidnapping General Wallace's daughter.

title: San Andreas
actors: Dwayne Johnson, Alexandra Daddario, Carla Gugino, Paul Giamatti, Art Parkinson, Hugo Johnstone-Burt, Ioan Gruffudd, Archie Panjabi, Colton Haynes, Will Yun Lee, Kylie Minogue, Marissa Neitling
description: After the infamous San Andreas Fault causes a 9 magnitude earthquake in California, pilot Ray and his long-separated ex-wife join forces to save their only daughter on a trip from Los Angeles to San Francisco. When they think that the danger may have passed, they will find that they are facing the beginning of one of the greatest catastrophes ever seen.
notes: Brad Peyton and screenwriter Carlton Cuse (expert in narrative chasms in Lost) opt for a process of mourning and emotional reunion of the couple, embodied by good stickers for an action version of Smemoranda and punctuated by dialogues that would disfigure on Twitter. Give us back Roland Emmerich. At least, with him, the car seat shakes.

title: American Sniper
actors: Bradley Cooper, Sienna Miller, Luke Grimes, Jake McDorman, Kevin Lacz, Cory Hardrict, Navid Negahban, Keir O'Donnell, Kyle Gallner, Max Charles, Brando Eaton, Brian Hallisay, Eric Ladin, Madeleine McGraw, Mido Hamada, Joel Lambert
description: Sniper Chris Kyle is sent to Iraq with only one mission: to protect his comrades. Thanks to his pinpoint accuracy and his heroic deeds he will save countless lives earning the nickname of "Legend". However, his reputation also grows behind enemy lines making him a prime target. Despite this, he will manage to return home and discover that war is something he will hardly be able to leave behind.
notes: The film is ideologically crystalline: there is no doubt about who the good guys are, the Eastwoodian idea of ??the story is western, Falluja is the new frontier. The fact that war is necessary (evidently also that of Cheney, Rumsfeld & co.) Does not mean that it is beautiful or even fair. And Eastwood describes it in its inevitable tragicity, without making discounts by adhering perfectly to the vision of the soldier, which is then the same as his cinema, because Clint's idea of ??narration always starts from individuals like the American Sniper, from their hiring of responsibility and the company they are called upon to perform.

title: Home
actors: Catalina Sandino Moreno, Naya Rivera, Ashley Rickards, Tara Buck, Ava Acres, Arshad Aslam, Rob Brownstein, Laura Kai Chen, Jan Broberg, Assaf Cohen, Olivia Crocicchia, Nick Eversman, Kent Faulcon
description: When asked to sell a house with a troubled past, ambitious real estate agent Leigh crosses paths with that of a troubled girl, who turns out to be the couple's runaway daughter who wants to get rid of the property. Trying to come to her rescue, Leigh will have to deal with a supernatural force that will also lure her sister Vera into her trap.

title: Kristy
actors: Ashley Greene, Haley Bennett, Lucas Till, James Ransone, Chris Coy, Mathew St. Patrick, Corrina Roshea, John L. Armijo, Wayne Pére, David Jensen
description: As her mates leave to spend Thanksgiving with their families, Justine prepares to be alone in the college dorm. His solitary 'vacation', however, is suddenly interrupted by the arrival of a gang of thugs who invade the rooms. He will find himself in spite of himself at the center of a desperate struggle for survival.
notes: The most unsettling - and interesting - feature of Oliver Blackburn's second feature film is the stylistic packaging from indie film: rarefied light and pastel colors, especially at the beginning, reveal an excellent ability to frame the protagonist in environments of immaculate solitude, leaving alone filter the unease that is about to take the place of peace. What follows is a vengeance slasher who, despite being underpinned by aesthetically evocative moments, does not renounce even an expedient of the abused gender grammar.

title: A Good Man
actors: Steven Seagal, Victor Webster, Tzi Ma, Ron Balicki, Claudiu Bleont, Massimo Dobrovic, Elias Ferkin, Sofia Nicolaescu, Iulia Verdes
description: A former soldier attempts to lead an ordinary life by working in a housing estate. However, when one of the tenants falls prey to a Russian gangster, the man will be forced to return to action, taking up arms for a good cause.

title: Sniper: Legacy
actors: Tom Berenger, Chad Michael Collins, Dennis Haysbert, Asen Asenov, Vasil Enev, Danko Jordanov, Dominic Mafham, Mercedes Mason, Woon Young Park, Raicho Vasilev
description: A killer is killing all the military leaders engaged in the Islamist Syrian territories and Brandon Beckett, a sniper of the armed forces, is told that his father is one of the victims. While trying to track down the killer, Brandon discovers that the parent is still alive and that the senior officers lied to him just to use him as bait.

title: Jurassic World
actors: Chris Pratt, Bryce Dallas Howard, Ty Simpkins, Nick Robinson, Irfan Khan, Vincent D'Onofrio, Jake Johnson, Omar Sy, BD Wong, Judy Greer, Lauren Lapkus, Katie McGrath, Eddie J. Fernandez
description: Twenty-two years after the events recounted in Jurassic Park, the island of Nublar has a fully functional dinosaur theme park. The park, representative of the Jurassic world, is finally as John Hammond originally designed it. Not everything, however, is destined to go smoothly due to the creation of a new hybrid dinosaur, responsible for a series of accidents.
notes: Jurassic World turns out to be an unprecedented hybrid between sequel, remake and reboot, consciously tracing the plot of the first chapter; here is a Chris Pratt more Indiana Jones than ever, a Bryce Dallas Howard who first is the villain of a comic book and then an irreducible final girl, which quotations abound (The shark, The birds ...), that the spectacle of creatures in struggle he becomes rightly smashing like a vintage catastrophic. And it works.

title: Chappie
actors: Sharlto Copley, Hugh Jackman, Dev Patel, Sigourney Weaver, Jose Pablo Cantillo, Ninja, Yo-Landi Visser, Miranda Frigon, Sean O. Roberts, Robert Hobbs
description: In the near future, crime is controlled by an oppressive mechanical police force, by androids that no one can interfere with. But when Chappie, one of them, is stolen and reprogrammed, we witness the birth of the first robot able to think and decide independently. In him, some destructive forces see a danger for the whole of humanity and for the social order to be destroyed before it is too late.
notes: Robust and energetic cinema that knows how to entertain, but also to irritate. Humandroid is a centrifugal work where everything and everyone is thrown into the cauldron: the theme of consciousness as tangible matter, socialization to violence, the humanism of the machine, immortality. The references, thematic and aesthetic, are obviously multiple, ups and downs: from the most obvious RoboCop, Short Circuit, Il tagliaerbe to the exploitation scenarios of Class 1999 and Hobo with a Shotgun. There is a lack of thought, direction, an idea of ??cinema.

title: Insidious: Chapter 3
actors: Lin Shaye, Stefanie Scott, Dermot Mulroney, Angus Sampson, Leigh Whannell, Tate Berney, Hayley Kiyoko, Steve Coulter, Michael Reid MacKay, Ele Keats, Ashton Moio, Tom Fitzpatrick
description: Medium Elise Rainier reluctantly agrees to use her ability to connect with the world of the dead to help a teenager who is targeted by a dangerous supernatural entity.
notes: For James Wan Insidious 2 it was a challenge: to create terror despite ironic lightening, working on a brazenly saturated rhetoric. For Whannell (Wan's writing partner since Saw's time and interpreter of one of the ghostbusters) it's a problem. He inherits pen and camera, replaces a darker and more organic imagery for the stylized one of his predecessor, but struggles to keep the balance of the double register and makes a film that is content to be just one of the 19 Blumhouse products of 2015: elementary horror subsidiary scenes, cinephile misery exploitation and no reason for interest.

title: American Muscle
actors: Nick Principe, Robin Sydney, Todd Farmer, Malice McMunn, Malice 666, Trent Haaga, John Fallon, Philip Salick, Laban Pheidias, Joshua Lou Friedman
description: John Falcon spent ten tough years in prison. He now has 24 hours to take revenge on every person who sent him to jail, including his brother.

title: I Drink Your Blood
actors: Bhaskar Roy Chowdhury, Jadin Wong, Rhonda Fultz, George Patterson, Riley Mills, John Damon, Elizabeth Marner-Brooks, Richard Bowler, Tyde Kierney, Iris Brooks
description: A gang of Satanist hippies arrive in the city and start terrorizing the inhabitants. When criminals rape a girl, her grandfather begins to hunt them down. After some unsuccessful attempts by the elder - who is also given LSD -, the girl's little brother causes the criminals to be given meat infected with the blood of a rabid dog, turning them into lunatics ready to trigger an epidemic.

title: Visions
actors: Isla Fisher, Jim Parsons, Anson Mount, Gillian Jacobs, Eva Longoria, Joanna Cassidy, Bryce Johnson, Jeff Branson, Roberto 'Sanz' Sanchez, Elizabeth Rowin
description: Leaving the hectic city life behind her, Julia - expecting a child - moves in with her husband David in their new home in the country, where she soon finds herself plagued by strange noises and visions of a sinister hooded figure. Apart from Julia, no one else sees or hears anything so much that David worries about his wife's balance. Desperate to prove her sanity, Julia contacts a medium from whom she learns the haunted history of the house she lives in. By piecing the pieces of the past together to prevent a future horror from occurring, Julia uncovers a dark conspiracy that will undermine her life and that of her unborn child.

title: Hercules Reborn
actors: John Hennigan, Christian Oliver, Marcus Shirock, James Duval, Dylan Vox, Christina Ulfsparre, Alistair A. Duff, Foued Mansour, Jeremy M. Inman, Jennifer Marie Paul
description: When his bride is kidnapped by an evil king, a young man asks Hercules for help. A disgraced, exiled and banished hero for killing his family, Hercules finds new inspiration in the young man's courage and, together with him, he will fight to save his bride and regain his honor.

title: AE: Apocalypse Earth
actors: Adrian Paul, Richard Grieco, Bali Rodriguez, Gray Hawks, Jayson McCardell, Daniel Ross Mix, Michelle Jones, Erika Hidalgo, Jessica Russo, Martin Adebisi
description: Following an alien invasion, a group of desperate humans flee Earth and arrive on a distant planet. Refugees will soon find themselves fighting for their own survival against fierce and hostile creatures.

title: See No Evil 2
actors: Glenn Jacobs, Danielle Harris, Katharine Isabelle, Chelan Simmons, Kaj-Erik Eriksen, Greyston Holt, Lee Majdoub, Michael Eklund, Reese Alexander, Kelly-Ruth Mercier
description: A group of friends visit the city morgue at night to surprise Amy on her birthday. The surprise, however, will be theirs when the corpse of brutal psychopath Jacob Goodnight suddenly awakens to give life to a sadistic and savage hunt.
notes: Sequel to The Eye Collector (2006).

title: Bermuda Tentacles
actors: Trevor Donovan, Linda Hamilton, Mya, John Savage, Jamie Kennedy, Richard Whiten, Ricco Ross, Jeff Rector, Robert Blanche, Angelique Cinelu
description: Air Force One, the American presidential plane, crashes in a storm in the Bermuda Triangle area. The US Navy is tasked with finding the escape pod that houses the President but a giant, sprawling creature emerging from the ocean floor attacks rescuers.

title: Warcraft
actors: Paula Patton, Travis Fimmel, Ben Schnetzer, Ben Foster, Dominic Cooper, Ruth Negga, Toby Kebbell, Anna Calvin, Daniel Wu, Clancy Brown, Robert Kazinsky
description: The peaceful kingdom of Azeroth finds itself on the brink of civil war when its inhabitants are forced to face the invading onslaught of terrible orc warriors in search of new lands to colonize. With the opening of a portal that connects Azeroth with the land of the orcs, they prepare for destruction by forcing Azeroth to defend itself from hypothetical extinction. The two different fronts are led by two heroes who are each called to decide the fate of their family, people and country.
notes: Based on the popular video game of the same name, the story tells of the first encounters between humans and orcs, with particular attention to both the end of the Alliance and those of the Horde. Featuring characters such as Dorotan and Lothar, the film takes place in several of the universes described in the various chapters of the fantasy saga.

title: The Well
actors: Haley Lu Richardson, BooBoo Stewart, Max Charles, Nicole Fox, Michael Welch, Jon Gries, Michael Massee, Rena Owen, Leo Lee, Barbara Crampton
description: In the very near future, freshwater resources have run out and civilization is on the verge of collapse. In an Oregon valley particularly hit by drought, a greedy "water baron" is determined to wipe out any survivors using even the most violent means. Only Kendal, a courageous seventeen-year-old more mature than her age, will be able to fight for what is right with determination and determination.

title: Goosebumps
actors: Odeya Rush, Jack Black, Halston Sage, Dylan Minnette, Amy Ryan, Jillian Bell, Ken Marino, Ryan Lee, Ella Wahlestedt, Kumail Nanjiani
description: A group of teens join the daughter of young adult horror writer R.L. Stine after some demons described by these found freedom on the streets of the town of Greendale, Maryland.

title: Vice
actors: Bruce Willis, Ambyr Childers, Thomas Jane, Bryan Greenberg, Charlotte Kirk, Brett Granstaff, Ryan O'Nan, Tyler J. Olson, Douglas M. Griffin, Martin Blencowe, Damon Lipari, Ashley Kirk
description: Julian Michaels designed the resort of the resorts: Vice, a place where everything is allowed and customers can let loose their wildest fantasies with the artificial inhabitants of the place, similar to human beings. When she becomes aware of herself and runs away from Vice, an android will find herself at the center of attention of the mercenaries hired by Julian to find her and a policeman, intent on ending the violence of the resort forever.

title: Z for Zachariah
actors: Margot Robbie, Chris Pine, Chiwetel Ejiofor
description: Ann Burden, a small-town girl, lives alone on a farm in the only valley with still breathing air following a nuclear war. His world is turned upside down by the encounter with two strangers wandering in the forest.

title: The Lazarus Effect
actors: Olivia Wilde, Mark Duplass, Evan Peters, Sarah Bolger, Donald Glover, Ray Wise, Bruno Gunn, Jennifer Floyd, Ator Tamras, Scott Sheldon, Scott L. Treger
description: A group of researchers, led by Frank and Zoe, find a way to bring the dead back to life. After successfully completing an experiment on a recently dead animal without authorization, the rector of their university suspends the project. The whole team still decides to go ahead but, due to an accident, Zoe is horribly killed. Frank, pervaded by terror and pain, convinces them to do something unthinkable: groped to resurrect their first human guinea pig. Initially the procedure turns out to be a success but the team soon realizes that something is wrong with Zoe. Its use on a human being will lead to dangerous and unimaginable consequences for everyone.
