notes: The special effects are not very effective and the sources of inspiration are too evident: from Re-Animator to Living Cemetery, from The Exorcist to The Lord of Evil, with the inclusion of a creature with total black eyes that seems to want to evoke Japanese ghosts . Some effective fright doesn't stop The Lazarus Effect from drowning in a chaotic sea of ??inconsistencies that only the staunchest defenders of low-budget horror will be willing to forgive.

title: Max
actors: Josh Wiggins, Lauren Graham, Robbie Amell, Thomas Haden Church, Jay Hernandez, Luke Kleintank, Dejon LaQuake, Mia Xitlali, Gabriel Rush, Joseph Julian Soria, Owen Harn, Edgar Arreola
description: A dog, used as an aid by American soldiers in Afghanistan, returns to the United States after a traumatic experience. Only the love of his handler's family can help him find peace of mind.

title: The Last Push
actors: Khary Payton, Lance Henriksen, Brian Baumgartner, James Madio, Alec Gillis, Tom Woodruff Jr., Laurent Meurette, Pascal Lamontagne, Druid Altura, Irwin Altura
description: A tragic accident derails plans for a first human exploration mission to Europa, a moon of Jupiter. One of the two astronauts in flight is dead and Michael Forrest is thus forced to face the long journey back from space to home in complete solitude and fear.

title: Sinister 2
actors: Shannyn Sossamon, James Ransone, Nicholas King, Tate Ellington, Dartanian Sloan, Robert Daniel Sloan, Jaden Klein, Lucas Jade Zumann, Lea Coco, Caden M. Fritz, Delphine Pontvieux, Laila Haley, Olivia Rainey, Jose Santiago, Howie Johnson
description: Deputy Sheriff So-and-So is investigating the serial killings that late friend Ellison Oswalt failed to solve. The investigation takes him to a farmhouse where he meets a new family consisting of Courteney Collins, who with their twin sons Zach and Dylan are on the run from an abusive husband and father. The three have found refuge on an uninhabited farm with a dark past, ready to return to the surface when the twins, unbeknownst to their mother, find a series of home movies and meet the ghost children protagonists.
notes: The narrative procedures are identical to those of the first chapter but this time the dialogues are inadmissible. The fear is always proposed in the third time and the restlessness is known from what has been acquired in Sinister. Some accelerations in the shoulder room are out of register no less than the lank triangle mother / violent father / peaceful lover good only for lengthening the minutes. The saga syndrome strikes again. Too bad, because there is real quality in a Bavarian sequence.

title: Poltergeist
actors: Sam Rockwell, Rosemarie DeWitt, Jared Harris, Kennedi Clements, Saxon Sharbino, Kyle Catlett, Jane Adams, Nicholas Braun, Susan Heyward, Karen Ivany
description: A family lives in a suburban house haunted by violent spirits. As the apparitions and attacks become more and more dangerous and affect the little girl of the house, the family must find the strength to work together and remain united to save her.
notes: Together with the horrifying The Fog of 2005, this Poltergeist is among the most unsuccessful remakes in memory. Also unable to tell the dark side of technology in the era of its domination. It is useless then to look for an idea of ??a story of our times or to put the little ones at the center of history, because here the writing, light years away from the Spielberghian depth of the original, is only a rigid and listless glue to hold together this shapeless manner, that does not even know how to scare.

title: Gacy
actors: Mark Holton, Adam Baldwin, Tom Waldman, Charlie Weber, Allison Lange, Edith Jefferson, Joleen Lutz, Scott Alan Henry, Kenneth Swartz, Matt Farnsworth
description: Wisconsin, 1953. John Gacy sr. forces fat teenage son John jr. to have sex with him during a fishing trip. Sixteen years later, now an adult, John jr. he is accused of sodomy and, having returned to freedom after 18 months, he settles in Des Plains, near Chicago. From 1972 onwards, he became a respected family man and businessman and also attempted a political career with the Democrats. While in public he abhors homosexuality, in private he uses the space under his home to indulge an unsuspected depravity: over 30 innocent boys and teenagers are buried there after being abused in a horrifying and heartbreaking way.
notes: Inspired by a true story.

title: Mercenaries
actors: Zoe Bell, Kristanna Loken, Vivica A. Fox, Brigitte Nielsen, Cynthia Rothrock, Nicole Bilderback, Tim Abell, Gerald Webb, Alexis Raich, Tiffany Panhilason
description: The daughter of the president of the United States is kidnapped and jailed while in a war zone. To try to free her from the women's prison in which she is held, a team of elite mercenaries is hired.

title: Bound to Vengeance
actors: Richard Tyson, Tina Ivlev, Bianca Malinowski, Chris Kjornes, Stephanie Charles, Nihan Gur, Dustin Quick, Vivan Dugré
description: A young woman, chained in a basement by a sex maniac, tries to escape. However, when she gets the chance to gain her freedom, she will discover a harsh truth that will prompt her to reverse her captor's plans.
notes: The script makes water but the direction is instead coherent and well conducted. Cravioto constructs an elaborate and tense syntax of panic, through the framing of the delirium between the convolutions of a camera that moves now in panoramic arches, now in comings and goings on the shoulder that defy vertigo. The frenzied editing, the distorted sounds of electric guitars and synthesizers of the 80s and some well-placed slow motion, then, make us think of an unsuspected maturity.

title: Monster Trucks
actors: Lucas Till, Rob Lowe, Thomas Lennon, Amy Ryan, Jane Levy, Barry Pepper, Danny Glover, Frank Whaley, Aliyah O'Brien, Holt McCallany
description: Tripp is a high school student trapped in a small town in the heart of the United States, a reality far too narrow for him. His greatest desire is to leave it behind, to face the great life out there. The opportunity comes when an oil plant explodes, unearthing a monster, which Tripp learns to know and hide. The incredible friendship that is born will lead the boy to find his way.

title: Cybernatural
actors: Heather Sossaman, Shelley Hennig, Renee Olstead, Will Peltz, Jacob Wysocki, Courtney Halverson, Cal Barnes, Matthew Bohrer, Mickey River, Moses Jacob Storm
description: During an overnight video chat, six high school friends receive a Skype message from a classmate who killed herself exactly a year ago. At first they think this is a joke, but then they realize that they are dealing with something that is not part of this world, something that wants them dead.
notes: The world (real and, consequently, cinematic) is closed in a frame of hyperbolic virtuality, free from any hold to an outside, an after, an beyond. Our present is given by the interaction with (the protagonists) and by the observation of (the public) what happens inside. Under the productive aegis of Timur Bekmambetov, Gabriadze reflects on the filmic (and extra-film) device with a conscious contemporary conscience: what is frightening today is precisely that frame.

title: Frankenstein
actors: Xavier Samuel, Carrie-Anne Moss, Danny Huston, Tony Todd, Maya Erskine, Matthew Jacobs, Mckenna Grace, James Lew, Carol Anne Watts, John Lacy, Ron Roggé
description: In modern-day Los Angeles, a pair of eccentric scientists, comprised of Victor Frankenstein and his wife Elizabeth, artificially create a creature, a monster named Adam. Later left to die, Adam is confronted with the violence and wickedness of the world around him. Disfigured and unable to understand why so much evil, he will have to deal with the more horrible side of humanity.
notes: A modern reinterpretation of the classic by Mary Shelley.

title: The Hateful Eight
actors: Samuel L. Jackson, Walton Goggins, Kurt Russell, Tim Roth, Jennifer Jason Leigh, Zoe Bell, Bruce Dern, Michael Madsen, Demián Bichir, Channing Tatum
description: A few years after the American Civil War, a stagecoach makes its way through Wyoming's winter landscape. The passengers, bounty hunter John Ruth (Kurt Russell) and fugitive Daisy Domergue (Jennifer Jason Leigh), are headed for the city of Red Rock, where the man, better known as "The Hangman", will deliver the wanted to the justice. Along the way, they meet two strangers: Major Marquis Warren (Samuel L. Jackson), a black former Union soldier who became a notorious bounty hunter, and Chris Mannix (Walter Goggins), a southern renegade who claims to be the new sheriff of town. Due to a snowstorm, the four are welcomed at a mountain refuge, where there are not the owners waiting for them, but four faces they have never seen before. Bob (Demian Bichir), the one who takes care of the place in the absence of the owner visiting his mother, is holed up there with the executioner Oswaldo Mobray (Tim Roth), with the cowboy Joe Cage (Michael Madsen) and with the Confederate general Sanford Smithers (Bruce Dern). As the storm rages, the eight travelers will learn how their destination isn't so easy to reach. Between betrayals and deceptions, they will have to try to survive the situation.

title: The Martian
actors: Matt Damon, Jessica Chastain, Kate Mara, Kristen Wiig, Sebastian Stan, Sean Bean, Mackenzie Davis, Jeff Daniels, Michael Peña, Chiwetel Ejiofor
description: Astronaut Mark Watney (Matt Damon) becomes trapped on Mars after being abandoned by his crewmates due to an emergency. He will have to find a way to survive and adapt to life on the planet before anyone at NASA discovers how he, believed by all dead, is still alive.
notes: With an armored script, Scott is still one of the best Hollywood mettle en scène. If with the expedient of Watney's videodiary he fulfills the narrative task, with the parallel montage with three tracks he carries out a geometric visual-symbolic-narrative dialogue, accepting the blockbuster compromise only when necessary. And in a collection of shooting devices - including closed-circuit cameras, GoPro, suitcam, private webcams, NASA monitors and (beloved) objective ones - it shows us how much, in this post-everything civilization, the image is (still) indispensable. Adaptation of a novel by Andy Weir.

title: Against the Sun
actors: Tom Felton, Garret Dillahunt, Jake Abel, Nadia Parra
description: During World War II, three US Navy aviators - pilot Harold Dixon, bomber Tony Pastula and radio operator Gene Aldrich - crash their plane in the South Pacific Ocean. Thus they find themselves aboard a small raft, without water or food and with very little chance of salvation. Against all odds, the three will be able to defy storms, sharks, hunger and any danger, to get to safety.

title: Joy Ride 3
actors: Ken Kirzinger, Jesse Hutch, Ben Hollingsworth, Gianpaolo Venuta, Jake Manley, Kirsten Prout, Leela Savasta, Sara Mitich, J. Adam Brown, James Durham
description: Rusty Nail, the bloodthirsty executioner who has been raging along the highways that wind through the deserts for years, is back on the road when, to reach the Road Rally 1000 competition, he meets a group of young drivers destined to become his next victims. In a continuous succession of chases, insults and torture, Rusty Nail is ready to administer his particular sense of justice.

title: Heebie Jeebies
actors: Robert Belushi, Cathy Shim, Michael Badalucco, Lucille Soong, Evie Thompson, Dave Randolph-Mayhem Davis, Olivia Ku, Carl Savering, Marion Ross, Jennifer Rubin
description: A haunted old gold mine reopens after 150 years. From its meanders, however, a horrible supernatural creature emerges, seeking revenge on the inhabitants of a small southern town. Deputy Sheriff Todd Crane will have to overcome his fears to face the beast, a symbol of the anger of a gang of long-dead miners.

title: Showdown
actors: Rock Hudson, Dean Martin, Susan Clark, Donald Moffat, John McLiam, Charles Baca, Jackson D. Kane, Ben Zeller, John Gill, Philip L. Mead
description: Billy and Chuck are friends but one day they separate. The first plans the assault on a train, while the second becomes sheriff. After the train robbery, one of Billy's companions is killed, and Chuck starts hunting down the culprit.

title: 400 Days
actors: Caity Lotz, Brandon Routh, Ben Feldman, Tom Cavanagh, Dane Cook, Grant Bowler, Sally Pressman, Fernanda Romero, Frank Ashmore, Sara Tomko
description: Four astronauts are chosen to simulate a mission to a distant planet to test the psychological effects of deep space travel. Away from home for 400 days, they will see their mental state deteriorate as they lose all contact with the outside world. Forced out of their ship, the group will discover that the mission may not have been a simulation.

title: Halo: Nightfall
actors: Steven Waddington, Siennah Buck, Mike Colter, Christian Contreras, Alexander Bhat, Luke Neal, Jonathan Harden, Sarah Armstrong, Shaun Blaney, Katherine Fitzpatrick
description: The personal story of Jameson Locke, a legendary hunter of men and agent of the Office of Naval Intelligence (ONI), the most powerful and secretive military agency on earth. While Locke and his team are investigating the "chatter" terrorists on the colony planet Sedra, they are embroiled in a terrible biological attack. Led by Locke, ONI agents are forced to work with Randall Aiken, a commander with an important past and a deep-seated distrust of the ONI. After unraveling a plot that leads them to an ancient infernal artifact, they will be forced to fight for their own survival, doubt everything, and ultimately choose between loyalty and their own life.

title: The Forgotten
actors: Camilla Carr, Robert Dracup, Rosie Holotik, Annabelle Weinick, Bill McGhee, Jessie Lee Fulton, Harryette Warren, Michael Harvey, Jessie Kirby, Hugh Feagin, Betty Chandler, Gene Ross
description: A young nurse, Charlotte Beale, is hired into Dr. Stephens' psychiatric clinic, where a patient gave the doctor an ax in the back in the days before her arrival, and her nurse was strangled by one of the demented. Welcomed by Doctor Masters, who informs her of Stephens' death, Charlotte begins her work, soon ravaged by some atrocious acts of blood: a poor old woman has her tongue cut off, the disfigured corpse of a telephone worker is found in a closet , a young hospitalized girl dies of an awl stuck in her eye. From a patient, Charlotte learns that those crimes are the work of Doctor Masters, who is, in reality, a madwoman like everyone else, who has taken over for Stephens, who is still alive and is relegated to the cellar.

title: Mark of the Vampire
actors: Lionel Barrymore, Elizabeth Allan, Bela Lugosi, Lionel Atwill, Jean Hersholt, Henry Wadsworth, Donald Meek, Jessie Ralph, Ivan F. Simpson, Franklyn Ardell, Carroll Borland
description: Sir Karell Borotyn inexplicably dies in his residence on the outskirts of Prague. Despite the skepticism of police inspector Neumann, who investigates the case, Dr. Doskil and Baron Otto believe that the man was killed by a vampire, Count Mora, and proof of this would be the small circular wounds on the victim's neck. . In addition, the local population lives in terror of a sinister castle, the alleged home of the count and his daughter Luna, a vampire herself.

title: Red Faction: Origins
actors: Brian J. Smith, Danielle Nicolet, Kate Vernon, Tamzin Merchant, Devon Graye, Gordon Kennedy, Gareth David-Lloyd, Tamer Hassan, Ariyon Bakare, Peter Bankole
description: In a colony on Mars in the year 2145, a rebel militia officer discovers that his sister, kidnapped a dozen years earlier, is still alive. Raised as a soldier, the young woman aims to destroy her brother's faction.

title: The Visit
actors: Ed Oxenbould, Erica Lynne Marszalek, Kathryn Hahn, Olivia DeJonge, Benjamin Kanes, Peter McRobbie, Deanna Dunagan, Jon Douglas Rainey, John Buscemi, Dave Jia
description: Tyler and Becca, two teenage sons of a single mother, visit their maternal grandparents - whom they have never met and who live in an isolated country house. It doesn't take long before the two discover that something just isn't right in the lives of their grandparents, who warn them not to leave their room after half past nine in the evening. A warning that the two boys soon ignore and that they would have done better to follow.
notes: Characterized by the usual passion for the mystery that is hidden in the ordinary, Shyamalan returns to provide nightmare material to the spectators even if at times it risks repeating itself (or at least repeating formulas already cleared by the genre). However high tension, the ironic grafts are innovative.

title: Martyrs
actors: Bailey Noble, Troian Bellisario, Caitlin Carmichael, Toby Huss, Kate Burton, Blake Robbins, Diana Hopper
description: Ten-year-old Lucie escapes from the isolated warehouse where she is being held captive. Deeply traumatized, she is continually haunted by terrible nightmares in the orphanage where she finds a place. His only consolation comes from Anna, a peer of his age. Ten years later, Lucie manages to track down the family that tortured her, finding herself with Anna trapped in a hell from which escape seems impossible.
notes: Remake of Martyrs (2008).

title: Cabin Fever
actors: Dustin Ingram, Gage Golightly, Matthew Daddario, Nadine Crocker, Samuel Davis, Eli Roth, Louise Linton, Randy Schulman, George Griffith, Ted Pfeifer
description: A group of five newly graduated college students rent a house in the woods but gradually begin to fall victim to a gruesome virus, which attracts the unwanted attention of the locals. As the virus spreads in the group, friends will see their true feelings and personalities come to the surface as they struggle for survival.

title: Life on the Line
actors: John Travolta, Kate Bosworth, Devon Sawa, Julie Benz, Sharon Stone, Gil Bellows, Ryan Robbins, Ty Olsson, Stuart Stone, Matt Bellefleur, Sidney Grigg
description: Beau works on a team of Texan workers who fix the dilapidated power line. Feeling guilty about his brother's death, Beau raises his orphaned niece Bailey but their two worlds are bound to collide when the girl's handsome boyfriend joins the group of electricians on the eve of a violent storm.

title: Revolt
actors: Lee Pace, Bérénice Marlohe, Amy Louise Wilson, Kenneth Fok, Carl Roddam, Edwin Jay
description: After a catastrophic alien invasion, in the war-torn African countryside, an American soldier and a French humanitarian aide team up to survive the situation. As they move in search of refuge, they will see their bond tested when the soldier discovers his true identity.

title: Pete's Dragon
actors: Bryce Dallas Howard, Oakes Fegley, Wes Bentley, Karl Urban, Oona Laurence, Robert Redford, Isiah Whitlock Jr., Craig Hall
description: For years, old Mr. Meacham has delighted the children of his area with tales of the ferocious dragon living in the woods. For his daughter Grace, who works as a forest ranger, his stories are nothing but bullshit until he meets Pete. A mysterious ten-year-old boy with no family and no home, Pete claims to live in the woods with a large green dragon named Elliott. From his description, Elliott looks very similar to the dragon protagonist of Meacham's tales. With the help of 11-year-old Natalie, daughter of a local sawmill owner, Grace sets out to find out where Pete comes from, who he belongs to, and the truth about the dragon.
notes: Remake of the 1977 film of the same name.

title: We Are Still Here
actors: Barbara Crampton, Andrew Sensenig, Lisa Marie, Larry Fessenden, Monte Markham, Susan Gibney, Michael Patrick Nicholson, Kelsea Dakota, Guy Gane, Elissa Dowling
description: After their teenage son dies in a car accident, Paul and Anne decide to move to the quiet countryside of New England to overcome the pain. Still in mourning, the two unwittingly become prey to a family of vengeful spirits residing in their new home. In a short time, they will discover that the apparent tranquility of the town hides terrifying secrets.

title: Pod
actors: Larry Fessenden, Lauren Ashley Carter, John Weselcouch, Brian Morvant, Dean Cates
description: After receiving a cryptic message from their war veteran brother, Ed and Lyla travel to their secluded family home on the lake, despite their long-standing relationship. The terror they will encounter will go far beyond anything they could ever have imagined.

title: Nightlight
actors: Shelby Young, Chloe Bridges, Carter Jenkins, Mitch Hewer, Taylor Ashley Murphy, Kyle Fain
description: For years, Covington Forest has been shrouded in mystery due to dark stories that see it as a final destination for troubled youth. Undaunted by the news that a classmate recently lost his life in those woods, five friends decide to venture to the same places for an evening of games and ghost stories. However, their plans go awry when they awaken a demonic presence, an invisible evil capable of grasping their deepest fears and plunging them into an endless nightmare.

title: Drácula
actors: Carlos Villarías, Lupita Tovar, Barry Norton, Pablo Álvarez Rubio, Eduardo Arozamena, José Soriano Viosca, Carmen Guerrero, Amelia Senisterra, Manuel Arbó
description: Real estate agent Renfield (Pablo Álvarez Rubio) travels to Transylvania to conclude a sale. His destination is the castle of Count Dracula (Carlos Villar), a sinister character that locals believe to be a vampire. Arrived at his destination, Renfield is subjugated by the evil Count. Then, aboard a ship, the disturbing noble and his new servant set sail for England.
notes: Shot at night with a different cast in the same sets used for Tod Browning's film of the same name. In this Spanish version, made for the Latin American market, there are also some scenes from the English original. From Bram Stoker's novel of the same name.

title: Fatal Instinct
actors: Richard Burgi, Drew Fuller, Ivan Sergei, Dominique Swain, Krista Allen, Masiela Lusha, Anne Winters, Peter Dobson, Brittany Wagner, Kovar McClure
description: Police detectives Decker and Gates follow a trail of tracks as they hunt down a serial killer who is terrorizing Los Angeles. The investigation, however, turns out to be very personal and takes a turn for the worse when the evidence leads to Gates' crook brother, whom Decker helped get arrested years earlier.

title: Breaking at the Edge
actors: Rebecca Da Costa, Milo Ventimiglia, Andie MacDowell, Johnathon Schaech, Logan Browning, Brianne Davis, Ketrenna Kirkland, Shannon Mayers, Shane Gray, Rosco Williams Jr.
description: A pregnant woman begins to fear for her sanity and the life of her unborn child due to a supernatural threat, which may only be the fruit of her own head.

title: The Vatican Tapes
actors: Michael Peña, Djimon Hounsou, Peter Andersson, Olivia Taylor Dudley, Kathleen Robertson, Dougray Scott, John Patrick Amedori, Tehmina Sunny, Michael Paré, Daniel Bernhardt, Bruno Gunn
description: Angela Holmes, a 27-year-old woman, has a devastating effect on everyone around her, causing injury or death. To investigate the demon that possesses it, Father Lozano intervenes but soon the Vatican sends Vicar Imani and Cardinal Bruun to deal with the affair, which involves an ancient satanic force more powerful than you think.
notes: From found footage to wildest quotationism, Mark Neveldine's film (Crank with Jason Statham) seems to be content to retrace paths already trodden elsewhere without having the will to experiment, or to test, the boundaries of the genre.

title: The Adderall Diaries
actors: James Franco, Ed Harris, Amber Heard, Christian Slater, Wilmer Valderrama, Cynthia Nixon, Jim Parrack, Timothée Chalamet, Danny Flaherty, Tonya Glanz
description: Elliott, once a successful novelist, is struggling with writer's block and a heavy addiction to Adderall, a strong drug used to treat hyperactivity syndrome and narcolepsy. To distract himself and escape his problems, he struggles to delve into the case of a high-profile murder.

title: The Night Watchmen
actors: James Remar, Matt Servitto, Tiffany Shepis, Kara Luiz, Rain Pryor, Dan DeLuca, Ken Arnold, Max Gray Wilbur, Diona Reasonover, Kevin Jiggetts
description: Three inept night watchmen, aided by a young and beautiful fearless journalist, fight an epic battle to save their lives. In fact, a wrong patrol unleashes a horde of hungry vampires and the unlikely group will have the task of stopping a scourge that not only threatens them but the entire city of Baltimore.

title: Finders Keepers
actors: Jaime Pressly, Patrick Muldoon, Kylie Rogers, Marina Sirtis, Steve Austin, Tobin Bell, Mark DeCarlo, Joseph Gatt, Mary Pat Gleason, Trilby Glover, Michael Healey, Kristen Kerr, Ariel Llinas, Joey Luthman
description: A divorced woman is going through a period of great stress and confusion, so she decides to move in with her daughter in a new apartment. The life of the mother and young daughter begins to be upset by the presence of a doll with horrifying features, found inside the new home and presumably abandoned by the previous owners of the building.

actors: Sheri Moon Zombie, Malcolm McDowell, Elizabeth Daily, Daniel Roebuck, Lawrence Hilton-Jacobs, Torsten Voges, David Ury, Bari Suzuki, Richard Brake
description: Five workers are kidnapped the night before Halloween and held hostage in a large secret compound. There, trapped in a man-made hell, they will have 12 hours to survive the most terrifying game ever created: the game called 31.

title: King Jack
actors: Charlie Plummer, Cory Nichols, Christian Madsen, Danny Flaherty, Erin Davie, Chloe Levine, Keith Leonard, Yainis Ynoa, Melvin Mogoli, Meeko
description: Growing up in a small country town full of violent offenders, Jack has learned to do what it takes to survive, despite having a mother unaware of what's happening to him and no father. After his aunt falls ill and his younger cousin moves to live with him, 15-year-old Jack discovers the importance of friendship, family and the pursuit of happiness even in the most desolate of circumstances.

title: Mockingbird
actors: Audrey Marie Anderson, Natalie Alyn Lind, Alyvia Alyn Lind, Emily Alyn Lind, Todd Stashwick, Benjamin Stockham, Lee Garlington, Spencer List, Alexandra Lydon, Isabella Murad
description: A couple receives three cameras and a list of instructions to follow to keep shooting and avoid dying. Skeptical at first, the two will soon discover that all that can save them is to keep spinning as the game becomes more and more gory during the night.

title: Puncture Wounds
actors: Cung Le, Dolph Lundgren, Vinnie Jones, Briana Evigan, Gianni Capaldi, James C. Burns, Robert LaSardo, Jonathan Kowalsky, Jake Jacobson, Scott Sheeley
description: Returning home from traumatic service in Iraq, John finds himself struggling with PTSD. What little peace he had managed to build around himself literally shatters the day he rescues a young escort from a group of violent pimps belonging to the Aryan brotherhood.

title: 10.0 Earthquake
actors: Henry Ian Cusick, Cameron Richardson, David Chokachi, Jeffrey Jones, Kristen Dalton, Chasty Ballesteros, Heather Sossaman, Malcolm Barrett, Joey Luthman, Brock Kelly
description: As a series of earthquakes begin to haunt Los Angeles, scientist Emily theorizes that a super earthquake will cause the entire city to collapse into a lava-filled chasm. Engineer Jack, who works in a company responsible for earthquakes due to the fracking, feels obliged to be of help and with Emily travels through the city in the process of destruction in the hope of moving the epicenter to a less populated area and thus save the lives of millions of people.

title: Air
actors: Norman Reedus, Djimon Hounsou, Sandrine Holt, David Nykl, Peter Benson, Paula Lindberg, Steve Burgess
description: Two caretakers attempt to maintain their sanity while living in an underground bunker that houses cryogenically frozen people destined to repopulate the world.

title: The Gallows
actors: Cassidy Gifford, Pfeifer Brown, Ryan Shoos, Reese Mishler, Alexis Schneider, Price T. Morgan, Mackie Burt
description: Twenty years after an accident caused the protagonist's death during a school performance, the students of the same school decide to put the work back on its feet and finish it. The clumsy attempt to honor the anniversary of the tragedy will make them discover that some things would be better not to touch them and leave them where they are.
notes: The [REC] style slaughter begins, but the yawns do not subside. A paradigmatic film of a tired, saturated vein, unable even to focus on a crude efficacy. Ridiculous in the attempts to justify the point of view of the subjective in the script. Reassessed only by someone who will blather about theoretical film and morality of the gaze.

title: Pumpkinhead
actors: Lance Henriksen, Jeff East, John D'Aquino, Kimberly Ross, Joel Hoffman, Cynthia Bain, Kerry Remsen, Florence Schauffler, Brian Bremer, George 'Buck' Flower
description: In a rural village far from the cities, a group of tourists accidentally causes the death of a child. The father of the deceased, in the grip of anger at what happened, goes in search of a witch and discovers that he can summon the "Pumpkinhead", or the demon of revenge.
notes: First chapter of a horror saga, unpublished in Italy and became a cult many years after its release.

title: Collision Course
actors: Tia Carrere, David Chokachi, Meghan McLeod, Tim Abell, Janis Peebles, Dylan Vox, Dee Wallace, Marc Barnes, Jon Briddell, Graham Clarke
description: Kate Parks spent the last year on tour promoting her book about her husband's death in a plane crash. All he wants is to go home to his 15-year-old daughter Samantha but while he's in the air, a solar flare kills the pilot of his plane, knocks the co-pilot offside and damages the instrumentation. With panic rampant among the passengers, Kate and flight attendant Jake try to manage the growing chaos and communicate their situation to air traffic control. Alternatively, he will have to find a way to safely land to see his beloved Samantha again.

title: War Pigs
actors: Mickey Rourke, Dolph Lundgren, Luke Goss, Ryan Kelley, Noah Segan, Chuck Liddell, K.C. Clyde, Angie Papanikolas, Maclain Nelson, Blake Webb
description: Jack Wosick (Luke Goss), a disgraced World War II army captain, is given a chance for redemption when asked to lead a group of misfits better known as War Pigs to secretly infiltrate enemy ranks. to steal the secrets of a super weapon created by the Nazis. With the help of Captain Hans Picault, an anti-Nazi German enlisted in the French Legion, and Colonel AJ Redding, a WWI veteran, Jack will lead the team, earning everyone's respect and transforming them into a fearsome unit.

title: Absolution
actors: Steven Seagal, Byron Mann, Josh Barnett, Adina Stetcu, Massimo Dobrovic, Vinnie Jones, Maria Bata, Sabina Branduse, Lauro Chartrand, Dominte Cosmin
description: When he meets a young girl on the run from a mafia boss with strong political connections, John Alexander (Steven Seagal) is torn between defending the girl and staying loyal to the government agency that hired him for a delicate mission.

title: Seattle Superstorm
actors: Esai Morales, Ona Grauer, Jared Abrahamson, MacKenzie Porter, Martin Cummins, Michelle Harrison, Jay Brazeau, Thomas Bradshaw, Jon Johnson, Owen Kwong
description: NASA scientist Tom Reynolds, separated from his wife, travels to Seattle to be with his new partner, Lt. Emma Peterson. But their respective children, Wyatt and Chloe, seem to disagree. The situation changes when an unidentified object is shot down by the armed forces and crashes into the Strait of Puget (Washington). Thus began a strange series of atmospheric events that spread to threaten the safety of the inhabitants. The new family will have to find ways to work together to save the city, and save each other, before it's too late.

title: Suicide Squad
actors: Will Smith, Margot Robbie, Jay Hernandez, Jai Courtney, Adam Beach, Jared Leto, Viola Davis, Cara Delevingne, Joel Kinnaman, Adewale Akinnuoye-Agbaje, Karen Fukuhara
description: A secret government agency, run by Amanda Waller and called Argus, creates a task force made up of super villains. They are assigned dangerous tasks to complete in exchange for leniency for their prison sentences. However, not everything is as simple as it appears to be and the squadron will soon have to deal with an unexpected situation.

title: Jurassic City
actors: Ray Wise, Kevin Gage, Dana Melanie, Kayla Carlyle, Vernon Wells, Jack Forcinito, Sofia Mattsson, Robert LaSardo, Benjamin Easterday, Kelcey Watson
description: A top secret laboratory is unexpectedly hacked and thousands of velociraptors unleash their rage on Los Angeles. A unit of agents moves to contain the creatures before chaos breaks out everywhere when, in the meantime, a truck loaded with animals of the same species is diverted to a nearby prison. In what will soon become a struggle for survival, everyone will be in danger and will have to fight for survival.

title: The 5th Wave
actors: Chloë Grace Moretz, Zackary Arthur, Nick Robinson, Alex Roe, Maika Monroe, Liev Schreiber, Maria Bello, Maggie Siff, Ron Livingston, Tony Revolori, Nadji Jeter
description: The aliens attack the Earth in five different waves. The first brings the planet back to the stone age, the second generates a gigantic tsunami that wipes out all coastal cities, the third spreads a plague caused by birds capable of exterminating almost all humans and the fourth installs an alien brain in the few survivors. . The fifth wave, however, remains a mystery that 16-year-old Cassie Sullivan wishes to uncover. While trying to carry out her promise to find her brother, Cassie meets Evan Walker, a strange but handsome boy with a secret he doesn't want to reveal to anyone. The closer Cassie gets to Evan, the closer the fifth wave secret will be to its unveiling.
notes: Adaptation of a novel by Rick Yancey.

title: Vendetta
actors: Dean Cain, Paul Wight, Kyra Zagorsky, Michael Eklund, Ben Hollingsworth, Paul Anthony, Aleks Paunovic, Matthew MacCaull, Uros Certic, Adrian Holmes
description: Detective Mason will not hesitate to push himself beyond his limits in order to carry out a plan of revenge. When his wife is killed by a criminal, Mason deliberately gets himself arrested in revenge. In prison, however, he discovers a new criminal gang whose members are ready to do anything to defend themselves.

title: American Made
actors: Tom Cruise, Domhnall Gleeson, Sarah Wright, Jesse Plemons, Caleb Landry Jones, Jayma Mays, Benito Martinez, E. Roger Mitchell, Lola Kirke, Alejandro Edda
description: The true story of Barry Seal (Tom Cruise), an American aviator and drug trafficker. Once accused of money laundering and drug trafficking, Seal struck a deal with the US government by becoming an undercover CIA whistleblower and helping to work on one of the agency's most famous operations against the Sandinista government in Nicaragua.

title: Autopsy of Jane Doe
actors: Emile Hirsch, Brian Cox, Olwen Kelly, Michael McElhatton, Ophelia Lovibond
description: When the brutalized body of an unknown woman is discovered in a small town in Virginia, terrible and inexplicable events begin to haunt the owners of the morgue commissioned to perform the autopsy. Pathologist Tommy Tilden and son Austin soon discover evidence of torture techniques from the days of the witch hunt on the body. Trapped by a strange storm, father and son will be forced to fight against the horrors that are transmitted to them from the victim's body.

title: Band of Robbers
actors: Kyle Gallner, Adam Nee, Matthew Gray Gubler, Hannibal Buress, Melissa Benoist, Daniel Edward Mora, Stephen Lang, Eric Christian Olsen, Johnny Pemberton, Beth Grant
description: When released from prison, Huck hopes to put his criminal past behind him. However, Tom, his lifelong friend and corrupt cop, has other plans: After forming a gang of thieves with a group of misfits, he plans to locate that hidden treasure they never found as kids.
notes: Taking up the characters created by Mark Twain, the two directors imagine Tom Sawyer and Huckleberry Finn, now adults, moving in today's world.

title: Ramrod
actors: Joel McCrea, Veronica Lake, Don DeFore, Donald Crisp, Preston Foster, Arleen Whelan, Charles Ruggles, Lloyd Bridges, Nestor Paiva, Ray Teal, Houseley Stevenson, Ward Wood, Ian MacDonald, Wally Cassell, Sarah Padden, Hal Taliaferro, Jeff Corey
description: Farmer Frank Ivey (Preston Foster), backed by Ben Dickason (Charles Ruggles), lays down the law on free territory, forcing Walt Shipley (Ian MacDonald) to flee, intent on grazing a flock of sheep in a territory usually reserved for cattle. Unable to hold his own against opponents, Walt leaves the ranch to his girlfriend Connie (Veronica Lake), daughter of Ben. He has wanted for years for the girl to marry Ivey, but Connie, having taken possession of her ex-boyfriend's ranch, openly challenges both of them, counting on the help of Dave (Joel McCrea) and his friend Bill (Don DeFore). Dave accepts the assignment to run the ranch, as long as the law is not broken, but soon the situation becomes critical: the brutal beating of one of Connie's men unleashes a no-holds-barred feud.
notes: The femme fatale Veronica Lake, ready to resort to seduction to achieve her goals, gives the first western of the Hungarian De Toth, well photographed in black and white, a strong noir drift.

title: Bad Biology
actors: Charlee Danielson, Anthony Sneed, Mark Wilson, John A. Thorburn, Remedy, Tom Kohut, James Shell, Vivian Sanchez, Jessie Jayne Clancy, R.A. The Rugged Man
description: In an American city live Jennifer and Batz, two boys who grew up with deformities in their sexual organ and who live unhappy due to the impossibility of finding a suitable partner. Jennifer is forced to kill all the boys she has sex with due to her illness, while Batz has a sex organ of its own that forces him to take more and more drugs.

title: Circle of Iron
actors: David Carradine, Jeff Cooper, Christopher Lee, Roddy McDowall, Eli Wallach, Anthony De Longis, Earl Maynard, Erica Creer, Michael M. Vendrell, Leo Whang
description: In an unspecified scenario, a group of fighters compete for the chance to set out in search of the Book of Wisdom, guarded by the mysterious Zetan, which no one seems to have ever consulted: according to belief, every secret concerning man is written in it. in his earthly life.
notes: Bruce Lee's original script, which remained incomplete due to his untimely death, was rewritten five years later. David Carradine plays in four roles.

title: Smosh: The Movie
actors: Anthony Padilla, Ian Hecox, Lady Gaga, Louis C.K., Michael Ian Black, Harry Styles, Shane Dawson, Grace Helbig, Jillian Nelson, Harley Morenstein, Jenna Marbles, Mark Edward Fischbach
description: When an embarrassing video appears on the internet before their high school reunion, Ian and Anthony decide to go to YouTube to rewrite the story. They will thus find themselves moving between censored videos and scandalous content.

title: Age of Tomorrow
actors: Kelly Hu, Anthony Marks, Robert Picardo, Nicholas Alexander, Laura Alexandra Ramos, Jennifer Marshall, Taylor Coliee, Sarah Karijan, Lane Townsend, Morgan West, Mitchell Carpenter, Nick Stellate, Joseph Price
description: Humanity must fight for survival when the Earth is invaded by hostile aliens who want to destroy the planet. As the epic battle continues, some astronauts sneak into the mothership where they discover a portal to the alien planet. They manage to warn the Earth, just before being brutally killed. With no other choice, Earth sends a military elite of scientists and soldiers through the portal, trying to stop the invasion from within.

title: Descendants
actors: Mitchell Hope, Sarah Jeffery, Dove Cameron, Kristin Chenoweth, BooBoo Stewart, Cameron Boyce, Keegan Connor Tracy, Kathy Najimy, Sofia Carson, Stephanie Bennett, Wendy Raquel Robinson
description: In Auradon's idyllic realm, Ben, the loving teenage son of benevolent King and Queen Belle, is ready to take the throne. His first action is to offer a chance for redemption to Mal, Evie, Carlos and Jay, the children of Maleficent, the Evil Queen, Cruella Demon and Jafar, who have been forced to live in exile on an island for over twenty years. years. First admitted to Auradon, the descendants of the worst villains they remember begin attending a preparatory school along with the teenage offspring of the Fairy Godmother, Cinderella, Sleeping Beauty and Mulan. Only time will tell if the kids will follow in the footsteps of their wicked parents.

title: X-Men: Apocalypse
actors: Oscar Isaac, Jennifer Lawrence, James McAvoy, Michael Fassbender, Olivia Munn, Ben Hardy, Alexandra Shipp, Sophie Turner, Tye Sheridan, Nicholas Hoult, Evan Peters, Lucas Till, Lana Condor, Rose Byrne, Josh Helman
description: Since the dawn of civilization, he has been revered as a God. Apocalypse, the first and most powerful mutant of the X-Men, has amassed the powers of many other mutants, becoming immortal and invincible. Awakening after thousands of years, he is disappointed by the world and recruits a group of powerful mutants, including an embittered Magneto, entrusting them with the task of purifying humanity and creating a new order over which to reign. As the fate of Earth hangs in the balance, Raven, with the help of Professor X, must lead a group of young X-Men in an attempt to stop their greatest enemy and save humanity from complete destruction.

title: The Bad Batch
actors: Suki Waterhouse, Jason Momoa, Keanu Reeves, Jim Carrey, Giovanni Ribisi, Yolonda Ross, Cory Roberts, Louie Lopez
description: Young Arlen is a "bad lot", one of thousands of Americans deemed unacceptable to society and unceremoniously dumped by the US government into hostile territory separated from the rest of civilization. As she wanders the desolate lands where she is in exile, Arlen is captured by a band of savage cannibals and soon realizes she must fight for her own safety.

title: All Hallows' Eve
actors: Katie Maguire, Catherine A. Callahan, Marie Maser, Kayla Lian, Mike Giannelli, Sydney Freihofer, Cole Mathewson, Michael Chmiel, Marissa Wolf, Minna Taylor
description: Sarah spends Halloween night working as a babysitter, keeping an eye on little Tia and Timmy throughout the evening. The boy discovers that he has received an anonymous videotape, without title and without cover. After some hesitation, the woman decides to show the mysterious tape to the children. The content will turn Halloween night into hell.

title: Super Tanker
actors: Callum Blue, David Schofield, Jon Mack, Jacky Woo, Atanas Srebrev, Velizar Binev, Ben Cross, Jesse Steele, Velislav Pavlov, George Zlatarev
description: One of the darkest secrets of the Cold War lies buried in a top secret facility in Alaska, a substance that was recovered from a meteor and has the same properties as anti-matter. Called Ice-10, the substance if released would initiate a chain reaction capable of destroying the world. Its danger becomes apparent when a military plane, tasked with carrying a small amount for a test, crashes and an entire Canadian city is wiped out.

title: The Hunter's Prayer
actors: Sam Worthington, Odeya Rush, Allen Leech, Amy Landecker, Verónica Echegui, Martin Compston, Julian Kay, Maria Lee Metheringham, Rory Mulroe, Alice Maguire
description: Lucas, a lone killer, is hired to kill the young Ella but, because he doesn't feel like shooting, the plan fails, setting in motion a perverse game of cat and mouse. With murderer and victim condemned to death and forced to form a difficult alliance on the run across Europe, their only hope of survival is to stop those who brutally killed Ella's family and bring them to justice.

title: Harbinger Down
actors: Lance Henriksen, Camille Balsamo, Matt Winston, Giovonnie Samuels, Winston James Francis, Mick Ignis, Michael Estime, Jason Speer, Reid Collums, Milla Bjorn
description: A group of students is aboard a fishing boat to study the effects of global warming on the Bering Sea killer whales. When the ship's crew dredges a piece of a recently discovered old Soviet space wreck, the situation takes a dangerous turn due to old experiments the Russians have conducted on small animals that can withstand even the most extreme space radiation. Having survived and mutated, the creatures have become dangerous and aggressive to the human race.

title: L.A. Apocalypse
actors: David Cade, Gina Holden, Christopher Judge, Raymond J. Barry, Kamar de los Reyes, Marco Berrios, Cesar De León, Lila Dupree, Kevin Kasha, Peter Katona
description: For five billion years, the Earth's core has worked like a gigantic nuclear reactor but, now overheated, it risks exploding and the planet being obliterated by the pressure mounting under the city of Los Angeles. After a mass evacuation, Calvin Crwaford is one of the few left in the metropolis, desperately looking for his girlfriend Ashley, who unbeknownst to him has been kidnapped and held hostage. With Los Angeles getting unstable by the minute, Calvin will have to find a way to save Ashley and save himself before it's too late.

title: Anguish
actors: Ryan Simpkins, Annika Marks, Karina Logue, Cliff Chamberlain, Amberley Gridley, Ryan O'Nan, Paulina Olszynski, Anu Bhatt, Andrea Susan Bush, Camara K. Colvin
description: Tess is only sixteen but, despite her young age, she has already had a painful life full of psychological distress, starting when she hit her head against a wall at the age of five. Over time, the mother has tried everything to help her, turning to various specialists and resorting to every alternative treatment. The diagnosis that comes closest to your problem is identity disorder, even if it's not entirely correct. Tess's identity is terribly altered and haunted by the spirits of the dead.

title: Some Kind of Hate
actors: Ronen Rubinstein, Grace Phipps, Sierra McCormick, Noah Segan, Andrew Bryniarski, Lexi Atkins, Spencer Breslin, Brando Eaton, Maestro Harrell, Michael Polish
description: Lincoln is a teenage metalhead who is abused at home by his ugly father and at school by his classmates. When he can't take it anymore and reacts, he is sent to a reformatory camp in the desert for troubled teenagers like him. Unfortunately, here too he meets bullies of which he becomes a victim but his desire for revenge has the possibility of concretely manifesting itself in an unexpected way: Moira, a very angry dead teenager who has suffered the same pains, is more than willing to take revenge even for on his own.

title: Synchronicity
actors: Chad McKnight, AJ Bowen, Brianne Davis, Scott Poythress, Michael Ironside, Ashley Drayton, Claire Bronson, Elle Sunkara, Derek Ryan Duke, Erik Thirsk
description: Jim Beale and his team of physicists have invented an extremely popular device, a machine capable of traversing space and time. When faced with a rare dahlia from the future, Jim must find the identical match to that flower to demonstrate how his invention works. He soon discovers that the dahlia is in the hands of Abby, a mysterious girl who tricks him into revealing her secrets. Convinced that Abby wants to steal his invention, Jim travels back in time to stop her betrayal before it's too late. Once in the past, he will discover a surprising truth about the car, the girl and his own reality.

title: Tales of Halloween
directors: Darren Lynn Bousman, Neil Marshall, Lucky McKee, John Skipp, Andrew Kasch, Mike Mendez, Ryan Schifrin, Paul Solet, Axelle Carolyn, Dave Parker, Adam Gierasch
actors: BooBoo Stewart, Adrianne Curry, Grace Phipps, Keir Gilchrist, Adrienne Barbeau, Lin Shaye, John Landis, Greg Grunberg, Sam Witwer, Cerina Vincent
description: Halloween: an evening of celebration and lifestyle. With that definition in mind, 11 master directors of the new horror cinema tell in their own way the most iconic of American parties in the suburbs.

title: San Andreas Quake
actors: Jhey Castles, Jason Woods, Grace Van Dien, Elaine Partnow, Lane Townsend, Allison Adams, Kyle Barck, Robert Evans, Blaire Chandler, Chris Clanton
description: When a discredited Los Angeles seismologist tries to warn of the impending arrival of a 12.7 magnitude earthquake, no one takes her seriously. Alone, she will have to rush desperately to rescue her family before the earthquake strikes Los Angeles from the mainland.

title: Heist
actors: Robert De Niro, Jeffrey Dean Morgan, Dave Bautista, Kate Bosworth, Gina Carano, Mark-Paul Gosselaar, Morris Chestnut, D.B. Sweeney, Summer Altice, Rosie Fellner
description: A father with no means to pay for the medical treatment his daughter needs sees as a last resort to team up with a greedy colleague to rob a casino. As the situation gets out of hand, the two find themselves forced to take the 657 bus hostage. As the situation worsens, it emerges that the hijacking of the bus is not entirely the result of chance.

title: Age of Ice
actors: Barton Bund, Bailey Spry, Jules Hartley, Owais Ahmed, Joe Cipriano, John Gragen, Yaron Urbas, Wasim No'mani, Revon Yousif, Ali Amine
description: A series of sudden and violent earthquakes shakes the Arabian tectonic plate causing unstable weather and polar temperatures across the planet. In an attempt to save themselves, the Jones, an American family on vacation in Egypt, must fight against the freezing temperatures that mark the beginning of a new ice age capable of covering the Sphinx, the Pyramids and the Sahara desert with snow. .

title: Ride Along 2
actors: Ice Cube, Kevin Hart, Tika Sumpter, Ken Jeong, Olivia Munn, Benjamin Bratt, Sherri Shepherd, Bruce McGill, Carlos Gomez, Utkarsh Ambudkar, Glen Powell
description: As his wedding day approaches, Ben travels to Miami with his future brother-in-law James to take out a trafficker who supplies all of Atlanta with his drugs.
notes: Sequel to Policeman on Trial (2014).

title: The Devil's Candy
actors: Ethan Embry, Shiri Appleby, Pruitt Taylor Vince, Kiara Glasco, Mylinda Royer, Jamie Tisdale, Orion West
description: A troubled painter and his family buy their dream home in rural Texas. They soon discover how the house has a mysterious dark past and a former tenant wants more than just going home.

title: Southbound
directors: Roxanne Benjamin, David Bruckner, Patrick Horvath, Radio Silence
actors: Kate Beahan, Matt Bettinelli-Olpin, Susan Burke, Zoe Cooper, Gerald Downey, Karla Droege, Larry Fessenden, Dana Gould, Hassie Harrison, Davey Johnson
description: Five tales of terror unfold along a desert highway. On a desolate stretch of road two men fleeing their past, a band headed for an upcoming concert, a man struggling to return home, a brother in search of his long-lost sister and a family on vacation, are forced to confront their worst fears and their darkest secrets.

title: Cold Fusion
actors: Adrian Paul, Sarah Brown, Michelle Lee, William Hope, Vladimir Kolev, Jivko Juranov, Kitodar Todorov, Niki Iliev, Atanas Srebrev, John Laskowski, Shelly Varod
description: A UFO is shot down in Russia in the 1970s and the wreck transported to a secret research center. Following the collapse of the Soviet Union, alien technology falls into the hands of a mysterious terrorist organization, which uses it to create a devastating weapon. A team of secret agents is tasked with stopping the carnage.

title: Invasion Roswell
actors: Greg Evigan, Denise Crosby, Daniel Hugh Kelly, Stephen Billington, John H. Francis, Clarence Smith, Mariana Stanisheva, Vlado Mihailov, Iliana Lazarova, Hristo Balabanov
description: After the US military shot down a UFO in Roswell in 1947, generations of elite soldiers were secretly trained to deal with the feared return of aliens. However, the extraterrestrials never came back and the special force was canceled. Sixty-six years after the events of Roswell, aliens invade Earth and the hopes of salvation are all placed in a group of well-trained but now retired soldiers.

title: The Number One Girl
actors: Tony Schiena, Vinnie Jones, Lisa McAllister, Pat Morita, Natalya Mann, Mariza Lee, Georgio Serafini, Roger Sloman, Keith Eyles, Claire Harris
description: Joey Scalini, one of the biggest stars of Hollywood action films and martial arts champion, is invited by his friend Dragos Molnar, London boss, to participate as a judge in a television beauty contest. In the contest, presented by Mr. Sakata, Joey falls in love with competitor Tatiana, one of the girls he should never have set eyes on by order of Dragos. He will find himself having to fight live on television against the five bodyguards of the boss, before facing these in a challenge to the last blow.

title: The Forest
actors: Natalie Dormer, Taylor Kinney, Yukiyoshi Ozawa, Eoin Macken, Rina Takasaki, Kikuo Ichikawa, Noriko Sakura, Yûho Yamashita, Stephanie Vogt, James Owen
description: Sara, a young American woman, goes in search of her twin sister, who has mysteriously disappeared in the legendary forest of Aokigahara, at the base of Mount Fuji in Japan. Despite the warnings, Sara enters the woods determined to discover the truth about her twin's fate but is forced to confront the angry and tormented souls of the dead, who prey on anyone who enters their territory.

title: Avengers Grimm
actors: Casper Van Dien, Lauren Parkinson, Lou Ferrigno, Milynn Sarley, Marah Fairclough, Rileah Vanderbilt, Elizabeth Peterson, Kimo Leopoldo, Andrew E. Tilles, Justine Herron
description: When Rumple destroys the Magic Mirror and flees to the modern world, the four princesses Cinderella, Sleeping Beauty, Snow White and Rapunzel are sucked into the portal itself. Well-trained and gifted with magical powers, the four women must battle Rumple and his army before all of humanity is enslaved.

title: Crystal Skulls
actors: Richard Burgi, Wendy Glenn, Sam Redford, David Rintoul, J.R. Esposito, Matt Rippy, Hugh Fraser, Velislav Pavlov, Hristo Mitzkov, Terry Randall
description: Year 2020, the apocalypse is almost inevitable. Twelve of the thirteen crystal skulls were put together by a millionaire philanthropist causing catastrophic events. Only the thirteenth skull can theoretically restore order before the Earth is destroyed. It will be up to a team led by a professor, whose father has disappeared in search of the last skull, to try the impossible.

title: Gutshot Straight
actors: George Eads, AnnaLynne McCord, Steven Seagal, Ted Levine, Vinnie Jones, Stephen Lang, Tia Carrere, Fiona Dourif, Elsie Fisher, John Lewis
description: A professional poker player named Jack, in a moment of little luck, makes a deal with Duffy, a rich and underworld man from Las Vegas, to make some quick cash and pay off his debts. But when the deal turns into something dangerous, Jack must learn to be smarter than his enemies in order to move forward and protect his family by asking a loan shark for help.

title: The Boy
actors: Lauren Cohan, Rupert Evans, Ben Robson, Diana Hardcastle, Jim Norton, Jett Klyne, James Russell
description: Greta is a young American who is hired as a nanny in a remote English village before discovering that she must actually take care of a life-size doll that her parents treat like an eight-year-old, having lost their real son. Violating a list of strict rules, Greta finds herself the protagonist of disturbing and inexplicable events that lead her to believe that the doll is actually alive.

title: Cat Run
actors: Paz Vega, Janet McTeer, Alphonso McAuley, Scott Mechlowicz, Christopher McDonald, Karel Roden, D.L. Hughley, Tony Curran, Michelle Lombardo, Radik Golovkov
description: Catalina "Cat" Rona is a luxury call girl who after a bad orgy with a prominent politician escapes with her hard drive full of scandalous information. She meets Julian Simms and Anthony Hester, two clumsy young detectives who become her unlikely protectors and must help her not die at the hands of Helen Bingham, a government-hired killer.

title: Rings
actors: Matilda Anna Ingrid Lutz, Alex Roe, Johnny Galecki, Aimee Teegarden, Bonnie Morgan, Zach Roerig, Vincent D'Onofrio, Daveigh Chase, Laura Wiggins, Surely Alvelo, Andrea Powell, Brandon Larracuente, NM Garcia
description: Professor Gabriel (Johnny Galecki) finds himself helping a boy and a girl, Holt (Alex Roe) and Julia (Matilda Lutz), "cursed" by the famous video of Samara, which is said to kill the viewer after seven days. They will discover that there is a "movie within a movie" that no one has ever seen before

title: VANish
actors: Maiara Walsh, Tony Todd, Danny Trejo, Austin Abke, Bryan Bockbrader, Adam Guthrie, Denise Dorado, Hope Diaz, Angela Robitaille, Joe Davis
description: Three thugs kidnap Emma from the home of her father, drug kingpin Carlos Rodriguez, in hopes of extorting a lot of money from him as a ransom to get her daughter back. What they could not know is that the girl is not entirely foreign to her father's criminal activity, but she shares his brutal violence and the ability to leave behind a sea of ??blood.

title: Disaster L.A.
actors: Justin Ray, Jerod Meagher, Stefanie Estes, Ron Hanks, Michael Taber, Dennis Leech, Tansy Alexander, Garrett Bales, Tasha Dixon, Francisco Froes, Jeff Locker, Kendall Mayhew
description: A meteor shower hits Los Angeles. Toxic smoke released throughout the city causes an epidemic that pushes people to become zombies, manifesting major physical changes and violent behavior. A handful of survivors attempt to leave the affected area and head for the coast.

title: Terrordactyl
actors: Jason Tobias, Candice Nunes, Christopher John Jennings, Bianca Haase, Victoria Summer, David Landry, Aubrey Wakeling, Jack E. Curenton, Adam Key, Kevin Keator
description: A meteor shower hits Los Angeles. Jonas and Lars, two friends bored with their lives, hope to recover a meteor and become rich. After recovering one, they begin to be chased by a prehistoric flying reptile that has taken the city by storm. Trying to survive, the two unlikely heroes join their paths with sexy bartender Candice, her oppressive roommate Valerie and drunken ex-marine Sampson, for a battle against a force of nature to be extinguished once again.

title: Star Trek Beyond
actors: Chris Pine, Anton Yelchin, Zachary Quinto, Karl Urban, Zoë Saldana, John Cho, Simon Pegg, Sofia Boutella, Idris Elba, Deep Roy
description: The crew of the Enterprise explores the farthest corners of unknown space, where a mysterious new enemy awaits them, putting them and everything the Federation stands for. The loss of the Enterprise will force everyone to try to survive the dangers of the alien planet Altamid.

title: Close Range
actors: Scott Adkins, Nick Chinlund, Caitlin Keats, Jake La Botz, Tony Perez, Madison Lawlor, Julien Cesario, Jimmy Chhiu, Ray Diaz, Robert Dill
description: After rescuing his kidnapped niece from a powerful drug cartel, Colton MacReady begins a relentless fight to save his family. The men of the cartel have in fact arrived in his secluded ranch in search of revenge, protected by corrupt authorities who guarantee the delay of aid

title: Arrival
actors: Amy Adams, Jeremy Renner, Forest Whitaker, Michael Stuhlbarg, Mark O'Brien, Tzi Ma, Russell Yuen, Joe Cobden, Julia Scarlett Dan, Nathaly Thibault
description: Some alien spacecraft land around the world. Expert linguist Dr. Louise Banks (Amy Adams) is recruited by the military to find out whether extraterrestrials have peaceful intentions or not.

title: Hidden
actors: Alexander Skarsgård, Andrea Riseborough, Emily Alyn Lind, Heather Doerksen, David Lewis, William Ainscough, Steven Elliot
description: For 301 days, or since a terrible epidemic began to spread, Ray, Clare and their daughter Zoe have been hiding in a fallout shelter. Someone or something out there is chasing him.

title: Antibirth
actors: Natasha Lyonne, Chloë Sevigny, Meg Tilly, Mark Webber, Maxwell McCabe-Lokos, Emmanuel Kabongo, Neville Edwards
description: In a desolate community filled with drugged Marines and agitated by rumors of kidnapping of children, a dazed named Lou wakes up after a crazy night of partying with symptoms of a strange disease and recurring visions. As he fights to keep his grip on reality, rumors of a conspiracy spread.

title: Carnage Park
actors: Darby Stanchfield, Alan Ruck, Larry Fessenden, Ashley Bell, Pat Healy, James Landry Hébert, Bob Bancroft, Michael Villar, Graham Skipper, Andy Greene
description: 1978. A team of would-be scammers carries out a botched bank robbery and escapes, taking a hostage with them into the vastness of the Californian desert. Here, the group will soon find themselves at the center of a harrowing struggle for survival against a psychotic ex-military sniper.

title: The Greasy Strangler
actors: Michael St. Michaels, Sky Elobar, Elizabeth De Razzo, Gil Gex, Abdoulaye NGom, Holland MacFallister, Sam Dissanayake, Jesse Keen, Joe David Walters, John Yuan
description: Big Ronnie and his son Brayden meet Janet, a lonely tourist, on the way of her father's disco walking tour, between the two a fight is unleashed for the conquest of the young woman's heart, which is also interested in the notorious strangler who infests the area of night.

title: Outlaws and Angels
actors: Chad Michael Murray, Francesca Eastwood, Luke Wilson, Ben Browder, Teri Polo, Frances Fisher, Steven Michael Quezada, Madisen Beaty, Luce Rains, Keith Loneker
description: With a renowned bounty hunter on their trail, a gang of gory outlaws invade the home of an innocent frontier family. Thus develops an unexpected game of cat and mouse that will go on for a whole night, during which seduction and reversal of roles will give rise to a bloody revenge.

title: Yoga Hosers
actors: Lily-Rose Depp, Harley Quinn Smith, Johnny Depp, Justin Long, Austin Butler, Tyler Posey, Haley Joel Osment, Genesis Rodriguez, Natasha Lyonne, Kevin Smith, Adam Brody, Stan Lee
description: Colleen Collette and Colleen McKenzie are two teenage Winnipeg friends who like to practice yoga and spend a lot of time on their smartphones. Invited to an important party by the most famous girl in high school, the two students accidentally discover an ancient evil long buried right in their grocery store.

title: Jason Bourne
actors: Matt Damon, Julia Stiles, Tommy Lee Jones, Alicia Vikander, Vincent Cassel, Riz Ahmed, Ato Essandoh, Vinzenz Kiefer
description: Jason Bourne, the deadliest former CIA agent, is forced out of the shadows. After clarifying his origins and his identity, Bourne has experienced a semblance of peace making him lose track but the activation of a new manipulation program by an international network more powerful than any single government pushes him to return in action.

title: John Wick 2
actors: Keanu Reeves, Ruby Rose, Ian McShane, John Leguizamo, Laurence Fishburne, Riccardo Scamarcio, Common, Peter Stormare, Franco Nero, Lance Reddick, Bridget Moynahan, Claudia Gerini
description: Legendary killer John Wick is forced back into action by a former partner who plots to take control of an international guild of ruthless killers. Bound by a blood oath, John goes to Rome to help him, where he will have to contend with some of the deadliest criminals in the world.

title: Spectral
actors: Emily Mortimer, Max Martini, James Badge Dale, Bruce Greenwood, Ryan Robbins, Clayne Crawford, Cory Hardrict, Jimmy Akingbola, Ursula Parker, Gonzalo Menendez
description: A special team of operatives is sent to fight against supernatural beings who have taken possession of a city.

title: Kickboxer: Vengeance
actors: Dave Bautista, Gina Carano, Jean-Claude Van Damme, Sara Malakul Lane, Darren Shahlavi, Sue-Lynn Ansari, Alain Moussi, Georges St-Pierre, Justin Lebrun, Luis Da Silva Jr.
description: Eric and Kurt Sloane are descendants of a well-known martial arts family. Always in the shadow of his older brother Eric, Kurt has not shown that he has the instinct to become a champion. Despite Kurt's worries, Eric accepts an advantageous offer and leaves for Thailand in order to challenge champion Tong Po. The encounter, however, has fatal consequences and Kurt develops a desire for revenge, seeking the teachings of Durand, the mentor. of his brother.

title: CHiPs
actors: Dax Shepard, Michael Peña, Kristen Bell, Rosa Salazar, Adam Brody, Jessica McNamee, Ryan Hansen, David Koechner, Michael K. Williams, Vincent D'Onofrio
description: Jon Baker and Frank "Ponch" Poncharello just joined the California Highway Patrol in Los Angeles for very different reasons. Baker is a professional biker who is trying to put his life and marriage in order. Poncherello, on the other hand, is an arrogant undercover federal agent investigating a multimillion-dollar robbery. Forced to team up on the street aboard their bikes, they will soon form a formidable team.

title: Teen Wolf
actors: Tyler Posey, Dylan O'Brien, Linden Ashby, Holland Roden, Tyler Hoechlin, Melissa Ponzio, Crystal Reed, JR Bourne, Ryan Kelley, Arden Cho, Meagan Tandy, Samantha Logan
description: Scott and Stiles are two teenagers from Beacon Hills, best friends. Scott is a shy and awkward boy, while Stiles, clumsy and messy, is the son of the town sheriff. One night half a girl's body is found in the woods and Stiles calls his friend to look for the other half without being seen by the police. Unfortunately, shortly after entering the forest, Stiles is crossed by his father while Scott manages to avoid being seen by hiding behind a tree. Left alone in the woods, Scott risks being hit by a herd of frightened deer and, avoiding it, finds the missing part of the girl's body. In fright he falls into a ditch. Getting up he is attacked and bitten by a giant wolf. He manages to save himself, but the next morning something in him has changed.

title: Hell Bent
actors: Harry Carey, Neva Gerber, Joe Harris, Duke R. Lee, Vester Pegg
description: Cheyenne Harry (Harry Carey) arrives in the town of Rawhide where he meets young Bett (Neva Gerber) who works in the saloon to support her sick elderly mother. Beau Ross (Joe Harris) is the leader of a gang of outlaws operating in the region who, infatuated with Bett, will not hesitate to kidnap her.

title: Bucking Broadway
actors: Harry Carey, Molly Malone, L.M. Wells, Vester Pegg, William Steele
description: Cheyenne cowboy Harry (Harry Carey) is deeply in love with Helen (Molly Malone), the daughter of the owner of the ranch where he works. When she runs away with a wealthy city man, Cheyenne vows not to rest until he finds her.

title: Swiss Army Man
actors: Daniel Radcliffe, Mary Elizabeth Winstead, Paul Dano, Timothy Eulich, Richard Gross, Marika Casteel, Aaron Marshall, Antonia Ribero
description: Hank, a hopeless man lost in the wilderness, discovers a mysterious corpse, with which he embarks on an epic journey home. Realizing that the body is the key to his survival, Hank as a former suicide wannabe forces himself into a surreal operation: to convince the dead body of how life is worth living.

title: Dog Eat Dog
actors: Nicolas Cage, Willem Dafoe, Paul Schrader, Reynaldo Gallegos, Kayla Perkins, Chelsea Mee, Magi Avila, Omar J. Dorsey, Christopher Matthew Cook, Melissa Bolona
description: Three men, released from prison, have the duty to readjust themselves to civil life. California law hangs over them but the three have every intention not to be overwhelmed. Troy, a lonely mind, seeks a clean path but cannot get rid of his hatred for the system. Diesel is on the crime payroll, and his interest in his wife and suburban home is in sharp decline. Mad Dog, finally, is the loose cannon of the trio: prey to his own inner demons, he lets himself be carried away from one situation to another. All three would take one last blow to settle down: a perfect crime that Troy's mind doesn't struggle to process.

title: Sinners and Saints
actors: Johnny Strong, Kevin Phillips, Costas Mandylor, Sean Patrick Flanery, Tom Berenger, Method Man, Kim Coates, Bas Rutten, Louis Mandylor, Jürgen Prochnow
description: Detective Sean Riley lives and works in New Orleans, besieged by guilt over the death of his son and his failed marriage. At work he faces a probable suspension. Together with young detective Will Ganz he tries to solve a series of brutal murders that have catapulted the city into a gang war. The two soon realize that something much bigger and more sinister than they had imagined is happening.

title: The Legend of Tarzan
actors: Margot Robbie, Alexander Skarsgård, Christoph Waltz, Samuel L. Jackson, Djimon Hounsou, Jim Broadbent, Casper Crump, Ella Purnell, Simon Russell Beale, Lasco Atkins
description: Tarzan left the African jungle for several years to lead a normal bourgeois life like John Clayton III with his wife Jane. Invited to Congo as an emissary of Parliament, he does not know that he is just a pawn in the hands of Captain Leon Rom, a man thirsty for revenge. But no one has any idea what the Roma plot is about to unleash.

title: Dark Night
actors: Robert Jumper, Anna Rose, Rosie Rodriguez, Karina Macias, Aaron Purvis, Eddie Cacciola, Ciara Hampton
description: A suburban landscape is an inevitable witness to the events that culminate in a massacre in a cineplex. Over the course of a single day, from sunrise until midnight, six strangers - including the sniper - share their American nightmare.

title: Sleight
actors: Dule Hill, Seychelle Gabriel, Lyndsi LaRose, Jacob Latimore, Sasheer Zamata, Brandon Johnson, Cameron Esposito, Michael Villar, Storm Reid, Carrie Jo Hubrich
description: A young street wizard is forced to take care of his little sister after his mother goes missing. He turns to the world of drug dealing to make money but soon finds himself in trouble with his supplier. When his sister is kidnapped, he must rely on his intelligence and sleight of hand to save her.

title: Wildlike
actors: Ella Purnell, Ann Dowd, Bruce Greenwood, Nolan Gerard Funk, Brian Geraghty, Diane Farr, Joshua Leonard, Russell Josh Peterson, Skadi, Erin Lindsay King
description: Nackenzie (Ella Purnell) is a 14-year-old girl who, following the death of her father and hospitalization of her mother, is sent to stay with her uncle (Brian Geraghty) in Juneau, Alaska. After being molested by her uncle, she runs away from home: she will embark on an adventure with a kind of tramp (Bruce Greenwood), an elderly man and widower, through the wilderness of Alaska.

title: Jarhead 3: The Siege
actors: Charlie Weber, Scott Adkins, Tom Ainsley, Erik Valdez, Dante Basco, Sasha Jackson, Dennis Haysbert, Stephen Hogan, Joe Corrigall, Hadrian Howard
description: Evan Albright has joined the Marine Security Corps to save the world and actively participate in actions and missions. His first assignment is to secure a US embassy in a seemingly safe Middle Eastern location. While they allow themselves to be distracted by something else, Albright and his team are taken by surprise when armed and well-trained militants attack the embassy to kill an informant. They will then have to bring out the courage and weapons to face an unexpected enemy in a war gear.

title: The Demented
actors: Kayla Ewell, Richard Kohnke, Ashlee Brian, Brittney Alger, Sarah Butler, Michael Welch, Chris Ashworth, Jesse Brooks, Ashleigh Dejon, Kerry Kelly Gridley
description: Taylor and boyfriend David with friends Brice and Naomi travel to spend a couple of days at the home of Howard, friend Sharley's boyfriend. The next day, they see a missile exploding near the house and soon discover that the United States is under biological terrorist attack. They also realize that the other locals have been turned into some kind of zombie, which they must be able to survive.

title: Code of Honor
actors: Steven Seagal, Craig Sheffer, Helena Mattsson, Louis Mandylor, James Russo, Erin O'Brien, Griff Furst, Wren Barnes, Erik Aude, Marilee Crockett
description: Colonel Robert Sikes, who has returned from the Middle East, has only one goal: to free his city from crime. Until his mission is completed, he will clash with street gangs, mobsters and corrupt politicians, punishing everyone. His former protégé William Porter, however, teams up with the police department to bring him to justice and prevent him from continuing with his execution as an executioner.

title: The Lost City of Z
actors: Charlie Hunnam, Tom Holland, Sienna Miller, Robert Pattinson, Angus MacFadyen, Edward Ashley, Bobby Smalldridge, Nicholas Agnew, Siennah Buck, Richard Buick
description: In 1906, during an expedition to the Amazon, the explorer Percy Fawcett found something that instilled in him the idea of ??an ancient lost civilization. While the English scientific community is perplexed about his conviction, Percy with the support of his wife Nina sets out on a second journey, destined to end in nothing. Only years later, at the urging of his eldest son Jack, will he undertake a third expedition in the jungle.

title: April Rain
actors: Luke Goss, Ryan Guzman, Andrew Keegan, Ming-Na Wen, Doug Savant, Vincent Spano, Ally Walker, Miranda Frigon
description: When an eclectic group of terrorists plots to attack the United States from the inside, it's up to a special paramilitary investigation unit to identify the criminals, infiltrate them, and neutralize the threat.

title: Geostorm
actors: Gerard Butler, Jim Sturgess, Abbie Cornish, Andy Garcia, Ed Harris, Alexandra Maria Lara, Zazie Beetz, Amr Waked, Adepero Oduye, Robert Sheehan, Daniel Wu, Talitha Bateman
description: In the near future, Jake Lawson, the creator of a particular satellite system capable of monitoring weather conditions, is forced to work alongside his not-so-beloved brother Max. Their aim is to figure out what's wrong with the system. , escaped all control, and avoid an unprecedented catastrophe.

title: Don't Breathe
actors: Jane Levy, Dylan Minnette, Stephen Lang, Daniel Zovatto, Sergej Onopko, Jane May Graves, Jon Donahue, Brak Little, Katia Bokor, Emma Bercovici
description: Three boys break into a blind man's home to commit a crime. Considering the conditions of the landlord, the young people are convinced that it will be a walk, but things will not go as planned.

title: The Veil
actors: Jessica Alba, Thomas Jane, Lily Rabe, Shannon Woodward, Reid Scott, Aleksa Palladino, Ivy George, Jack De Sena, Chelsea Grant, Meegan Warner
description: A charismatic leader in the 1980s led his followers to the largest mass suicide in US history. Only a little girl was saved, who twenty-five years later decides to return to the places of the carnage in the company of a director and her crew in search of answers on that fateful day. In this way supernatural mysteries will come to light that will change everyone's lives.

title: Passengers
actors: Jennifer Lawrence, Chris Pratt, Michael Sheen, Laurence Fishburne, Inder Kumar, Jamie Soricelli, Vince Foster, Robert Larriviere, Barbara Jones
description: A spacecraft carrying thousands of people traveling to a distant planet that serves as a colony is struck by a malfunction in one of its sleep chambers. As a result, Jim and Aurora awaken ninety years ahead of schedule. While living their existence aboard the vehicle, the two fall in love and are unable to deny the attraction that binds them until they discover that the spacecraft is in grave danger. With the lives of over 5,000 passengers at stake, Jim and Aurora must work to save everyone.

title: The Space Between Us
actors: Britt Robertson, Carla Gugino, Gary Oldman, Asa Butterfield, Janet Montgomery, BD Wong, Sarah Minnich, Lora Martinez-Cunningham, Jenny Gabrielle, Bernardo P. Saracino
description: A spaceship leaves for the first mission to colonize Mars. After take-off, however, it turns out that an astronaut is pregnant. The woman, shortly after landing, dies from the complications of childbirth which gives birth to the first human being born on the red planet, without ever revealing the name of her father. Thus began the extraordinary life of Gardner Elliot, destined to become a very intelligent and curious boy. 16 years later, Gardner has only met 14 people in his life and received an unconventional upbringing when, while researching who his father is and on Earth, whom he has never seen, he forms an online friendship with a teenager. of Colorado named Tulsa. And when he gets the chance to go to Earth, he gets the desire to experience all the wonders he has only read about before discovering, once his explorations have begun, that his body cannot withstand the Earth's atmosphere. Determined to find his father, Gardner runs away and, in the company of Tulsa, will begin a race against time to unravel the mysteries of his existence.

title: Mercury Plains
actors: Scott Eastwood, Angela Sarafyan, Justin Arnold, Nick Chinlund, Andy Garcia, Margaret Ann Garza, Mike Gassaway, Joe Gonzales, Brinlee Grace, Mark Hanson
description: A troubled young man flees to Mexico, where he is recruited into a paramilitary group of teenagers who fight drug cartels. Isolated in the desert, he is tested to become the Captain's main soldier but begins to wonder what the real purpose of the group is. As the Mexican police approach, he will realize that his only way out is to escape to America but he will have to outsmart the Captain first.

title: Colt .45
actors: Randolph Scott, Ruth Roman, Zachary Scott, Lloyd Bridges, Alan Hale, Ian MacDonald, Chief Thundercloud
description: Two of the new Colt. 45 gunslinger Steve Farrell is stolen by the ruthless killer Jason Brett. Farrell vows to retrieve them when Brett and his men leave a long trail of robberies and murders behind.

title: Operator
actors: Ving Rhames, Luke Goss, Mischa Barton, Michael Paré, Riley Bundick, Tony Demil, Maurice Chevalier (II), Walter Hendrix III, Wendell Kinney, Summer Perkins
description: The daughter of a 911 operator and a policeman - an estranged husband - is kidnapped. They will be forced to send police and fire brigade units to remote locations under the orders of the kidnappers.

title: Gunsmoke in Tucson
actors: Mark Stevens, Forrest Tucker, Gale Robbins, Vaughn Taylor, John Ward, Kevin Hagen, William Henry, Richard Reeves, John Cliff, Gail Kobe
description: In late 19th century Arizona, brothers John and Chip helplessly watched the execution of their father, who was considered a horse thief by a gang of ranchers. Years later, Chid became an outlaw while his brother John a sheriff. Trying to go straight, Chip will soon find himself in trouble again.

title: The Ouija Experiment
actors: Justin Armstrong, Dave Clark, Leah Diaz, Belmarie Huynh, Miranda Martinez, Swisyzinna, Taylor Terry, Carson Underwood, Eric Window
description: Five boys get together to play with the famous Ouija board. The consequences of their carelessness and their mutual grudges will be dire.

title: I Am Wrath
actors: John Travolta, Amanda Schull, Rebecca De Mornay, Christopher Meloni, Sam Trammell, David Hutchison, Patrick St. Esprit, Luis Da Silva Jr., Doris Morgado, Melissa Bolona
description: Unemployed engineer, Stanley Hill witnesses the murder of his wife Vivian in a parking lot. Devastated by guilt, Stanley is obsessed with the image of Vivian dying in his arms and, when Detective Gibson and the other corrupt cops show themselves unable and disinterested in granting him justice, he turns to old friend Dennis, deciding to take the situation in hand. This quickly brings to light the hidden past the two friends share, proving to be far more dangerous than anyone imagined.

title: Eliminators
actors: Scott Adkins, Wade Barrett, Stu Bennett, Daniel Caltagirone, James Cosmo, Mem Ferda, Ty Glaser, Olivia Mace, Sean Cronin, Stephen Marcus, Akie Kotabe
