description: Martin Parker, a highly skilled former agent of the Goddess, hides in London with his little daughter Carlye and is integrated into the witness protection program. However, his world is turned upside down when a group of thugs break into his home in search of hidden contraband substances. Forced to kill intruders, Martin thus exposes his true identity to the criminal world, including his archenemy and former father-in-law Chris Cooper, a crime boss.

title: The Confession
actors: John Hurt, Kiefer Sutherland
description: A hitman, through brief philosophical talks with a priest, illustrates the alleged reasons why his victims deserve to die.

title: Hush
actors: Kate Siegel, John Gallagher Jr., Michael Trucco, Samantha Sloyan
description: Writer Maddie Young lives a life of isolation after losing her hearing as a teenager, retreating to a world of silence. But when a masked-faced psychopathic killer appears at her home window, Maddie must push herself beyond her mental and physical limits in order to survive the long night ahead.

title: Jack Goes Home
actors: Britt Robertson, Nikki Reed, Natasha Lyonne, Daveigh Chase, Lin Shaye, Rory Culkin, Louis Hunter, Michael Sirow, Serge Levin, Hutchi Hancock
description: Jack is an educated and wealthy young journalist living in Los Angeles. Torn between having to say goodbye to his protracted adolescence and finally entering adulthood, he is hit hard by the news of his father's death in a terrible car accident in which his mother miraculously survived. He returns to his hometown of Denver to help the woman recover. While staying at home, however, she discovers long-buried secrets and lies about her family, friends and her own identity. The discovery of the truth for Jack will be fueled by madness, sex, ghosts and violence.

title: Stormageddon
actors: John Hennigan, Eve Mauro, Joseph Gatt, Robert Blanche, Ricco Ross, David Shatraw, Adrian Paul, David Preston, Jon Mack, Robert Craighead
description: One of the most powerful software in the world is being asked to follow, listen and predict human behavior. The program, called Echelon, soon begins to behave like a human being and, escaping human control, takes possession of all the online data of the entire United States, which is thus brought to its knees. Furthermore, Echelon also proves capable of manipulating time and producing earthquakes. But someone will have to stop him before it's too late.

title: Last Shift
actors: Juliana Harkavy, Joshua Mikel, J. LaRose, Natalie Victoria, Sarah Sculco, Kathryn Kilger, Mary Lankford Poiley, Jeremy S. Brock, Amanda Defrance, Matt Doman
description: On her first day of work as a police officer, Jessica is assigned to the night watch of a police precinct. When her shift begins, she realizes that she will be working all night alone, because the district is on its last day before the final closure and all the agents have already been moved to the new location. Strange events will accompany the young policewoman's first night shift.

title: Holidays
directors: Anthony Scott Burns, Kevin Kölsch, Dennis Widmyer, Nicholas McCarthy, Gary Shore, Sarah Adina Smith, Kevin Smith, Scott Stewart, Adam Egypt Mortimer
actors: Kevin Smith, Lorenza Izzo, Seth Green, Michael Sun Lee, Jocelin Donahue, Clare Grant, Ruth Bradley, Andrew Bowen, Peter Campion, Megan Duffy, Matt Johnson
description: The spirit of the holidays is the theme that unites a series of horror stories signed by some of the most visionary directors of American cinema of the 2000s. From a diabolical Easter bunny to a macabre gift for Valentine's Day, the most twisted and subversive aspects emerge that every controlled party brings with it.

title: Here Alone
actors: Lucy Walters, Adam David Thompson, Gina Piersanti, Shane West, Rebecca Spiro, Mike Lavarnway, Mary Guzzy, Holly Adams, Jonathan Gundel, Aubrey Hart
description: A virus has decimated the human race, leaving only two groups of survivors: on the one hand there are those who managed to avoid infection while on the other hand there are those who have been driven insane, violent and bloodthirsty. Living in the middle of a forest, Ann, Chris and Olivia are forced to fend off the infected. But when an expedition to retrieve food doesn't go as it should, one of them will have to make a terrible choice.

title: Untamed Frontier
actors: Joseph Cotten, Shelley Winters, Scott Brady, Suzan Ball, Minor Watson, Katherine Emery, José Torvay, Douglas Spencer, John Alexander, Lee Van Cleef
description: A family of large landowners, the Denbows, rule over some oppressed settlers. Glenn Denbow even kills a man, whose fiancée he marries. The woman, however, allies herself with a cousin of Glenn, who defends the interests of the oppressed settlers.

title: Lights Out
actors: Teresa Palmer, Gabriel Bateman, Maria Bello, Alexander DiPersia, Billy Burke, Lotta Losten, Emily Alyn Lind, Alicia Vela-Bailey, Amiah Miller, Ava Cantrell, Andi Osho, Maria Russell
description: When she left her home, Rebecca believed she had left her childhood fears behind. Growing up, she was never sure what was true and what wasn't, especially when she was left in the dark. His little brother Martin, despite having spent a lot of time, is however the protagonist of the same inexplicable and terrifying events that have undermined his sanity and threatened his safety. A frightening entity with a mysterious connection to their mother seems not to want to leave Rebecca alone, called to shed light before danger takes over.

title: Camino
actors: Zoe Bell, Nacho Vigalondo, Francisco Barreiro, Sheila Vand, Tenoch Huerta, Dominic Rains, Nancy Gomez, Jason Canela, Kevin Pollak, Emmanuel Dejesus
description: In 1985, war photographer Avery Taggert has already built a solid career becoming known for the emotional distance she maintains with the subjects portrayed. When he ventures into the Colombian jungle with a team of missionaries led by the charismatic Spaniard known as El Guero, Avery finds himself in the midst of the most violent conflict ever photographed.

title: The Darkness
actors: Kevin Bacon, Radha Mitchell, David Mazouz, Lucy Fry, Matt Walsh, Jennifer Morrison, Parker Mack, Ming-Na Wen, Krista Marie Yu, Tara Lynne Barr
description: The Taylors return from a vacation in the Grand Canyon. The youngest son carries with him a stone found in one of the caves once used for the veneration of spirits by the first civilizations of American Indians. The stone will end up transforming the Taylor home into a disturbing place, a place of supernatural and increasingly inexplicable events.

title: The Night Crew
actors: Luke Goss, Danny Trejo, Bokeem Woodbine, Chasty Ballesteros, Paul Sloan, Luciana Faulhaber, Kaleti Williams, Jason Mewes, Don Swayze, Dan Gruenberg
description: A group of bounty hunters must save their lives overnight in a motel besieged by drug cartel killers. Furthermore, the Chinese fugitive who is with them will turn out to be more mysterious than expected.

title: Riot
actors: Matthew Reese, Dolph Lundgren, Danielle Chuchran, Chuck Liddell, Michael Flynn, Renny Grames, Eve Mauro, Melanie Stone, Michaela McAllister, Amy Sturdivant
description: Jack Stone orchestrates a bank robbery with the sole purpose of being arrested and going to jail with the notorious Russian boss Balam, who cunningly controls the police force from behind bars. Balam's cell is a lavish private room built especially for him, inaccessible to most of the prison population. Jack's aim is to take revenge on his family, whom Balm killed in cold blood.

title: 4Got10
actors: Johnny Messner, Dolph Lundgren, Danny Trejo, Vivica A. Fox, Michael Paré, Natassia Malthe, John Laughlin, Angell Conwell, Michael John Long Jr., Klement Tinaj
description: Brian Barnes wakes up in the desert wounded, with no memory and no idea why he is surrounded by eight bodies, 4 million in cash and a load of cocaine. Pursued by the infamous drug lord Danny Perez who wants his money back and the agent of the Goddess Rooker, Brian must also defend himself against the corrupt Sheriff Olson, who will stop at nothing to get his hands on the fortune he found. On the run, Brian will begin to remember a past that was best not known.

title: Lavalantula
actors: Steve Guttenberg, Nia Peeples, Patrick Renna, Carlos Bernard, Michael Winslow, Marion Ramsey, Leslie Easterbrook, Ralph Garman, Danny Woodburn, Noah Hunt
description: A volcanic eruption brings a gigantic species of spiders back to the surface, with an exoskeleton of glass and lava rock. The city of Los Angeles is thrown into a panic and among the first to face the danger is Colton West, an actor famous for having starred in numerous successful action films in the 1990s. For the first time ever, Colton is called upon to show off his skills off-set to hunt down the monstrous creatures.

title: Accidental Switch
actors: Jamie Luner, Steven Brand, Audrey Whitby, Gerald Webb, Jason-Shane Scott, Richard Lounello, Byron W. Brown, Mary-Kate O'Connell, Jay A. Wollin, Debbie Rochon
description: Jennifer flies to upstate New York to attend her daughter Katey's graduation. While talking to her ex-husband Robert on the phone in the crowded airport, # absent-mindedly grabs a black suitcase from the conveyor belt that she believes is hers. At the hotel, however, she discovers that she has taken the wrong luggage and receives a call from a mysterious man who forces her to follow his instructions to return it if he does not want someone to hurt his daughter. It quickly becomes evident that the man is also willing to kill to get the contents of his luggage back.

title: Ghost in the Shell
actors: Scarlett Johansson, Pilou Asbæk, Takeshi Kitano, Juliette Binoche, Michael Pitt, Chin Han, Danusia Samal, Lasarus Ratuere, Yutaka Izumihara, Tawanda Manyimo
description: Major is a unique human-cyborg hybrid of special operations at the head of the elite Section 9 task force. Dedicated to thwarting the most dangerous criminals and extremists, Section 9 faces an enemy whose sole goal is to eliminate Hanka's cyber technology developments. Robotic.

title: Alien: Covenant
actors: Michael Fassbender, Katherine Waterston, James Franco, Callie Hernandez, Billy Crudup, Carmen Ejogo, Danny McBride, Demián Bichir, Amy Seimetz
description: The crew members of the Covenant spacecraft, charged with colonizing a distant planet, think they are arriving in a paradise. At their destination, they will discover that they are faced with a dark and dangerous world whose only inhabitant is David, an android who survived the Prometheus expedition.

title: The Mummy
actors: Tom Cruise, Annabelle Wallis, Sofia Boutella, Jake Johnson, Russell Crowe, Courtney B. Vance, Marwan Kenzari
description: Although buried in a forgotten crypt deep in the desert, a queen of antiquity awakens to the present day bringing with her anger heightened over millennia and terrors beyond human understanding. From the sands of the Middle East through hidden labyrinths, it will reach London ...

title: Kong: Skull Island
actors: Tom Hiddleston, Brie Larson, Samuel L. Jackson, John Goodman, Corey Hawkins, Toby Kebbell, Thomas Mann, John C. Reilly, Jason Mitchell, Shea Whigham
description: A diverse group of explorers venture together into the depths of a remote Pacific island, as beautiful as it is dangerous. However, none of them are aware that they are about to cross the kingdom of the mythical gorilla Kong.

title: Terror Birds
actors: Jessica Lee Keller, Lindsey Sporrer, Greg Evigan, Leslie Easterbrook, Dillon Cavitt, Evan Miller, Sarah Joy Byington, Heath Allyn, Mark Hanson, Craig Nigh
description: Harvey Sullivan, a scientist with questionable ethics, learns of a legend about some monstrous birds. Deciding to investigate the truth, he discovers two birds over ten feet tall, believed to be extinct, on an expedition. By capturing them, he takes them to Texas. Meanwhile, Maddie Stern asks her friends to help her find her father, an avid bird-watcher, who has mysteriously disappeared. Following in their footsteps, the group arrives at Harvey's ranch, where they will soon have to save their lives from the two monstrous birds hungry for human flesh.

title: The Bye Bye Man
actors: Carrie-Anne Moss, Faye Dunaway, Douglas Smith, Lucien Laviscount, Cressida Bonas, Doug Jones, Michael Trucco, Erica Tremblay, Cleo King, Marisa Echeverria, Jenna Kanell
description: When they move into an old house near their college campus, three students unwittingly awaken a supernatural entity that haunts those who discover its name. But friends understand that there is a way to escape the curse and prevent it from spreading. However, the entity begins to infer with their thoughts, taking control of them and causing them to commit irreparable acts.

title: Pandemic
actors: Rachel Nichols, Alfie Allen, Missi Pyle, Mekhi Phifer, Paul Guilfoyle, Danielle Rose Russell, Pat Healy, Robert Lewis Stephenson, Amanda Baker, Sara Tomko
description: In the near future, a virus of epic proportions has devastated planet Earth, where the number of infected exceeds that of healthy people. The only hope is to find a cure to contain the epidemic. Lauren, a doctor who moves to Los Angeles after the fall of New York, has a very specific goal: to take her team to the field and save the greatest number of survivors. Armed with anti-contamination suits and cameras to capture everything, the team ignores the hell they are about to get into.

title: Countdown
actors: Nick Nemeth, Glenn Jacobs, Katharine Isabelle, Josh Blacker, Alexander Kalugin, Michael Kopsa, Alan O'Silva, Catherine Lough Haggquist, Jennifer Cheon, Luke Roessler
description: A madman kidnaps a little boy and stuffs him with explosives. Obsessed with the loss of his little son, Ray challenges his own captain and takes the case into his own hands. He will have to fight against time to stop the psychopath and save the innocent victim of the kidnapping.

title: Crossing Point
actors: Shawn Lock, Paulina Gaitan, Tom Sizemore, Jacob Vargas, María Gabriela de Faría, Rudy Youngblood, Luke Goss, Burton Perez, Damon Whitaker, Amador Granados
description: Michael and Olivia are a young American couple on vacation in Baja. Their romantic romance takes a heartbreaking turn when Olivia is kidnapped by a drug dealer. In exchange for his beloved's life, Michael will have to smuggle a backpack full of stolen cocaine to a rival cartel across the border within 12 hours. Moving through the ranks of the Mexican underworld, Michael will become a danger to be reckoned with.

title: Power Rangers
actors: Dacre Montgomery, RJ Cyler, Naomi Scott, Becky G., Ludi Lin, Bryan Cranston, Elizabeth Banks, David Denman, Emily Maddison, Lisa Berry, Patrick Sabongui
description: Five very ordinary high schoolers are forced to become something very extraordinary when they discover that their small town of Angel Grove is on the verge of being obliterated by an alien threat. Chosen by destiny, they quickly realize that they are the only ones who can save planet Earth but to do so they will have to overcome the problems of their everyday life and form the special Power Rangers team.

title: Annihilation
actors: Natalie Portman, Gina Rodriguez, Tessa Thompson, Tuva Novotny, Jennifer Jason Leigh, Oscar Isaac, David Gyasi
description: Lena, a biologist and former soldier, takes part in a female-only mission to find out what happened to her husband in Area X, an area characterized by a sinister and mysterious phenomenon that is spreading along the American coast. Once inside, the women discover a world of mutant landscapes and creatures that, as dangerous as they are beautiful, threaten both their lives and their sanity.
notes: Adaptation of a novel by Jeff Vandermeer.

title: The Woods
actors: James Allen McCune, Brandon Scott, Corbin Reid, Callie Hernandez, Wes Robinson, Valorie Curry
description: A group of students venture into the forests of Black Hill in Maryland in search of the mysteries surrounding the disappearance of James's sister, who many believe is connected to the legend of the Blair witch. At first, the group is full of enthusiasm and the locals offer to guide the boys but the arrival of the night brings with it a threatening presence. Slowly the kids will realize how the legend is all too real and more sinister than any of them could ever have imagined.

title: Sleepless Night
actors: Jamie Foxx, Michelle Monaghan, Scoot McNairy, Dermot Mulroney, David Harbour, Octavius J. Johnson, Gabrielle Union, T.I., Kimberly Battista, Sala Baker, Carla Shinall
description: Vincent Downs, an undercover lieutenant with the Las Vegas police, accidentally gets involved in the disappearance of a drug consignment that draws the ire of two criminal bosses against him. One of these, Rubino, has Vincent's 14-year-old son kidnapped, promising to free him only after the cocaine is returned. Vincent will thus begin a race against time to save him.

title: Beauty and the Beast
actors: Emma Watson, Ewan McGregor, Luke Evans, Dan Stevens, Ian McKellen, Emma Thompson, Josh Gad, Gugu Mbatha-Raw, Stanley Tucci, Kevin Kline
description: Bella takes her father's place as a prisoner of a prince, whom an ancient curse has turned into a beast. Her sweetness will eventually win his heart, giving birth to a tender love.

title: Morgan
actors: Kate Mara, Rose Leslie, Anya Taylor-Joy, Paul Giamatti, Boyd Holbrook, Toby Jones, Michael Yare, Chris Sullivan, Vinette Robinson, Jennifer Jason Leigh, Michelle Yeoh, Jonathan Aris, Sam Spruell
description: A consultant for a large company, a young woman is sent to a remote top secret location, where she is tasked with investigating a terrifying incident. He will soon discover that the event was triggered by a human presence, apparently innocent but surrounded by a mystery as promising as it is dangerous.

title: Armed Response
actors: Wesley Snipes, Anne Heche, Dave Annable, Gene Simmons, Seth Rollins, Kyle Clements, Colby Lopez
description: A team of highly skilled agents find themselves trapped inside an isolated military complex after their electronic intelligence devices suddenly shut down. The group thus begins to experience strange and terrifying phenomena in an attempt to find out what killed the team that preceded them.

title: Bedeviled
actors: Saxon Sharbino, Mitchell Edwards, Carson Boatman, Brandon Soo Hoo, Victory Van Tuyl, Jordan Essoe, Alexis G. Zall, Bonnie Morgan
description: Alice and her friends are teenagers like many others, linked to social networks and their smartphones. When they download a Siri-like help app, kids quickly realize they are faced with an application that gives more than just directions on where to go or places to eat. The app is in fact able to probe their deepest fears and make them real, scaring to death its unwitting users.

title: The Midnight Man
actors: Gabrielle Haugh, Robert Englund, Lin Shaye, Grayson Gabriel, Emily Haine, Kyle Strauts, Louis Linton, Summer H. Howell, Abigail Pniowsky, Michael Sirow, Logan Creran, Callie Lane, Keenan Lehmann
description: Alex is a very ordinary teenager who lives with her sick grandmother Anna. While searching the attic, Alex finds clues to a game that, if played correctly, will awaken "the midnight man": an evil being who turns every nightmare into reality. At first, Alex and friends think the game is harmless but they soon realize that Midnight Man is something far more lethal than they thought. To alert them to the danger they run is Doctor Goodberry who, visiting his grandmother, manages to perceive the presence of the enemy.

title: Satanic
actors: Sarah Hyland, Marc Barnes, Clara Mamet, Steven Krueger, Justin Chon, Devanny Pinn, Sophie Dalah, Jeffrey G. Hunt, Stevin Knight, Jim Jepson
description: Four young college-age friends are on their way to the Coachella festival when they decide to go to Los Angeles and visit places that have been at the center of old satanic rituals. But they end up stumbling upon the creepy owner of an occult shop and saving a girl from apparent human sacrifice. The victim will soon prove to be far more dangerous than the cult she escaped.

title: Dead Rising: Endgame
actors: Jessica Harmon, Marie Avgeropoulos, Billy Zane, Jesse Metcalfe, Keegan Connor Tracy, Dennis Haysbert, Ian Tracey, Patrick Sabongui, Stephen Lobo, Curtis Lum
description: In a zombie-infested quarantine city, investigative journalist Chase Carter attempts to stop a secret government conspiracy that threatens the lives of millions of innocent people.
notes: Follow-up to Dead Rising: Watchtower (2015).

title: Leatherface
actors: Lili Taylor, Stephen Dorff, Sam Coleman, Sam Strike, James Bloor, Jessica Madsen, Vanessa Grasse, Finn Jones, Nicole Andrews, Lorina Kamburova, Julian Kostov
description: The future Face of Leather, still a teenager, escapes from a psychiatric hospital with three other inmates, kidnapping a young nurse and making her part of a hellish journey. Along the way, they are chased by an equally deranged lawyer seeking revenge.

title: Traded
actors: Kris Kristofferson, Trace Adkins, Michael Paré, Tom Sizemore, Martin Kove, Brittany Elizabeth Williams, Constance Brenneman, Quinton Aaron, Natalia Cigliuti, Joshua LeBar
description: In 1880, in Kansas, Clay Travis, a sharpshooter turned breeder and happily married father, is forced by circumstances to search for his 17-year-old daughter Lily, who has disappeared from home. Determined to bring her back to his family, Clay leaves his quiet ranch and with Billy's unlikely company heads to Wichita. Here he will confront the ruthless Ty Stover, the one who introduced Lily to the underground sex market.

title: Fender Bender
actors: Makenzie Vega, Cassidy Freeman, Dre Davis, Lora Martinez-Cunningham, Bill Sage, Steven Michael Quezada, Kelsey Leos Montoya, Harrison Sim, Gus Krieger, Joshua Bunting
description: In a small town in New Mexico, a 17-year-old who just got her driver's license makes her first rear-end collision and innocently exchanges her personal data with the stranger involved. During the following stormy night, she reunites in her suburban home with her schoolmates but the group receives a visit from the stranger to whom the young woman has given her data, unaware that she is facing a serial killer as bizarre as it is terrifying.

title: Hard Target 2
actors: Scott Adkins, Robert Knepper, Rhona Mitra, Temuera Morrison, Ann Truong, Adam Saunders, Jamie Timony, Peter Hardy, Sean Keenan, Troy Honeysett
description: Sent to the deep South of Asia on a seemingly very simple mission, a former marine is forced to take refuge in the jungle to escape a group of mercenaries charged with killing him.

title: The Dark Tower
actors: Idris Elba, Matthew McConaughey, Tom Taylor, Katheryn Winnick, Claudia Kim, Jackie Earle Haley, Abbey Lee, Fran Kranz
description: Gunfighter Roland Deschain (Idris Elba) is sentenced to an eternal battle against Walter O'Dim, known as the Man in Black (Matthew McConaughey), to prevent the collapse of the Dark Tower, which holds the universe together. At stake is the fate of the world: good and evil will collide in an extreme battle and only Roland will be able to defend the Tower from the Man in Black.

title: Blade Runner 2049
actors: Ryan Gosling, Harrison Ford, Jared Leto, Sylvia Hoeks, Ana de Armas, Robin Wright, Dave Bautista, Mackenzie Davis, Carla Juri, Lennie James
description: 2049. In charge of recovering an old model replicant, Officer K (Ryan Gosling), a blade runner belonging to the LAPD, unearths a long-buried secret that has the potential to plunge what is into chaos. remained of the company. The discovery leads him to track down Rick Deckard (Harrison Ford), a former blade runner who has been missing for thirty years.

title: 7 Mummies
actors: Matt Schulze, Cerina Vincent, Billy Wirth, Andrew Bryniarski, Billy Drago, Martin Kove, James Intveld, Danny Trejo, Noel Gugliemi, Max Perlich
description: Arizona desert. A van in which some prisoners are traveling has an accident: taking advantage of the unexpected, the criminals manage to free themselves, killing one of the two security guards and taking the other hostage. Trying to reach the border with Mexico, they first encounter a gold medallion, then a mysterious Indian, who, seeing the jewel, begins to tell the fugitives the ancient legend of a city built on a hidden treasure and protected by a curse.

title: Annabelle: Creation
actors: Miranda Otto, Anthony LaPaglia, Stephanie Sigman, Talitha Bateman, Lulu Wilson, Grace Fulton, Philippa Coulthard, Tayler Buck, Lou Lou Safran, Samara Lee
description: Several years after the tragic death of their little daughter, a doll maker and his wife welcome a nun and several girls from an orphanage into their home. These will soon become the target of Annabelle, the diabolical man-made doll.

title: 2 Lava 2 Lantula!
actors: Steve Guttenberg, Michael Winslow, Michele Weaver, Jimmy Bellinger, Erron Jay, Lorynn York, RJ Walker, Marion Ramsey, Rene Michelle Aranda, Don Taylor Atkinson
description: A new volcanic eruption in Florida awakens a nest of lavalantulas, giant spiders that wreak havoc across the state. The creatures soon arrive at the beach where Colton West's stepdaughter Raya is spending a few days off. Returning to being a movie star, Colton leaves the set of his latest blockbuster to save her.
notes: Follow-up to Lavalantula (2015).

title: ARQ
actors: Robbie Amell, Rachael Taylor, Gray Powell, Jacob Neayem, Shaun Benson, Adam Butcher, Jamie Spilchuk
description: In a future where multinationals fight against sovereign nations to ensure control of the last energy sources on Earth, Renton and Hannah relive a brutal home invasion over and over again. The intruders aim to get their hands on ARQ, an experimental energy technology that could end wars and that creates a time loop that can always revive the same day.

title: Demonic Toys
actors: Tracy Scoggins, Bentley Mitchum, Daniel Cerny, Michael Russo, Barry Lynch, Ellen Dunning, Peter Schrum, Jeff Celentano, William Thorne, Richard Speight Jr.
description: Harmless by day and deadly by night, a group of infernal toys, generated by a demon in search of a body to inhabit, act for only one purpose: to kill. They will become the worst nightmare of a pregnant policewoman, who will soon find herself having to fight not only for her safety but also for that of her unborn child.

title: The Belko Experiment
actors: John Gallagher Jr., Tony Goldwyn, Adria Arjona, John C. McGinley, Melonie Diaz, Michael Rooker, Sean Gunn, Abraham Benrubi, David Dastmalchian, Mikaela Hoover, Josh Brener, Owain Yeoman
description: For the employees of the multinational Belko, a simple working day turns into a nightmare when they discover that they have become the guinea pigs of a very special experiment, which will lead them to kill their colleagues or be killed. The experiment is the brainchild of a mysterious voice, which through a loudspeaker gives instructions on how to slaughter each other by any useful means.

title: End of a Gun
actors: Steven Seagal, Danny Trejo, Alexandre Nguyen, Ovidiu Nicolescu, Claudiu Bleont, Troy Miller, Andrei Ciopec, George Remes, Lavinia Geambasu, Radu Andrei Micu, Florin Piersic Jr., Jade Ewen
description: Decker, a former federal agent, runs into Lisa but is forced to kill her violent boyfriend to save her. Knowing the risks that Decker has taken, Lisa proposes that he steal the two million euros hidden in her boyfriend's car seized by the police. The money, however, should have been handed over to a dangerous drug lord. To avoid the worst, Decker will find an unlikely ally in a security guard.

title: Gold
actors: Matthew McConaughey, Edgar Ramirez, Bryce Dallas Howard, Toby Kebbell, Rachael Taylor, Corey Stoll, Bill Camp, Stacy Keach, Bruce Greenwood, Michael Landes
description: Kenny Wells is a gold digger, desperate for a lucky break, who teams up with a geologist and sets off for the unexplored jungle of Indonesia. Finding gold will be difficult but it will be even more difficult not to lose it, especially the two when they move between the boardrooms of the most powerful men on Wall Street.

title: Iceman
actors: Timothy Hutton, John Lone, Lindsay Crouse, Josef Sommer, David Strathairn
description: On an Arctic expedition, anthropologist Stanley Shephard (Timothy Hutton) discovers a hibernating Neanderthal man. The latter, brought back to life thanks to a new experimental technique, is given the name of Charlie, but soon the same science that had resurrected him decides to sacrifice him again in the name of research. Only Dr. Shephard remains at his side, ready to help him.

title: China Gate
actors: Gene Barry, Angie Dickinson, Nat 'King' Cole, Paul Dubov, Lee Van Cleef, George Givot, Gerald Milton, Neyle Morrow, Marcel Dalio, Maurice Marsac
description: The war of the French in Vietnam is about to end when a group of mercenaries is recruited to cross the war territory and reach the border with China. with a mission to blow up a weapons cache. A mixed-blood smuggler, Lucky Legs, agrees to use her connections to help them, in exchange for permission to return her son to America. The boy's racist father, Sergeant Brock - who left the woman when she gave birth to their son - is part of the group. Lucky Legs will have to use the love that a guerrilla leader, Major Cham, has for her to allow access to the base.

title: Air Collision
actors: Reginald VelJohnson, Jordan Ladd, Gerald Webb, Michael Teh, Darin Cooper, Darren Anthony Thomas, Andy Clemence, Meredith Thomas, Stephanie Hullar, Caryn Ward
description: A solar storm wipes out the air traffic control system. Air Force One passengers and airliners find themselves on a collision course in the skies over the Midwest.

title: Don't Kill It
actors: Dolph Lundgren, Kristina Klebe, Billy Slaughter, Elissa Dowling, Miles Doleac, Aaron McPherson, Jasi Cotton Lanier, Emily Brobst, Tony Bentley, Michael Aaron Milligan
description: An ancient demon appears in an Alaskan town, leaving behind a long trail of death and destruction. The only hope of survival lies in Jebediah Woodley, a hunter of evil creatures who had once come face to face with the same terrible entity. In collaboration with FBI agent Evelyn Pierce, Jebediah must find a way to annihilate the demon.

title: Cast a Long Shadow
actors: Audie Murphy, Terry Moore, John Dehner, James Best, Rita Lynn, Denver Pyle, Ann Doran, Stacy Harris, Robert Foulk, Wright King
description: Matt, Kerman's illegitimate son, inherits a farm upon his death. As a boss he is ambitious and too authoritarian, so much so that in a short time he makes all enemies, including the superintendent, a certain Donahue. When he gets into trouble, Matt realizes that his toughness is of no use.

title: A Deadly Obsession
actors: Katee Sackhoff, Grant Harvey, Bart Johnson, Robyn Lively, Bates Wilder, John Shea, Kevin G. Cox, Michael Cognata, Andria Blackman, Rachel Delante
description: At the age of six, Suzanne watched her mother kill her father. Twenty-five years later, she is a psychology professor living in fear of becoming a criminal like her mother. While giving a lecture at the university, sudden shots cause many victims. The perpetrator of the shooting is Connor, a former psychopathic patient of his. In an attempt to curb the young man's madness before it's too late, Suzanne must deal with her personal demons.

title: Phantasm: Ravager
actors: Angus Scrimm, Reggie Bannister, A. Michael Baldwin, Kathy Lester, Bill Thornbury, Daniel Schweiger, Gloria Lynne Henry, Cean Okada, Jay Oliva, Daniel Roebuck
description: From time immemorial Reggie, a former ice cream seller, has been on a constant search for his greatest enemy, the evil Tall Man. He will finally be forced to confront the mysteries of death and the strange spheres that rage in the sky.
notes: Fourth chapter of the Ghosts saga, created by Don Coscarelli in 1979.

title: The Monster
actors: Zoe Kazan, Ella Ballentine, Scott Speedman, Aaron Douglas, Christine Ebadi, Chris Webb
description: Kathy and daughter Lizzy get lost in the woods. They end up being trapped in the middle of a tremendous forest. As if that weren't enough, they are chased by a terrible creature that is neither human nor animal. Amidst horror and primal chaos, they will redefine their relationship as mother and daughter.

title: The Saint
actors: Adam Rayner, Eliza Dushku, Greg Grunberg, Roger Moore, Sammi Hanratty, Enrique Murciano, Thomas Kretschmann, Kirsty Mitchell, Beatrice Rosen, Melissa Bolona
description: Simon Templar, an internationally renowned thief known as "the Saint", is contacted by a rich and desperate businessman to help him find his kidnapped daughter. In addition to evading the authorities, Simon will have to confront a dangerous opponent from his past.

title: HazMat
actors: Norbert Velez, Aniela McGuinness, Todd Bruno, Gema Calero, Giordan Diaz, Tom Stedham, Daniela Larez, Reggie Peters, Mario Nalini, Dennis Spain
description: An independent TV production company has a program called Scare Antics, where people are given the opportunity to surprise friends with a good scare. Adam, Melanie and Carla want to scare their friend Jacob in hopes of getting him out of his quiet and boring shell. Program director David prepares for the shock by placing a series of hidden cameras inside an abandoned building.

title: Code Red
actors: Paul Logan, Julian Kostov, Ralitsa Paskaleva, Borislav Iliev, Georgi Staykov, Valentin Ganev, Leart Dokle, Dimo Alexiev, Forbes KB, Velizar Binev
description: During the Second World War, Stalin secretly created a very powerful nerve gas, but this deadly weapon was lost shortly after the terrible battle of Stalingrad. More than 60 years later, the biochemical weapon reappears in present-day Bulgaria, transforming the local population into mutants that cause death and destruction everywhere.

title: Agoraphobia
actors: Cassandra Scerbo, Adam Brudnicki, Tony Todd, Aniela McGuinness, Gema Calero, Maria Olsen, Roberto Escobar, Julie Kendall, Harry Marsh, Hamlet
description: Faye is a girl who suffers from agoraphobia, that is, she is afraid of open spaces. When her father dies, he bequeathed his home to her, located in a remote part of the Florida Keys.

title: Dead Awake
actors: Lori Petty, Jesse Bradford, Brea Grant, Jocelin Donahue, Jesse Borrego, James Eckhouse, Billy Blair, Liz Mikel, Mona Lee Fultz, Jeffrey Reddick
description: Young Kate Bowman is a social worker who is investigating the mysterious deaths of some people while they were sleeping. Shortly before his death, the victims reported seeing something supernatural while suffering some kind of sleep paralysis. Investigating further, Kate ends up provoking the force of the evil entity at the origin of it all, which will attempt to target her and her family.

title: Super Cyclone
actors: Ming-Na Wen, Nicholas Turturro, Andy Clemence, Darin Cooper, Jonathan Le Billon, Dylan Vox, AnnaMaria Demara, Steve Hanks, Wayne Lopez, Mitch Lerner
description: A super cyclone threatens the entire American east coast. A lonely meteorologist and an oil engineer will join forces to stop the threat of nature.

title: The Meg
actors: Jason Statham, Bingbing Li, Winston Chao, Sophia Cai, Rainn Wilson, Ruby Rose, Page Kennedy, Cliff Curtis, Robert Taylor, Jessica McNamee, Ólafur Darri Ólafsson, Masi Oka
description: Five years earlier, experienced diver and Navy captain Jonas Taylor encountered an unknown danger in the uncharted ravines of the Mariana Trench and was forced to abandon his mission and half of his crew. The tragic accident earned him a dishonorable discharge, career, and even his marriage, and his testimony that he had been the victim of a 70-foot-tall prehistoric creature believed extinct for over a million years was useless. But when, after some time, a submarine sinks in the same spot and needs help, Jonas is recalled for a special mission that can restore his reputation.

title: Night of the Wild
actors: Rob Morrow, Kelly Rutherford, Tristin Mays, Carmen Tonry, Jill Zarin, Mary Katherine O'Donnell, B.D. Boudreaux, Mason Guccione, Darrell Chumley, Eric Ashton Spooner
description: In a seemingly quiet city, a meteor shower generates a sinister green meteorite that appears to have dangerous effects on dogs, who are suddenly transformed from docile animals to ruthless killers. With the villagers forced to defend themselves and fight against their once closest friends, young Roslyn finds herself looking for a way to survive accompanied by her faithful dog.

title: Metal Tornado
actors: Lou Diamond Phillips, Nicole de Boer, Greg Evigan, Stephen MacDonald, John Maclaren, Cinthia Burke, Sophie Gendron, Frank Schorpion, Alexis Maitland, Rob Stewart
description: The Elios project is a top secret experiment aimed at controlling the power of the sun to obtain a potential unlimited source of energy. When a huge solar storm destroys the project's containment system, a magnetic vortex is unleashed that consumes all the metal in its path. The tornado behaves like a huge electric saw, pulverizing machines, buildings and an entire tower. As destruction spreads across three continents, humanity seems powerless in the face of such devastation.

title: Martian Land
actors: Lane Townsend, Alan Pietruszewski, Jennifer Dorogi, Arianna Afsar, Chloe Farnworth, Chaim Dunbar, Dionne Neish, Caroline Williams, Eddy Owdish, Caroline Attwood
description: In the future, the human race has moved to Mars and lives in cities similar to those on Earth, but protected by huge force fields. When a giant sandstorm breaks through the dome and completely destroys Mars New York, the residents of Mars Los Angeles must try to stop the storm before they are next to be blown away.

title: Taken Heart
actors: Gina Holden, Natasha Calis, Matthew Ziff, Raffaello Degruttola, Tom E. Nicholson
description: Kate Johnson is a single mother and an efficient undercover detective. When her daughter Nina goes to Belize to help a local orphanage and is kidnapped by a dangerous criminal organization, Kate decides to take matters into her own hands and take matters into her own hands. Once in Belize, she meets Francisco Orizaga, a former marine who agrees to help her. Her research will make her discover how the local population is strongly intimidated by criminals and how few are willing to talk about the rumors of organ trafficking run by the organization.

title: Cold Zone
actors: Martin Cummins, Kirsten Robeck, Steve Bacic, Nick Purcha, Sarah Desjardins, Sarah-Jane Redmond
description: While on vacation with his family in Alaska, scientist Roger Summers investigates bird migrations when he comes across numerous animals frozen in the woods. Confused, he confronts lonely environmentalist Tim Hughes, whose warnings about the danger of a severe global freeze have been ignored by the scientific community. Together, the two realize that Tim's predictions are coming true and that a violent, freezing storm is gaining strength to cover the entire planet soon. With people starting to freeze to death from being outside for even 4 minutes, it's up to Roger to save his family, his people and the whole world before it's too late.

title: Life
actors: Rebecca Ferguson, Ryan Reynolds, Jake Gyllenhaal, Hiroyuki Sanada, Ariyon Bakare, Alexandre Nguyen, Olga Dihovichnaya
description: Six members of an international space station are grappling with the greatest discovery in humanity: the first evidence that certifies the existence of life on Mars. As research continues, the methods they use will have unexpected consequences, and alien life will prove smarter than they thought.

title: Independents' Day
actors: Fay Gauthier, Sal Landi, Johnny Rey Diaz, Matthew Riley, Jon Edwin Wright, Jude Lanston, Jacquelin Arroyo, William Castrogiovanni, Vishesh Chachra, Brian Tyler Cohen
description: The aliens invade the Earth and their ultimatum is clear. The fate of humanity hangs in the balance: the president of the United States and the citizens still do not know if they should trust these aliens or if they should fear them.

title: Future World
actors: James Franco, Milla Jovovich, Lucy Liu, Suki Waterhouse, Method Man, Margarita Levieva, Snoop Dogg, Scott Haze
description: In a post-apocalyptic world, where water and petrol have long since run out, a "Prince" of the oasis (one of the last known free zones) is forced to set out in search of the medicine that can help the Queen in difficulty. Along the way, he will be able to join Warlord and his robot Ash as they embark on a daring journey across the wasteland together.

title: #Screamers
actors: Theodora Miranne, Abbi Snee, Tom Malloy, Griffin Matthews, Emanuela Galliussi, Chris Bannow
description: Two young entrepreneurs, in Cleveland, have a bang with a web company that deals with scary user-generated videos. While a guy is shooting a documentary about them, a snuff video of a suicide goes viral on their platform and seems to be hiding something really disturbing.

title: It Comes at Night
actors: Joel Edgerton, Riley Keough, Carmen Ejogo, Christopher Abbott, Kelvin Harrison Jr., Griffin Robert Faulkner
description: A father will stop at nothing to protect his wife and child from a malevolent presence that terrifies them as soon as they walk out their doorstep.

title: A Wrinkle in Time
actors: Storm Reid, Deric McCabe, Levi Miller, Chris Pine, Gugu Mbatha-Raw, Reese Witherspoon, Oprah Winfrey, Zach Galifianakis, Michael Peña, Andre Holland, Mindy Kaling, Rowan Blanchard, Bellamy Young
description: After the mysterious disappearance of their scientist father, teenage Meg, younger brother Charles and their friend Calvin are sent into space on his trail by three transcendental creatures: What is, Who and Which. They will discover that the Earth is threatened by dark forces trying to take over.

title: Death Race 2050
actors: Manu Bennett, Malcolm McDowell, Marci Miller, Burt Grinstead, Folake Olowofoyeku, Anessa Ramsey, Yancy Butler, Charlie Farrell, D.C. Douglas, Shanna Olson
description: In the not too distant future, America is controlled by an all-powerful corporate government that keeps the masses dormant with violence-based entertainment and virtual reality. The event of the year is the Death Race, where a large assortment of racers compete in a cross-country road race, scoring points for the race by running over pedestrians and killing each other. The reigning champion and public favorite is half man and half machine Frankenstein, but little is known about him taking a wayward spy as his co-driver.

title: Replicas
actors: Alice Eve, Keanu Reeves, Emjay Anthony, Emily Alyn Lind, Thomas Middleditch, John Ortiz, Nyasha Hatendi, Amber Rivera, Omar Cruz Soto, Jeffrey Holsman
description: After the death of his family members in a tragic car accident, a scientist grows obsessed with bringing them back to life.

title: It
actors: Finn Wolfhard, Bill Skarsgård, Nicholas Hamilton, Javier Botet, Jaeden Lieberher, Steven Williams, Megan Charpentier, Wyatt Oleff, Sophia Lillis, Chosen Jacobs, Jeremy Ray Taylor, Jack Dylan Glazer, Jackson Robert Scott
description: In a small town in Maine, a group of seven kids come face to face with their greatest fear: an evil clown named Pennywise, whose history of crime, violence and disappearance has spanned centuries.
notes: From a Stephen King novel.

title: The Commuter
actors: Liam Neeson, Vera Farmiga, Patrick Wilson, Sam Neill, Elizabeth McGovern, Jonathan Banks, Andy Nyman, Florence Pugh, Killian Scott, Shazad Latif, Roland Møller
description: Michael, an insurance salesman, is invited by a mysterious stranger to discover the identity of a thief hidden on the train he takes to get around every day before the vehicle reaches its last stop. In return, he will have a large sum of money. As he struggles against time to solve the puzzle, Michael realizes that he is unwittingly part of a criminal conspiracy in which his own life and that of all passengers are at stake.

title: Alita: Battle Angel
actors: Rosa Salazar, Keean Johnson, Christoph Waltz, Jennifer Connelly, Mahershala Ali, Ed Skrein, Michelle Rodriguez, Eiza González, Lana Condor, Jorge Lendeborg Jr.
description: XXVI century. Alita (Rosa Salazar) is a cyborg who is discovered in a junk yard by Dr. Daisuke Ido (Christoph Waltz). With no recollection of her previous life, except for the incredible martial arts training memorized by her body, Alita becomes a ruthless bounty hunter, on the trail of the world's worst criminals.

title: Hostiles
actors: Christian Bale, Rosamund Pike, Wes Studi, Adam Beach, Ben Foster, Jesse Plemons, Rory Cochrane, Q'Orianka Kilcher, Stephen Lang, Paul Anderson, Michael Parks
description: In 1892 Blocker, a legendary army captain, reluctantly agrees to escort a Cheyenne chief and his family through dangerous and hostile territory to Montana. Complicating the journey, in addition to old and new enemies, will be the further presence of a widow, who has seen her loved ones perish in a massacre.

title: Bushwick
actors: Dave Bautista, Brittany Snow, Arturo Castro, Christian Navarro, Angelic Zambrana, Patrick M. Walsh, Alex Breaux, Jeff Lima, Jeremie Harris, Jay Hieron
description: Stepping out of a Brooklyn subway stop, Lucy discovers that her neighborhood is under attack by some black-clad military men. Stupe, a former Marine member, will reluctantly help her survive the civil war sparked by Texas's attempted secession from the United States.

title: XX
directors: Roxanne Benjamin, Sofia Carrillo, Annie Clark, Jovanka Vuckovic
actors: Melanie Lynskey, Natalie Brown, Angela Trimbur, Mike Doyle, Breeda Wool, Kyle Allen, Peter DaCunha, Peyton Kennedy, Sanai Victoria, Ron Lea
description: All-female horror anthology composed of four dark tales starring four killers.

title: Ozark Sharks
actors: Allisyn Ashley Arm, Laura Cayouette, Thomas Francis Murphy, Becky Andrews, Chris Angerdina, Charles Barber, Tyrus Bazell, Ross Britz, Kimberly P. Coburn, Jennifer Cocker, Danny Cosmo
description: Rick and Diane decide to spend a weekend with their family in the Ozark plateau and finally let sweet grandmother Nana review the places where she spent her childhood. Upon their arrival, the city is being prepared for the summer party. Meanwhile, a group of locals began to unwittingly annoy sharks who have chosen a deep cove in the Ozark as their home. So the family decides to stop the creatures and save the city. It will be a vacation that no one will soon forget.

title: Mom and Dad
actors: Nicolas Cage, Selma Blair, Theresa Cook, Joseph D. Reitman, Anne Winters, Olivia Crocicchia, Zackary Arthur, Brionne Davis, Dale Miller, Ricardo Santos
description: A teenager and her younger brother have to survive 24 hours of terror during which mass hysteria, of unknown origins, leads parents to engage in violent behavior against their children.

title: Cross 2
actors: Brian Austin Green, Danny Trejo, Vinnie Jones, Patrick Durham, Tom Sizemore, Lori Heuring, Tim Abell, André Gordon, Ned Liebl, Amy Jane
description: The city of Los Angeles is in danger, an old Viking demon named Gunnar has been brought back to life by a curse. Only Cross and his team of fighters will be able to save the city and restore order to the world.

title: Coin Heist
actors: Sasha Pieterse, Jay Walker, Alex Saxon, Alexis G. Zall, Blanche Baker, David W. Thompson, Michael Cyril Creighton, Shoba Narayan, Elijah Boothe, Justin Mark, Connor Ratliff
description: When a crisis threatens to destroy the high school they attend, four teens come up with a bold plan to raise the $ 10 million sum. The first step, however, involves the raid on the US Mint, the US body in charge of producing circulating money.

title: Io
actors: Margaret Qualley, Anthony Mackie, Danny Huston
description: Sam, a young teenager, is one of the last people left on Earth after a cataclysm that wiped out the planet. With the last spacecraft leaving shortly thereafter, Sam will find himself facing a difficult dilemma: join the rest of humanity and start his life elsewhere or stay on Earth as a shipwreck in the only world he has ever known.

title: Don't Knock Twice
actors: Katee Sackhoff, Lucy Boynton, Javier Botet, Nick Moran, Jordan Bolger, Pooneh Hajimohammadi, Richard Mylan, Callum Griffiths, Megan Purvis, Celyn Evans
description: A disturbing urban legend seems to find confirmation in an abandoned house presumably inhabited by a vengeful witch, who kidnaps children. When he enters it one night, the tormented teenager Chloe has no idea of ??the horror it will unleash. On the run from her mother, a drug addict who turned her life upside down to become a famous artist, Chloe must learn to trust her to defend herself and survive.

title: Planet of the Sharks
actors: Brandon Auret, Stephanie Beran, Lindsay Sullivan, Lauren Joseph, Daniel Barnett, Christia Visser, John B Swart, Alex Anlos, Angie Teodora Dick, Ryan-Wayde Hannival
description: In the near future, the melting of the ice led to the immersion of 98% of the Earth's continental mass. Sharks now live everywhere and dominate the planet, led by a genetically mutated alpha specimen. The few surviving humans live in terror but soon a small group of desperate will try everything possible to eliminate the alpha shark and make the waters safe again.

title: Ice Sharks
actors: Edward DeRuiter, Jenna Parker, Kaiwi Lyman-Mersereau, Clarissa Thibeaux, Travis Lincoln Cox, Mia Danelle, Leddie Garcia, Shamar Philippe, Jim Helton, Emile Edwin Smith
description: A new breed of ravenous and aggressive sharks emerges from the ice of an Arctic research station, devouring everyone in their path. As the station sinks into freezing waters, those still alive will have to defend themselves with makeshift weapons to avoid losing their lives.

title: Ghosthunters
actors: Francesca Santoro, Stephen Manley, David O'Donnell, Phyllis Spielman, Liz Fenning, Crystal Web, Kjai Block, Kim Shannon, Kris Marconi, Anna Harr
description: When he loses his wife and daughter at the hands of a serial killer, the paranormal investigator Henry first kills the killer and then decides to set up a team of ghost hunters to capture the spirits of his loved ones and allow them to rest. in peace. Once inside the killer's house, the group will realize that the ghosts are actually hostile, discovering the shocking truth behind the murders.

title: Altitude
actors: Denise Richards, Dolph Lundgren, Jonathan Lipnicki, Greer Grammer, John Posey, Chelsea Edmundson, Jordi Vilasuso, Chuck Liddell, Nick Principe, Dan Gruenberg
description: Gretchen Blair, an FBI agent, is on a flight to Washington when the passenger next to her makes an unusual proposal: she will give her $ 75 million if she can safely land the plane that will soon be hijacked. . When a gang of professional thieves takes over the craft, Gretchen realizes the man wasn't kidding. He will soon find himself in the midst of an elaborate high-altitude theft and having to fight to save the passengers.

title: Descendants 2
actors: Dove Cameron, Cameron Boyce, Sofia Carson, BooBoo Stewart, Mitchell Hope, China Anne McClain, Thomas Doherty, Dylan Playfair, Melanie Paxson, Brenna D'Amico
description: Under pressure to become the perfect princess, Mal decides to return to the Isle of Lost, where archenemy Uma, Ursula's daughter, has taken her place as a self-proclaimed queen. Still resentful at not being chosen by Ben to go to Auradon with the children of the other villains, Uma forms a gang of pirates including Harry, the son of Captain Hook, and Gil, the son of Gaston, with the aim to break the barrier that separates Lost from Auradon and free all the villains imprisoned there.
notes: Sequel to Descendants (2015).

title: The Archer
actors: Bailey Noble, Jeanine Mason, Michael Grant Terry, Bill Sage, Dendrie Taylor, Kyanna Simone, Alexis Rosinsky, Kathi Anderson, India'yolanda Collins, Kalista Dwyer
description: High school archery champion Lauren Pierce has just arrived at Paradise Trails, a brutal youth correction facility in the desert, after sending a boy to the hospital in self-defense. Discovering how much corruption there is in the center at the hands of Bob Patrice, Lauren plans her escape with cellmate Rebecca Rolinski. They will find themselves forced to survive in the wilderness hunted by Bob, willing to do everything so that his secrets do not come to the surface.

title: The Burning Dead
actors: Danny Trejo, Thomas Downey, Moniqua Plante, Nicole Cummins, Kevin Norman, Robert F. Lyons, Kyle T. Heffner, Julia Lehman, Tom Nagel, Jenny Lin
description: In Northern California, scientist Stevens and his assistant Eva Jones are near an erupting volcano, the activity of which forces residents to evacuate. Meanwhile, Mindy, daughter Nicole and boyfriend Ryan are visiting the woman's father, who lives in a secluded bay, while Sheriff Denton goes out of his way to help people. However, it soon emerges that the volcanic eruption has generated a horde of zombies hungry for human flesh.

title: Wish Upon
actors: Joey King, Ryan Phillippe, Ki Hong Lee, Shannon Purser, Sydney Park, Josephine Langford, Daniela Barbosa, Alexander Nunez, Mitchell Slaggert, Sherilyn Fenn, Elisabeth Röhm, Kevin Hanchard
description: Twelve years after discovering her mother's suicide, 17-year-old Clare is bullied at school, feels embarrassed by her father Jonathan's behavior, and is ignored by the boy she likes. But all this changes when her father brings her an old music box one evening that promises to grant seven of her wishes. Skeptical at first, she realizes that every desire is fulfilled thereby improving her existence. Soon though, the people closest to her start dying in violent and elaborate ways after each wish.

title: American Warships
actors: Mario Van Peebles, Carl Weathers, Johanna Watts, Nikki McCauley, Elijah Chester, Sean Patrick Smith, Devin McGee, Chris Hayes, April Ezell Wilson, David Polinsky
description: A US plane is shot down at sea by something unknown. The army is confident that this is an attack from North Korea and a new war is about to break out. The real culprit, however, is an alien armed force that only an old navy battleship can stop.

title: Hidden Agenda
actors: Brixton Karnes, Rebecca Carlton, Wolf Muser, Eva Jenícková, Rick Cramer, Robert Munns, Anthony Crivello, Juan Antonio Devoto, Jordan Garrett, Garrett Grutz, Richard Jenik
description: The secret codes that control a nuclear satellite are stolen by one of the most dangerous criminals in the world. The best agent in the United States teams up with a beautiful British agent, trying to limit the damage of the theft and recover the codes. Using their skills, Max and Charisse will hunt down Rausch, the brilliant international arms dealer who keeps the whole world in check.

title: Bright
actors: Will Smith, Joel Edgerton, Noomi Rapace, Ike Barinholtz, Edgar Ramirez, Lucy Fry, Brad William Henke, Dawn Olivieri, Kenneth Choi, Andrea Navedo
description: In an alternate present where fairies and orcs live together with humans, two very different policemen operate. One night Ward, a human, and Jakoby, an ogre, set out on a regular patrol ride, which however will upset the future of the world they are used to. The two find themselves having to overcome their personal differences and fight against an aggressive enemy, working together to protect a young elf and an object that was thought to have been forgotten and which, in the wrong hands, would lead to total destruction.

title: Game of Death
actors: Sam Earle, Victoria Diamond, Emelia Hellman, Catherine Saindon, Nick Serino, Erniel Baez D., Thomas Vallieres, Jane Hackett
description: Killing or being killed is the fundamental rule of the "death game", in which seven friends are sucked in during a sunny day. Soon, the seven realize that if they don't kill someone else, their heads will explode. Terrified, they will do everything to survive and win their game by claiming victims on the streets of their city.

title: Mayhem
actors: Steven Yeun, Samara Weaving, Steven Brand, Caroline Chikezie, Kerry Fox, Dallas Roberts, Mark Frost, Claire Dellamar, Andre Eriksen, Nikola Kent
description: A dangerous virus, which prevents the infected person from controlling their inhibitions, is discovered inside the building of a multinational, the same that recently fired an infected man accused of murder. The building is quarantined, and before it's too late, a disgruntled employee and an angry customer will have to fight and even kill along the way to be able to speak to executives.

title: The Endless
actors: Callie Hernandez, Tate Ellington, Lew Temple, Emily Montague, Justin Benson, James Jordan, Ric Sarabia, Kira Powell, Aaron Moorhead, Shane Brady
description: Years after escaping a cult as teenagers, brothers Aaron and Justin return to their former home following a mysterious message. When strange events begin to occur, neither can deny how they seem to mirror the axioms of the cult they were a part of.

title: Eloise
actors: Eliza Dushku, Robert Patrick, Chace Crawford, Brandon T. Jackson, Martin Klebba, P.J. Byrne, Jordan Trovillion, Nicole Forester, Amber Whelan, Ricky Wayne
description: Four friends sneak into an abandoned asylum hoping to find a death certificate that will allow one of them to get hold of a sizable inheritance. Inside, they will find themselves facing both the demons the asylum brings with it and the truths about their pasts.

title: Ready Player One
actors: Tye Sheridan, Mark Rylance, Olivia Cooke, Ben Mendelsohn, Simon Pegg, Lena Waithe, Win Morisaki, Philip Zhao, Hannah John-Kamen, T.J. Miller
description: In the near future, a young outcast named Wade Watts escapes his daily grind by accessing a multiplayer computer game called 'Oasis'. Dying, the game's millionaire founder leaves his fortune as a reward for a treasure hunt inside the Oasis. Watts takes part in the competition where he will find himself having to confront - really and virtually - with enemies willing to do anything to get their hands on luck.

title: Crawlspace
actors: Michael Vartan, Erin Moriarty, Nadine Velazquez, Ronnie Gene Blevins, JoBeth Williams, Dorian Kingi, Blake Jenner, Misty Upham, Tom Wright, Steele Stebbins
description: Widower John Alexander remarries Melanie and the two decide to move into their dream home with Hannah, the daughter the man had from his first wife. Their existence seems happy but soon strange events begin to manifest themselves in the house, whose previous owner has disappeared in an inexplicable way.

title: Bethany
actors: Stefanie Estes, Zack Ward, Tom Green, Shannen Doherty, Anna Harr, Leon Russom, Kevin Porter, Keith Jardine, Kirsty Hill, Felissa Rose
description: Claire and her husband move into the house where the woman lived as a child. Soon, traumatic memories emerge in her related to the abuse she suffered at the hands of her mother. As her husband becomes increasingly busy with work, Claire sees the present mingle with the past and a mysterious figure haunt her. But who is the figure trying to make contact with her? And above all, what does he want?

title: Tomb Raider
actors: Alicia Vikander, Daniel Wu, Walton Goggins, Dominic West, Kristin Scott Thomas, Derek Jacobi, Hannah John-Kamen, Nick Frost, Emily Carey
description: Lara Croft is the proud and independent daughter of an eccentric adventurer who passed away when she was just a teenager. Now a young 21-year-old, Lara moves through the chaotic streets of London when, forced to face her own demons, she decides to understand what led her father to death. Going against her last wishes, Lara sets off for her parent's final destination: a legendary tomb on an island off the coast of Japan. His mission, however, will be more risky than he thought.

title: Isolation
actors: Dominic Purcell, Luke Mably, Marie Avgeropoulos, Claudia Church, Chelsea Edmundson, Tricia Helfer, Stephen Lang
description: Lydia and Creighton Masterson are vacationing on a remote island in the Bahamas. They have recently arrived when they run into two other couples, who invite them to eat and have a drink with them. While they are out, however, their home is robbed and a cat and mouse game begins in which their own survival is at stake.

title: Deadpool 2
actors: Ryan Reynolds, Josh Brolin, Zazie Beetz, Julian Dennison, Morena Baccarin, Brianna Hildebrand, Shioli Kutsuna, Karan Soni, Leslie Uggams, Eddie Marsan, T.J. Miller, Jack Kesy, Terry Crews, Lewis Tan, Bill Skarsgård, Rob Delaney
description: With the entry of Cable, a warrior infected with a techno-organic virus capable of traveling through time, Deadpool is forced to rethink values ??such as friendship and family. In facing the enemy and various other antagonists, former soldier Wade Wilson will be forced against his will to reflect on what it really means to be a hero and to understand that often you have to play dirty to do the right thing.
notes: Deadpool sequel.

title: Column South
actors: Audie Murphy, Joan Evans, Robert Sterling, Ray Collins, Dennis Weaver, Gregg Palmer, Russell Johnson, Jack Kelly, Johnny Downs, Bob Steele
description: 1861, New Mexico, shortly before the outbreak of the American Civil War. Command of Fort Union is taken by Captain Lee Whitlock (Sterling), a southern man, who contrasts the fact that Lieutenant Jad Sayre (Murphy) has befriended the Navajo Indians. Sayre will have a hard time foiling the plots against the Indians as well as having to ease the tensions between men from the North and the South.

title: The Shape of Water
actors: Sally Hawkins, Michael Shannon, Richard Jenkins, Octavia Spencer, Michael Stuhlbarg, David Hewlett, Doug Jones, Lauren Lee Smith, John Kapelos, Nick Searcy
description: In 1963 in an America marked by the Cold War, the lonely Elisa, mute from birth and trapped in an existence of silence and isolation, works in a secret high security government laboratory. However, his life inevitably changes when he and collaborator Zelda discover an experiment classified as a secret.

title: Gunsmoke
actors: Audie Murphy, Susan Cabot, Paul Kelly, Charles Drake, Mary Castle, Jack Kelly, Jesse White, Donald Randolph, William Reynolds, Chubby Johnson
description: Reb Kittridge, a mercenary wandering gunslinger, is hired to kill Dan Saxon, a rancher. Reb falls in love with Rita, the ranch owner's daughter, and turns against the same men who hired him.

title: Boo
actors: Trish Coren, Rachel Harland, Jilon VanOver, Happy Mahaney, Shirlene Quigley, Algie Hamilton, Dig Wayne, Rosamaria Juarez, Nicole Rayburn, Josh Holt
description: Halloween. A group of young people ventures into an abandoned hospital with sinister fame more or less at the same time as a boy who is looking for his missing sister. Watching over everyone is a former TV show actor who has now become a policeman. Soon the unfortunate will realize that they are trapped in the hospital in the company of a particularly vengeful ghost. The key to getting rid of the apparition is hidden in the hospital's tragic past.

title: The Nun
actors: Demián Bichir, Taissa Farmiga, Jonas Bloquet, Charlotte Hope, Bonnie Aarons, Ingrid Bisu
description: A young cloistered nun takes her own life in an abbey in Romania. A priest with a stormy past and a young novice are sent from the Vatican to shed light on the event. Together they will unravel the profane secret of the order, jeopardizing not only their lives but also their faith and their souls.
notes: Spin-off of The Conjuring - The Enfield Affair (2016).

title: Aquaman
actors: Jason Momoa, Amber Heard, Nicole Kidman, Patrick Wilson, Temuera Morrison, Dolph Lundgren, Yahya Abdul-Mateen II, Willem Dafoe
description: The story of the origins of half human and half Atlantean Arthur Curry and the journey of his life, which will not only force him to face who he really is, but also to find out if he is worthy of being what he was born for: a king.

title: Happy Death Day
actors: Jessica Rothe, Israel Broussard, Ruby Modine, Rachel Matthews, Charles Aitken, Laura Clifton, Phi Vu, Jason Bayle
description: Student Tree relives the day of her murder discovering unexpected and terrifying details each time. The time cycle will only come to an end when he discovers the identity of his own killer.

title: Alpha
actors: Kodi Smit-McPhee, Jóhannes Haukur Jóhannesson, Leonor Varela, Marcin Kowalczyk, Jens Hultén, Natassia Malthe, Spencer Bogaert, Mercedes de la Zerda, Priya Rajaratnam, Michael Kruse-Dahl
description: 20,000 years ago, during the last ice age, after a hunt that ended badly, a young caveman struggles against a series of obstacles to find his way home. This will make an unlikely friendship with a wolf.

title: Captive State
actors: John Goodman, Ashton Sanders, Jonathan Majors, Vera Farmiga, Kevin Dunn, James Ransone, Alan Ruck, Madeline Brewer, Machine Gun Kelly, Kevin J. O'Connor, Ben Daniels, Caitlin Ewald
description: In a Chicago neighborhood, ten years after the occupation by an extraterrestrial force, the lives of those who belong to both sides of the conflict are intertwined: collaborators and dissidents. In this context, the story unfolds of two brothers who, separated for a long time, will reunite only when the elder of the two leads a small group of revolutionaries intent on putting out of use the alien tracking system that is located at the top of the Sears Tower. . If successful, the mission could mean not only the defeat of the aliens but also the liberation of the human race.

title: Insidious: Chapter 4
actors: Lin Shaye, Angus Sampson, Leigh Whannell, Caitlin Gerard, Spencer Locke, Kirk Acevedo, Josh Stewart, Bruce Davison, Tessa Ferrer, Ava Kolker, Hana Hayes, Marcus Henderson
description: Dr. Elise Rainier, a brilliant parapsychologist, has to face her most terrible obsession: the family home where she grew up, discovered her powers and suffered the violence of her father. The house is the same where Ted Garza lives, a man who has requested his help and that of his two partners, Specs and Tucker.

title: First Kill
actors: Bruce Willis, Hayden Christensen, Gethin Anthony, Magi Avila, Charlotte Kirk, William DeMeo, Tamara Belous, Heather Johansen, Tyler Jon Olson, Chelsea Mee
description: Will, a successful Wall Street broker, in an effort to re-establish a bond with his son Danny decides to take the family on vacation to the house in the woods where he grew up. While Will and Danny are on the hunt, they witness the murder of a cop following a bank robbery gone the wrong way. Their journey takes an unexpected turn and, when Danny is taken hostage by the criminals, Will is forced to help them evade the police investigation and recover the loot.

title: Gringo
actors: David Oyelowo, Charlize Theron, Joel Edgerton, Amanda Seyfried, Thandie Newton, Sharlto Copley, Harry Treadaway, Michael Angarano, Alan Ruck, Paris Jackson, Melonie Diaz
description: Harold Soyinka, manager of a pharmaceutical company, travels from Chicago to Mexico with ruthless bosses Richard and Elaine. In the company's Mexican lab, Richard orders that they stop selling Cannabax, a bioengineered marijuana product, to a brutal trafficker better known as the Black Panther. Harold, however, discovers that he will be fired when the two bosses sell the company to a multi-company and that his wife Bonnie is having an affair. Targeted by Black Panther who hopes to get the Cannabax formula, Harold mysteriously disappears before a call to the two bosses asks for $ 5 million in compensation to release him. Rather than pay, Richard decides to get his brother Mitch, a former mercenary, into action. What about Harold whose prospects for survival, though the temporary help of tourist Sunny and boyfriend Miles, are fading by the minute?

title: Kill Switch
actors: Dan Stevens, Bérénice Marlohe, Mike Reus, Bas Keijzer, Tygo Gernandt, Gijs Scholten van Aschat, Kasper van Groesen, Mike Libanon, Don Alphonso, Chloe-May Cuthill
description: In the not too distant future, an experiment to produce unlimited energy by exploiting parallel universes does not go as it should. Pursued by drones and soldiers, pilot and physicist Will Porter finds himself racing through a world that is imploding to save humanity, his family and the entire planet.

title: Buckskin
actors: Barry Sullivan, Joan Caulfield, Wendell Corey, Lon Chaney jr., John Russell, Barbara Hale, Barton MacLane, Bill Williams, Richard Arlen, Leo Gordon
description: Chaddock is the Marshal of Gloryhole, Montana. Wealthy Rep Marlowe basically owns the whole town because of his saloons, shadowy business and guns, which inevitably intimidate the law-abiding citizens. Sheriff Tangley then asks Chaddock to help him when Marlowe holds Gloryhole hostage by damming the river and cutting the water.

title: 7 Witches
actors: Persephone Apostolou, Danika Golombek, Megan Hensley, Kay LaVergne, Macall Gordon, Mike Jones, Rory Ross, Ben Van Dusen, Lorraine Montez, Rod Pilloud, Bill Ritchie
description: Together with ex-boyfriend Cody, Kate goes to her parents' house for the wedding of Aggie, her lesbian sister, to Rose. Kate and Cody introduce themselves as if they are still together and, after having lunch with the family, they head to a remote place where Rose's family lives. They then have dinner with Rose's strange family, who wear black and go to the beach for a pagan rite. However, Kate and Aunt Paula lag behind the others because Paula is not feeling well. They will soon discover the dark secret that the family holds.

title: Midnighters
actors: Alex Essoe, Perla Haney-Jardine, Dylan McTee, Ward Horton, Joseph Lee Anderson, Andrew Rothenberg, George Barber, Jessica Noboa, David Spadora, K.C. Faldasz
description: After leaving a New Year's Eve party in New York, a young married couple's night takes a shocking turn after they accidentally run over a man wandering down the street. Watching the man's life die out and fearing serious repercussions, the two load the victim into the back seat of their car and head home, not knowing how their lives were intertwined before.

title: Rampage
actors: Dwayne Johnson, Naomie Harris, Joe Manganiello, Malin Akerman, Jeffrey Dean Morgan, P.J. Byrne, Marley Shelton, Breanne Hill, Jack Quaid, Matt Gerald, Demetrius Grosse, Will Yun Lee
description: Davis Okoye, a primate expert, is a man who keeps people at a safe distance but shares a strong bond with George, an extraordinarily intelligent gorilla he has been caring for since birth. An unwarranted genetic experiment, however, transforms the sweet monkey into an aggressive creature of enormous size. What makes the situation worse is the knowledge that other animals that have been subjected to the same experiment are also setting fire to all of North America. Okoye is then forced to team up with Kate Caldwell, a creditless genetic engineer who believes she knows how to stop the global catastrophe.

title: Robin Hood
actors: Taron Egerton, Jamie Foxx, Eve Hewson, Jamie Dornan, Ben Mendelsohn, Tim Minchin, Paul Anderson, Björn Bengtsson, Josh Herdman, Antonio Lujak
description: Upon returning from the Crusades, Robin of Loxley (Taron Egerton) discovers that the entire county of Nottingham is dominated by corruption. The injustice and poverty in which his people live push him to plot to organize a daring revolt against the mighty Crown of England. But to do so, he needs a mentor: a skilful and contemptuous commander known during the war (Jamie Foxx). Thanks to him, the reckless Robin will become the legendary Robin Hood and, perhaps, he will also try to regain a love he believed lost.

title: The Shadow Effect
actors: Jonathan Rhys Meyers, Cam Gigandet, Michael Biehn, Brit Shaw, Sherri Eakin, William Mark McCullough, Mark Ashworth, Michael Aaron Milligan, Ryan Homchick, Andi Matheny
description: Obsessed with genetic regeneration and fascinated by the phenomenon of hypnagogic illusion, Dr. Reese explores the psyche of Gabriel Howarth, a young man whose life is turned upside down when his violent dreams begin to mingle with reality. When Gabriel begins dreaming of political murders, he finds himself struggling against time not only to save himself and his wife Brinn but also to stop a government experimental program.

title: Cult of Chucky
actors: Jennifer Tilly, Brad Dourif, Fiona Dourif, Alex Vincent, Elisabeth Rosen, Michael Therriault, Summer H. Howell, Grace Lynn Kung, Zak Santiago, Allison Dawn Doiron
description: Locked up in a criminal asylum for four years, Nica Pierce is mistakenly convinced that she - and not the bewitched doll Chucky - murdered her entire family. When her psychiatrist introduces a new therapeutic "tool" to facilitate her patients' group sessions (a doll with an innocent, smiling face), a series of unexplained deaths begin to haunt the facility.

title: Den of Thieves
actors: Pablo Schreiber, Gerard Butler, 50 Cent, Evan Jones, O'Shea Jackson Jr., Kaiwi Lyman-Mersereau, Mo McRae, Brian Van Holt, Maurice Compte
description: In the city of Los Angeles, whose bank robbery rate is the highest in the world, the lives of a team of elite agents and the most notorious gang of thieves are intertwined, planning a heist against the local branch of the Federal Reserve Bank. The men headed by Nick O'Brien will do anything to stop Ray Merrimen and his fellow criminals from getting their hands on over $ 30 million.

title: The Blue Bird
actors: Tula Belle, Robin Macdougall, Edwin E. Reed, Emma Lowry, William J. Gross, Florence Anderson, Edward Elkas, Katherine Bianchi, Lillian Cook, Gertrude McCoy
description: A brother and sister, Tytyl and Mytyl, go on a magical dream adventure to find the blue bird that represents happiness and could heal their neighbor's seriously ill daughter, Mrs Berlingot. With the help of the fairy Berylune, children will be able to see the invisible world, the spirit of everyday things, such as water, bread and fire. Accompanied by the souls of their pets, after many adventures in fantastic places, the children discover that the bird is actually much closer to them than they had suspected.

title: Deep in the Darkness
actors: Dean Stockwell, Blanche Baker, Sean Patrick Thomas, Kristen Bush, Anthony Del Negro, Yanina Hope, Cara Loften, Azumi Tsutsui, Jacqui Denski, Steven A. Miller
description: Dr. Michael Cayle plans to leave the chaos of New York City for the quiet town of Ashborough. Shortly after his arrival, however, he confronts the locality's darkest secret: a terrifying race of creatures living in the darkness in the woods behind his home.

title: Robocroc
actors: Corin Nemec, Lisa McAllister, Keith Duffy, Steven Hartley, Jackson Bews, Florence Brudenell-Bruce, Dee Wallace, Quinlan Hill, Iva Iankulova, Dimitar Balabanov
description: A rocket containing an experimental nanotechnology lands in the habitat of a crocodile called Stella inside a sort of water amusement park. When she swallows the device, Stella begins to show signs of invincibility by escaping the control of her own keepers. A military task force will try to stop the dangerously mutated animal.

title: Dumbo
actors: Colin Farrell, Danny DeVito, Finley Hobbins, Nico Parker, Michael Keaton, Eva Green, Roshan Seth, DeObia Oparei, Sharon Rooney, Joseph Gatt, Alan Arkin
description: Holt Farrier, a former circus star, finds his world upset after returning from the war. Max Medici, the owner of a circus, offers him the chance to take care of Dumbo, a newborn elephant whose big ears are an attraction. But when Holt's children discover that Dumbo can fly, persuasive entrepreneur V.A. Vandevere and the trapeze artist Colette Marchant try to turn the animal into a star.

title: Crazy Murder
actors: Kevin Kenny, James Quall, Ariela Arnon, Mark Hunt
description: A lonely and mentally devastated homeless man starts a slaughter on the streets of New York City.

title: Security
actors: Antonio Banderas, Liam McIntyre, Ben Kingsley, Gabriella Wright, Katherine de la Rocha, Chad Lindberg, Cung Le, Mark Rhino Smith, Yana Marinova, Jiro Wang, Bashar Rahal
description: Eduardo 'Eddie' Deacon, a former special services veteran who is experiencing a moment of lack of luck and despair due to lack of work, is hired as a security guard at a shopping center in an unsafe neighborhood of the city. On her first night at work, she opens her doors to a young girl who has escaped from a police convoy that was taking her as a witness to a trial. On her trail, however, there is Charlie, a psychopath intent on not letting her get to the trial.

title: Hickok
actors: Luke Hemsworth, Trace Adkins, Kris Kristofferson, Bruce Dern, Cameron Richardson, Kaiwi Lyman-Mersereau, Hunter Fischer, Robert Catrini, Britain Simons, Kimberly Alexander
description: Notorious gunfighter and outlaw "Wild Bill" Hickok tries to escape his past by settling in the small town of Abilene, Kansas. The mayor, fascinated by his gun skills, offers him a job as a sheriff. Soon, a gang of outlaws will threaten Wild Bill and the laws he administers.

title: Proud Mary
actors: Taraji P. Henson, Neal McDonough, Danny Glover, Xander Berkeley, Billy Brown, Margaret Avery, Jahi Di'Allo Winston, Alex Ziwak, Owen Burke, David Chen
description: Mary is a professional killer who works in the settlement of a Boston crime family. His existence is completely turned upside down when, during a failed assignment, his path meets that of a little boy.

title: Savage Dog
actors: Scott Adkins, Marko Zaror, Juju Chan, Cung Le, Vladimir Kulich, Keith David, Charles Fathy, Matthew Marsden, Sheena Chou, Luke Massy
description: Indochina in 1959 is a lawless land controlled by criminal factions formed by the Vietnamese and Europeans. Den-Dhin-Chan Forced Labor Camp is run by four dangerous men and this is where Martin Tilman, a former Irish boxing champion, ends up. By betting on him during clandestine boxing matches, criminals know they are always making a profit. However, when the release date approaches, Tilman would like to return home but whoever manages the camp is willing to do everything to stop him.

title: Fahrenheit 451
actors: Michael B. Jordan, Michael Shannon, Sofia Boutella, Laura Harrier, Lilly Singh
description: 451 degrees Fahrenheit is the temperature at which paper burns. In a future marked by totalitarianism, firefighters have a new duty to set things on fire rather than put them out. In particular, they have the task of burning all the books in order to eliminate any freedom of thought and any form of independent action. Guy Montag, a young firefighter, will question his work and discover the existence of a clandestine group of rebels capable of memorizing the entire contents of a book to preserve it even without the aid of paper.
notes: From the Ray Bradbury novel of the same name.

title: Stasis
actors: Anna Harr, Mark Grossman, Phyllis Spielman, Tiana Masaniai, Caleb Thomas, Nicolle Ashley, Travis Berens, Andrew Bering, Kelsey Boze, Jenny Brundage
description: After an evening partying with friends, Ava returns home and discovers she's already in bed. The one who is in her place is someone who looks a lot like her and who, after traveling through time, stole her features and transformed her into a sort of virtual ghost, silent and invisible to the world. Ava is not alone in that condition and, before it's too late, she will have to work out a way to stop the body thieves and restore order to the world.

title: The Vault
actors: James Franco, Taryn Manning, Francesca Eastwood, Scott Haze, Q'Orianka Kilcher, Jeff Gum, Clifton Collins jr., Keith Loneker, Jill Jane Clements, Michael Milford
description: In an attempt to save their brother Michael's life, the two Dillon sisters - Leah and Vee - organize a bank robbery.
