Since they do not raise enough money in the upper deposit, on the advice of the bank manager Ed Maas, they rush to the lower level. Here, however, they make a terrible discovery. The two sisters will be forced to choose between facing the police outside or fighting the terrible supernatural forces that populate the basement of the bank.

title: Jackals
actors: Stephen Dorff, Deborah Kara Unger, Johnathon Schaech, Nick Roux, Chelsea Ricketts, Alyssa Julya Smith, Jason Scott Jenkins, Ben Sullivan, Cassie Hernandez, Alex Castillo
description: In the 1980s, young Justin Powell is kidnapped by two men and taken to an isolated cabin. His is not a standard kidnapping: in fact, his increasingly alien family is waiting for him, consisting of his father Andrew, his mother Kathy, his brother Campbell and his ex-girlfriend Samantha, who has just given birth to the fruit of their love. The family plans to brainwash him to remove him from the coils of the cult he has embraced. With the help of Jimmy Levine, an expert "deprogrammer" of religious cults, the family will do their best to bring Justin back to reality but not everything goes as it should.

title: Raw Edge
actors: Rory Calhoun, Yvonne De Carlo, Mara Corday, Neville Brand, Rex Reason, Emile Meyer, Herbert Rudley, Robert J. Wilke, John Gavin, Gregg Barton
description: A bully Oregon landowner hangs a man, Dan Kirby, accusing him of assaulting his wife. The brother of the executed, Tex, decides to avenge his death.

title: Death Wish
actors: Bruce Willis, Vincent D'Onofrio, Elisabeth Shue, Camila Morrone, Dean Norris, Beau Knapp, Kimberly Elise, Len Cariou, Jack Kesy, Ronnie Gene Blevins, Kirby Bliss Blanton
description: Paul Kersey, a Chicago surgeon, is a docile family man who finds himself re-prioritizing his life after his wife and daughter are victims of a violent raid on their home. Moved by the desire for revenge, he will stop at nothing to achieve his goal.
notes: Remake of The Night Vigilant (1974).

title: Singularity
actors: John Cusack, Julian Schaffner, Jeannine Wacker, Carmen Argenziano, Eileen Grubba
description: In 2020, Elias van Dorne, CEO of the largest robotics company in the world, presents Kronos, his most powerful invention - a super computer designed to end all wars. When Kronos comes into operation, it becomes clear to him that the greatest threat to peace is humanity itself. He then launches a robotic attack to free the planet from man. 97 years later, a small group of humans have survived Kronos but are always on the run from robots. Against this backdrop, teenagers Andrew and Calia form an unlikely alliance to reach a new world, where humanity is said to live without being haunted by machines. But does such a world really exist? Will they be able to live long enough to find out?

title: Turbulence
actors: Dina Meyer, Victoria Pratt, Justin Johnson, Kevin Interdonato, Nick Baillie, Cole Carter, Brent A. McCoy, Lorynn York, Jose Rosete, Chris Jai Alex
description: Sarah Plummer is an FBI agent whose family is taken hostage while she is flying to Washington. Blackmailed at high altitude by the mysterious stranger Michelle, Sarah is forced to make a decision that could cost her the life of her husband and 12-year-old son.

title: Trading Paint
actors: John Travolta, Michael Madsen, Toby Sebastian, Kevin Dunn, Shania Twain, Rosabell Laurenti Sellers, Buck Taylor, Luis Da Silva Jr., Margaret Bowman, Gioia Libardoni, Denny Mendez
description: Sam Munroe, a legend in the world of motorsport, sees his son, a promising aspiring driver, side with the rival team. Thus begins an intense and dangerous competition between father and son.

title: Wheelman
actors: Frank Grillo, Garret Dillahunt, Wendy Moniz, Caitlin Carmichael, Slaine, John Cenatiempo, William Xifaras
description: An experienced criminal escape driver finds himself having to survive after a bank robbery gone horribly wrong. With a car full of money and his family in danger, he knows it's too late to figure out who betrayed him and realizes that the only person he can trust is his 14-year-old daughter.

title: Killing Gunther

description: A group of eccentric killers are fed up with Gunther, the greatest killer in the world, and decide to kill him. Their plan, however, turns out to be more botched than expected and Gunther always seems to anticipate their moves.

title: Tonight She Comes
actors: Larissa White, Jenna McDonald, Dal Nicole, Frankie Ray, Adam Hartley, Cameisha Cotton, Nathan Eswine, Brock Russell
description: A group of people gathers in a house in the woods, where they have fun until the unexpected arrival of a young woman completely naked and dripping with blood. His presence will turn the party into an atrocious massacre.

actors: Dominic Purcell, Christine Evangelista, Melissa Ordway, Danny Nucci, Scott Elrod, Kadeem Hardison, Carly Chaikin, Justin Gaston, David Jensen, Faith Ford
description: Visiting a local psychiatric hospital with her class, young psychology student Abby Jones is troubled by a close encounter with one of the high-risk patients, Harmon. Back home, she is preparing for an evening of study with her roommates when, during the stormy night that follows, Harmon runs away from the hospital, spreading a trail of death to get closer to her. To warn Abby and her companions of the danger they run is the policeman Carter Thomas.

title: Creep 2
actors: Mark Duplass, Karan Soni, Patrick Brice, Desiree Akhavan, Caveh Zahedi, Kyle Field, Jeff Man

notes: Sequel to Creep (2014).

As they get closer and closer, they will discover the secret to the monster's dark origins.

actors: Judah Lewis, Samara Weaving, Bella Thorne, Robbie Amell, Hana Mae Lee, Emily Alyn Lind, Andrew Bachelor

actors: Tom Holland, Daisy Ridley, Mads Mikkelsen, Kurt Sutter, Nick Jonas, Demián Bichir, David Oyelowo, Cynthia Erivo, Oluniké Adeliyi, Tara Nicodemo

In this disturbing context lives the young Todd, whose life will be turned upside down by the arrival from space of the mysterious Viola.
notes: From a novel by Patrick Ness.

actors: Dwayne Johnson, Neve Campbell, Chin Han, Noah Taylor, Roland Møller, Pablo Schreiber, Hannah Quinlivan, Noah Cottrell, McKenna Roberts

Found guilty, Will is forced to flee, search for the real perpetrators and save both his reputation and his family trapped inside the building.

On his way to town, the only job he finds is that of deputy for Sheriff Jade Murphy, an honest man forced to juggle small farmers and a local squire. Murphy also has a beautiful daughter and, prompted by several reasons, Longmire decides to stay and make the most of his firearms experience.

The games also attract the attention of a builder, who would like to use them to take over the city first and then the whole world. The 5 friends will then have to join forces to foil his criminal plan, aided by a scientist a little out of the box to finally discover that the powers they thought came from the toys were actually the ones who possessed them.

actors: Emily Blunt, John Krasinski, Noah Jupe, Millicent Simmonds, Cade Woodward, Ezekiel Cavoli, Evangelina Cavoli

The last humans left on the planet live underground while scientists have designed humanoids capable of withstanding the cold temperatures. A humanoid named ASH-393 escapes from the captivity he is held in and leads a rebellion against humanity. General Trajan, the leader of the Arizona federation, sends a squad of elite soldiers led by Commander Bishop, a decorated humanoid killer.

title: Slender Man
actors: Joey King, Julia Goldani Telles, Jaz Sinclair, Annalise Basso, Javier Botet, Alex Fitzalan, Taylor Richardson

This forces the boys to fight for their survival. Their only hope is paramedic Joan Conroy, who will have to overcome a tragic past to save everyone, including her daughter.

actors: Bruce Willis, Cole Hauser, Shawn Ashmore, Ashton Holmes, Melissa Bolona, Sean Brosnan, Sophia Bush, Mike Epps, Tiffany Brouwer, Jenna B. Kelly

To save her, the MacGregor brothers will appeal to their military training and family strength. They will thus fight the most important battle of their lives.

title: Fury of the Dragon
actors: Van Williams, Bruce Lee, Wende Wagner, Lloyd Gough, Walter Brooke, Edmund Hashim, Susan Flannery, Alberto Morin, James Lanphier, Bert Freed
description: The Green Hornet is a famous American television series broadcast from 1966 to 1967 by the ABC channel and produced for a single season. The series is known for making actor Bruce Lee famous as Kato, the assistant to the protagonist. The film is the result of the editing of four of the most representative episodes: "The Bride of the Prince" (1967), "The Ace in the Sleeve" (1967), "The Ray that Kills" (1966) and "The Secret of Sally Bell "(1966).

title: Day of Reckoning
actors: Jackson Hurst, Heather McComb, Jay Jay Warren, Hana Hayes, Nick Gomez, Raymond J. Barry, Barbara Crampton, Randy Vasquez, Daz Crawford, Maz Siam
description: 15 years earlier, evil creatures from underground invaded the Earth with the intention of completely eliminating the human race. Remembered as the Day of Judgment by the survivors of that hellish holocaust, the warriors of humanity will once again face the forces of evil.

title: The Equalizer 2
actors: Denzel Washington, Melissa Leo, Bill Pullman, Ashton Sanders, Pedro Pascal, Jonathan Scarfe, Kazy Tauginas, Garrett A. Golden

title: Hereditary
actors: Toni Collette, Gabriel Byrne, Alex Wolff, Ann Dowd, Milly Shapiro
description: After their lonely grandmother dies, the Graham family tries to escape the dark fate she inherited from her.

title: Truth or Dare
actors: Lucy Hale, Tyler Posey, Violett Beane, Nolan Gerard Funk, Sophia Ali, Hayden Szeto, Landon Liboiron, Sam Lerner, Aurora Perrineau, Tom Choi, Vera Taylor, Gregg Daniel

title: The Open House
actors: Dylan Minnette, Piercey Dalton, Sharif Atkins, Patricia Bethune, Matt Angel, Suzanne Coote, Aaron Abrams, Kathryn Beckwith, Ethan Cushing, Edward Olson
description: Teenager Logan Wallace and mother Naomi move into a relative's quiet mountain vacation home after a tragic event. Here, however, they find themselves besieged by strange and disturbing forces plotting against them.

title: Bumblebee
actors: Hailee Steinfeld, John Cena, Jorge Lendeborg Jr., John Ortiz, Jason Drucker, Pamela Adlon, Stephen Schneider, Kenneth Choi, Abby Quinn, Peter Cullen, Vanessa Ross, Christian Hutcherson, Rachel Crow
description: On the run in the year 1987, Bumblebee finds refuge in the landfill of a small California beach town. Charlie, a young woman who is about to turn 18 and is looking for her place in the world, discovers Bumblebee, scarred and broken by previous battles. Putting it back together, he will discover that this is no ordinary yellow beetle.

title: Beast of Burden
actors: Daniel Radcliffe, Pablo Schreiber, Grace Gummer, Renée Willett, John Gettier, Sean Glover, Alec Heroux, Ashton Tatum, David Joseph Martinez, Mark Smith
description: Sean Haggerty only has one hour to deliver illegal cargo. An hour to reassure a drug cartel, a killer and the Goddess that everything is going well. An hour to make sure your wife survives. An hour in which he has to do everything from the cockpit of his Cessna.

title: Bernie The Dolphin
actors: Lola Sultan, Logan Allen, Patrick Muldoon, Kevin Sorbo, Sam Sorbo, Dahlia Legault, Darla Delgado, Owen Harn, Lily Cardone, Stelio Savante, Jimel Atkins
description: On the fictional, sunny beaches of Sea City, Florida it's time for a summer break for nine-year-old scholar Holly and eleven-year-old brother Kevin, both ocean lovers, who form a magical bond with a group of dolphins. who live in those waters. This is where Holly discovers that she has the amazing ability to talk to dolphins. When the kids uncover a secret plan from their dad's evil boss in league with the greedy mayor of Sea City that could destroy their beach, they nearly drown trying to escape. Fortunately, the dolphins come to the rescue and save Holly, even if one of them, Bernie, is separated from her family. Beached on the shore and alone, with a bad sunburn, however, he is saved by the Sea Marine Marine Animal Sanctuary. So Holly and Kevin come up with an idea to stop the bad guys, protect marine life and, most importantly, rescue their dolphin best friend, Bernie, and bring him back to his family safely!

title: The First Purge
actors: Y'lan Noel, Lex Scott Davis, Joivan Wade, Mugga, Patch Darragh, Marisa Tomei, Luna Lauren Velez, Kristen Solis, Rotimi Paul, Mo McRae, Jermel Howard, Siya, Steve Harris, Mitchell Edwards
description: Behind every tradition there is a revolution. For Thanksgiving, the government plans to grant 12 hours of anarchy, during which any crime is pardoned. This is the first time the experiment has been put in place to push the crime rate below 1% for the rest of the year, as sociological studies claim. But when the violence of the oppressors meets the anger of the marginalized, what will come out will be a long night that will test the entire nation.

title: Victor Crowley
actors: Parry Shen, Kane Hodder, Laura Ortiz, Dave Sheridan, Krystal Joy Brown, Brian Quinn, Felissa Rose, Chase Williamson, Katie Booth, Tiffany Shepis

Andrew Young, the sole survivor of the massacre, claims local legend Victor Crowley is responsible for the murder but his version is met with great controversy. When a twist of fate brings Andrew back to the scene of the tragedy, Crowley is mistakenly resurrected, returning to life more bloodthirsty than ever.

title: Bomb City
actors: Dave Davis, Glenn Morshower, Logan Huffman, Lorelei Linklater, Eddie Hassell, Henry Knotts, Dominic Ryan Gabriel, Luke Shelton, Maemae Renfrow, Michael Seitz
description: In the winter of 1997 in Amarillo, Texas, an area of ??cows, oil, football and boundless lands, Brian Deneke is known for his green hair, dog collar around his neck and his passion for punk music, which he plays alongside friends at a low-key club known as Bomb City. Like many punks in the area, he refuses to conform to the conservative culture that surrounds them and often ends up clashing with young people like Cody Cates, a clumsy and trouble-seeking football player. After a football game, the altercations between the punks and Cody and his friends ignite a violent night on the street, destined to become infamous.

title: Tumbleweeds
actors: William S. Hart, Barbara Bedford, Lucien Littlefield, J. Gordon Russell, Richard Neill, Jack Murphy, James Gordon, George F. Marion, Gertrude Claire, Lillian Leighton
description: Oklahoma, 1889. For the love of the beautiful Molly Lassiter, the itinerant cowboy Don Carver changes his life and decides to participate in the race that will assign the lands of the so-called Cherokee Strip. However, his plans are in danger of being shattered when he is arrested and separated from his beloved because of her brother's plans.

title: Bad Samaritan
actors: David Tennant, Kerry Condon, Robert Sheehan, Jacqueline Byers, Hannah Barefoot, Lisa Brenner, Carlito Olivero, Peter James DeLuca, Dana Millican, Rob Nagle
description: A couple of thieves come across a woman held captive inside the house they were planning to rob.

actors: Colin Woodell, Stephanie Nogueras, Betty Gabriel, Andrew Lees, Connor Del Rio, Savira Windyani, Rebecca Rittenhouse, Chelsea Alden
description: A 20-year-old finds a cache of hidden files on his new laptop and is projected by them into the deep waters of the dark web.

actors: 50 Cent, Val Kilmer, AnnaLynne McCord, James Remar, Hassan Johnson, Charles Malik Whitfield, Paul Calderon, Mike Malin, Mark Famiglietti, John Larroquette
description: Fresh out of prison, Angel is once again involved in shady business by his friend Rich. Following a mysterious tip-off to the police, a firefight erupts that tests their friendship.

title: Gemini Man
actors: Will Smith, Mary Elizabeth Winstead, Clive Owen, Benedict Wong
description: A professional killer becomes the target of a mysterious outsider, who pursues him and wishes to kill him. He will discover in spite of himself that he is a younger version of himself.

title: Christopher Robin
actors: Ewan McGregor, Hayley Atwell, Bronte Carmichael, Mark Gatiss, Adrian Scarborough, Roger Ashton-Griffiths, Paul Chahidi, Gintare Beinoraviciute
description: Now an adult, Christopher Robin is grappling with his new life, work and family, when he suddenly sees his old friend Winnie The Pooh, back from his unforgettable childhood. Pooh will allow him to rediscover the importance of those values ??that life has made him forget.

title: Jonathan
actors: Ansel Elgort, Suki Waterhouse, Patricia Clarkson, Matt Bomer, Douglas Hodge
description: Jonathan is a young man with a strange condition that only his brother understands. But when he begins to desire a different life, the unique bond between the two is increasingly challenged.

title: Braid

description: Petula and Tilda are two artists who, moved to New York to pursue their dreams, ended up involved in drug dealing and prostitution. One night, they lose $ 80,000 worth of drugs and only have 48 hours to pay off the debt. They then plan to carry out a robbery against Daphne, a rich friend of their agoraphobic and schizophrenic childhood who lives in the fantasy world that the three created as children. To steal her money, they will have to take part in their friend's deadly universe of hallucinations, role-playing, torture and murder.

title: The Predator
actors: Boyd Holbrook, Olivia Munn, Jacob Tremblay, Sterling K. Brown, Keegan-Michael Key, Thomas Jane, Augusto Aguilera, Trevante Rhodes, Alfie Allen, Jake Busey

description: A former drug addict, Ellie moves to a new town with her two children. A new life, a new job and new friends are not enough to keep her out of trouble, especially after meeting a mysterious man who introduces her to a new type of addiction that can turn her into something new and terrible: a vampire.

title: Like.Share.Follow.

description: Garrett is a rising youtuber. Shell is a very emotional fan of his. When the two begin a romantic relationship, Garrett is forced to ask himself many questions about the risks of making his private life public on the internet: what for him is a simple game can lead to stalking, obsession and madness on the part of those who follow him.

title: SuperFly
actors: Jason Mitchell, Trevor Jackson, Jennifer Morrison, Rick Ross, Andrea Londo, Lex Scott Davis, Terayle Hill, Allen Maldonado, David Dunston, Omar Chaparro, Adriyan Rae
description: Life in the black neighborhood of Harlem isn't easy. It is certainly not for the drug dealers Superfly and Eddie, called to deal with the desire to settle down forever (thanks to their criminal actions) and to confront the police with their questionable methods.

actors: Wesley Snipes, RJ Mitte, Jedidiah Goodacre, Laura Bilgeri, Niko Pepaj, Hannah Rose May, Scott Nettleton, Sean Millington, Graham Shiels, Tracey Hway

The same friends are kidnapped by the spaceship that hovers over their heads and only two of them, Annie and Charlie, are saved. The two are then forced to rely on an eccentric and dangerous hunter who has been waiting for that long prophesied day for years. Despite their best efforts, Charlie and Annie are also kidnapped and released like everyone else the next morning. When they wake up, everyone is back in their place but, turning on the TV, they discover that the Earth has just declared war on the 7 million individuals who have been kidnapped and released ...

title: The Darkest Minds
actors: Amandla Stenberg, Harris Dickinson, Skylan Brooks, Miya Cech, Mandy Moore, Gwendoline Christie, Wallace Langham, Golden Brooks, Mark O'Brien, Patrick Gibson, Catherine Dyer

Instead she has succeeded and like all those who have survived she has unnatural powers. They are described using a color: greens are super intelligent, blues have telekinesis, yellows control electricity, oranges have power over other people's minds, and reds dominate fire. Ruby is an orange and as such she is dangerous. She is sent to Thurmond in a camp of her fellows, from where she flees fearing for the future. From that moment on, its existence will change forever.
notes: From a novel by Alexandra Brachen.

actors: Bruce Willis, Frank Grillo, Johnathon Schaech, Olivia Culpo, Natali Yura, Uncle Murda, Natalia Sophie Butler, Tyler Jon Olson, Wass Stevens, Colin Egglesfield
description: A veteran looking for money for his son's health care teams up with another vet to track down criminals.

actors: Jennifer Garner, John Ortiz, John Gallagher Jr., Annie Ilonzeh, Juan Pablo Raba, Jeff Hephner, Cailey Fleming, Method Man, Tyson Ritter, Richard Cabral, Eddie Shin
description: Riley North is a young mother of a family whose husband and daughter have just been killed by a criminal gang. Faced with a corrupt judicial system that frees the killers she had formally identified, Riley decides to take up arms and take her own justice against all those who, for one reason or another, are involved in the death of who he loved.

actors: Nicolas Cage, Cory Hardrict, Michael Rainey Jr., Sophie Skelton, Dwayne Cameron, Weston Cage, Ori Pfeffer, Michael Bellisario, Sean James, Mark Basnight, Amanda Cerny
description: Mike Chandler (Nicolas Cage) is a good cop. Her partner - who is also her son-in-law - is agent Steve MacAvoy (Dwayne Cameron) and, like every day, the two set off on an ordinary patrol ride through the streets of the city. That day they are entrusted with Kenny (Michael Rainey Jr.), a 15-year-old boy whom the court requires a day at the police as a punishment and a lesson after a fight. The two officers and their young passenger find themselves unprepared when fate decides to suddenly put them in the crosshairs of an ongoing bank robbery, at the hands of a trained team of fearless and heavily armed men: Three (Ori Pfeffer ), Luke (Weston Cage), Rob (Sean James) and Hyde (Michael Bellisario).

title: Between Worlds
actors: Nicolas Cage, Franka Potente, Penelope Mitchell, Garrett Clayton, Lydia Hearst, Brit Shaw, Hopper Penn, Thom Williams, Philip Fornah, Paris Bravo
description: Joe is an unfortunate truck driver obsessed with remembering his deceased wife and child. When he meets Julie, a spiritually gifted woman, Joe becomes involved in his desperate attempt to find the lost soul of his daughter Billie, who is in a state of how. With the most ruthless of assassins on his trail, Webster must unearth what he has discovered before he becomes just another victim of the nefarious plot.

Knowing what the stakes are in case AXL gets caught, Miles teams up with Sara, the girl he has a crush on, to protect his new best friend.

Each faction represents a kind of "American nightmare" and their members stop at nothing, with dominance as their sole objective. Staying alive won't be easy.

The copy knows all his intimate things and this could deeply undermine his privacy.

When Frank blocks the elevator, Jane finds herself trapped inside the steel cage, from where she will have to work out her survival plan.

In Boston, however, she will have to fight to defend herself and protect her family from those who want to hit her at any cost.

In their van, in the company of their corrupt manager, the musicians swerve to retrieve drugs and experience new sensations Soon, the arrival of the night and their disrespect for nature will make them the perfect target for gigantic and hungry. ants.

description: Tori's life changes profoundly after the arrival of little Brandon, the fulfillment of her dream of becoming a mother. But Brandon is not a child like everyone else. He comes from another world, and instead of becoming a hero to humanity, something very sinister will soon prove to be.

Lily is determined to discover an ancient tree with extraordinary healing abilities, capable of changing the future of medicine. During this epic quest, the unlikely duo encounter countless dangers and supernatural forces, hidden in the deceptive beauty of the lush rainforest. But as the secrets of the lost tree are revealed, the stakes for Lily and Frank grow higher and their fate and that of humanity hang by a thread.
notes: Inspired by a famous Disneyland attraction.

As the criminals plan their next move and the hostages attempt to escape, they realize that no one is safe from the evil lurking inside the house.

title: Encounter
actors: Luke Hemsworth, Anna Hutchison, Cheryl Texiera, Tom Atkins, Wendy Davis, Christopher Showerman, Sarah Booth, Vincent M. Ward, Glenn Keogh, Kenny Barr
description: A group of friends makes an incredible discovery during a picnic outside the city: an aircraft that seems to come from another planet, probably crashed to earth, and with a strange being inside. The intentions of this odd survivor seem to be not entirely clear right away ...

Absent from his life since time immemorial, the legendary John agrees to help him to eradicate the heroin circle that infests Harlem, although the two have completely different methods.

Patricia Sherman, the wife of an important European politician who a few days before the crime was working on her electoral campaign with Kristy's uncle, intervenes to help Kristy in the investigation. Using her keen werewolf sense to unravel the mystery behind her uncle's murder, the detective discovers that more and more people start disappearing and begins to dangerously enter the killer's radar. As they delve deeper into the investigation, Patricia and Kristy discover that a political conspiracy lies behind the murders and must try to survive to bring the truth to the surface.

The next day, in order to repair the fence damaged by the thieves, Walter turns to Buddy, a young boy father looking for some work to make ends meet. However, when the onset of a hurricane forces Walter to host Buddy at home, the problems begin for Walter and his wife.

Sue Ann then sees the possibility of making young friends, offering them the chance to drink in her cellar but as long as they follow some elementary rules: at least one must remain sober, they cannot swear or go upstairs and not call her. never "But". Soon, Ma's benevolence will turn into obsession, making young people's lives a nightmare and turning her home into the worst place around.

What was supposed to be a heavenly vacation will soon turn into a violent and curious competition due to a pagan cult.

title: Only

Eva may be the only woman left on Earth but this jeopardizes her relationship with her boyfriend, with whom she is forced to hide in a super sterilized apartment. After months of quarantine, they will venture into the unknown to live a final and definitive experience together.

When a young engineer spills the beans on dangerous technology, the "Angels" spring into action, putting their lives at risk for the salvation of all.

description: Sophie and James buy a robot to cook and clean in their new home. At first, the android Henry is quiet and hardworking but over time he begins to anticipate the couple's needs and desires. By meddling in the life of the owners, it will end up undermining their relationship.

title: Deadwood - The Movie
actors: Ian McShane, Timothy Olyphant, Kim Dickens, Brad Dourif, Molly Parker, Sean Bridgers, Robin Weigert, Anna Gunn, Paula Malcomson, Jeffrey Jones
description: 1889. As his family grows, Seth Bullock (Timothy Olyphant) is still the sheriff of the border town of Deadwood. His friend Sol Star (John Hawkes) lives with the prostitute Trixie (Paula Malcomson), with whom he is expecting a child. Al Swearenger (Ian McShane) still runs the Gem Saloon with his henchmen, but his poor health is of particular concern to Doc Cochran (Brad Dourif). George Hearst (Gerald McRaney) returns to town as Senator and intends to expand his dominance in the communications market. During the festivities for the state of South Dakota, Trixie rails Hearst in front of the entire crowd, revealing that she is still alive, despite the fact that he himself commissioned her assassination after she attempted to kill him. #To set the powder on fire will be the death of Charlie Utter (Dayton Callie), who had just refused to sell his land to Senator Hearst. Two other big returns to town are those of Alma Ellsworth (Molly Parker), full of money and a desire to take revenge on the man who killed her husband, and the exuberant, at times grotesque, "Calamity" Jane Canary (Robin Weigert).

title: Call of the Wild
actors: Harrison Ford, Dan Stevens, Omar Sy, Karen Gillan, Bradley Whitford, Jean Louisa Kelly, Colin Woodell, Cara Gee, Michael Horse, Adam Fergus

When a breach of the barrier jeopardizes Auradon's safety during their departure from the Island, Mal decides to close it permanently to prevent enemies Uma and Hades from taking revenge on the kingdom. Despite his decision, a mysterious dark force will threaten the people of Auradon and it's up to Mal and his friends to save them all in the most epic of their battles.

Unable to finish the latest work she was commissioned to do, she tries to revive her creative flair by taking all kinds of drugs on hand and attending dodgy clubs and parties. After a few evenings spent with dissolute friends Courtney and Ronnie, Dezzy notices some changes within himself: back to painting, she has a strange desire for blood to indulge.

title: Rim of the World

Left alone in a campsite once teeming with people, the four are unexpectedly given a key that leads to the secret to stop the invasion. With no adults or electronic devices to rely on, they will have no choice but to unite, overcome their fears and save the world.

The players who kill the most zombies in the game are then recruited to fight the undead in real life. Led by Captain Kyle Walker, the chosen team travels to Terminal City, where the outbreak originated, to find the team of scientists who have been working on a possible cure. The only way to get to them, however, is through a city full of terrifying zombies.

actors: Kristen Stewart, Vincent Cassel, Jessica Henwick, John Gallagher Jr., Mamoudou Athie, T.J. Miller, Gunner Wright

The boy and his grandmother come across some apparently glamorous but completely devilish witches, so the grandmother wisely decides to take her grandson to a glitzy seaside resort. Unfortunately, they arrive at exactly the same time that the Supreme Witch has gathered her coven of witches from around the world - undercover - to carry out her evil plans.
notes: From the novel by Roald Dahl.

description: Liza, her husband Sean and little son Jude move into the old Heelshire mansion. The three are unaware of the terrifying dangers that the house hides. They will realize this when Jude has Brahms as a new friend, a human-sized doll with the features of a child: breaking his rules will mean fighting for his own survival.

title: The Old Guard

Inside there are mercenaries who are very close to each other and who strangely cannot die. During an urgent mission, the extraordinary abilities of team members suddenly become public. Now it's up to Andy and the latest arrival Nile (Kiki Layne) to help the team avert the danger posed by those who, at any price, intend to replicate and economically exploit this gift.
notes: Based on the famous comic by Greg Rucka.

However, Darlin 'hides a very dark secret: the woman who raised her, wild and ferocious, is always close to her, willing to rush to her aid by any means available.
notes: Sequel to Woman (2011).

title: Doctor Sleep

description: Still irremediably scarred by the trauma he experienced as a child at the Overlook, Dan Torrance fought to find some semblance of peace. But this respite is shattered when she meets Abra, a brave teenager with a powerful extrasensory gift known as the "shimmer." Instinctively recognizing that Dan shares his power, Abra contacts him, desperately pleading for his help against the ruthless Rose Cilindro and her followers, the members of the 'Node', who feed on the glitter of the innocent in search of their immortality. Forming an unlikely alliance, Dan and Abra engage in a brutal life-and-death struggle against Rose Cilindro. Abra's innocence and fearless awareness of her shimmer force Dan to invoke his own powers like never before - immediately confronting his fears and awakening his ghosts of the past.

actors: Elizabeth Lail, Jordan Calloway, Talitha Bateman, P.J. Byrne, Tichina Arnold, Peter Facinelli, Tom Segura, Anne Winters, Charlie McDermott, John Bishop

title: The Wretched

However, he soon realizes that something horrible is taking place: a witch terrorizes the area by coming out of the nearby woods and preying on children by pretending to be their mother. Seeking help, no one seems to believe his words: Ben will be forced to move alone to avoid the worst.

title: 1BR
actors: Naomi Grossman, Alan Blumenfeld, Taylor Nichols, Giles Matthey, Andrea Gabriel, Mark Krenik, Nicole Brydon Bloom, Susan Davis, Celeste Sully, Curtis Webster

Soon, however, the negative aspects emerge: loud noises that wake her up at night, the lack of her cat and the too much availability of everyone, with the exception of the odd Lester. She soon discovers with unexpected implications that she was not the one who chose the apartment but that she was chosen by it.

title: Critters Attack!
actors: Tashiana Washington, Dee Wallace, Jaeden Noel, Jack Fulton, Ava Preston, Leon Clingman, Vash Singh, Keith Arbuthnot, Steve Blum, Ho Chow

One night, after little brother Phillip sees meteors swoop down on Earth, one of the girl's colleagues is attacked by ravenous alien creatures with sharp teeth and great hunger. Soon, Drea, her brother, and two kids she babysits, must wage a fight for survival and protect an alien friend they meet along the way.

title: Black Christmas
actors: Imogen Poots, Aleyse Shannon, Lily Donoghue, Brittany O'Grady, Caleb Eberhardt, Simon Mead, Cary Elwes, Ben Black

However, as the holiday season approaches, Riley Stone and her fellow Mu Kappa Epsilon sisters will have to contend with a masked stalker who begins killing the girls one after the other. As the corpses increase, Riley and her friends will question all the men around them.

title: Escape Room
actors: Skeet Ulrich, Sean Young, Christine Donlon, Randy Wayne, Matt McVay, Ashley Gallegos, Hayley Goldstein, Iyad Hajjaj, Abraham Justice, Taylor Piedmonte
description: Four friends take part in a popular Los Angeles escape room owned by Brice, but soon find themselves dealing with a terrifying demonic killer. They will have an hour to solve the puzzles and get out of the room alive.

As they work to adapt to their new existence, a meteor crashes into their backyard infecting everything with a strange otherworldly color. To their horror, the Gardners will discover that an alien form gradually mutates every life form it touches, including them, with insidious, delusional and psychedelic results.
notes: From a story by H.P. Lovecraft.

title: The Vigil

description: Yakov, a young Jew who has left the Orthodox community, agrees to act as a shomer and watch over the body of a Holocaust survivor who died of old age. Having lost his faith, he does not really want to return to those from whom he fled but does not feel like refusing the salary offered by the rabbi. Shortly after arriving at the deceased's dilapidated home, Yakov realizes that something is wrong and that the wake will be anything but quiet.

title: Synchronic

description: Steve and Dennis, New Orleans paramedics and longtime friends, stumble upon a series of bizarre and gruesome incidents, blaming a mysterious new drug. But when Dennis's eldest daughter mysteriously disappears, Steve stumbles upon a terrifying truth about the alleged psychedelic that will challenge everything he knows about reality and the flow of time itself.

title: Outside the Wire
actors: Anthony Mackie, Emily Beecham, Damson Idris, Enzo Cilenti, Michael Kelly, Pilou Asbæk, Adam Fielding, Kristina Tonteri-Young

title: Sator
actors: Michael Daniel, Rachel Johnson, Aurora Lowe, Gabriel Nicholson, June Peterson
description: Adam lives a lonely existence in a desolate forest, where he occasionally receives visits from his brother Pete. Soon, however, another familiar presence looms for him on the horizon: it is his grandmother "Nani", whose body has long been the go-between for a spirit she calls Sator. According to her words, Sator helped her and taught her to become who she is but Adam slowly discovers that she has decidedly more evil intentions. Not limited to his grandmother's psyche, Sator begins to manifest in other ways and threatens the life not only of Adam but also the rest of his troubled family.

title: Togo
actors: Willem Dafoe, Julianne Nicholson, Christopher Heyerdahl, Shaun Benson, Michael McElhatton, Michael Gaston, Jamie McShane, Thorbjørn Harr, Tom Carey, Barb Mitchell
description: In the winter of 1925, in the dangerous tundra of Alaska, a sled dog named Togo, considered too small and weak, will be the protagonist of an incredible adventure.

title: VFW
actors: Stephen Lang, Martin Kove, William Sadler, Sierra McCormick, David Patrick Kelly, Dora Madison, George Wendt, Fred Williamson, Travis Hammer, Tom Williamson
description: In the near future, a new drug called Hype has turned America into a war zone. Addicts are more mutants than humans. In this context, a group of Vietnam veterans gather to celebrate the birthday of Fred, one of them. That same evening, however, in Boz, the notorious trafficker of their area, a drug consignment is stolen by a woman named Lizard, who takes refuge among her old ex-military companions. Ready for anything to recover his precious Hype, Boz will unleash his army of henchmen.

title: Rattlesnake
actors: Carmen Ejogo, Theo Rossi, Emma Greenwell, Richard Lippert, David Yow, Joy Jacobson, Arianna Ortiz, Stephanie Hill, Catherine Haun, Sean Dillingham
description: Single mom Katrina decides to leave with her young daughter to start a new life, but she is stranded with the car in the middle of nowhere. As the woman changes the rubber, Clara sets out into the desert and is bitten by a poisonous rattlesnake. Desperate to save her daughter, Katrina accepts the help of a mysterious woman but, after she miraculously heals Clara, she is asked to repay the good deed by killing a stranger in exchange for the saved life. Time is running out and before her daughter's life is put in danger again at sunset, Katrina is faced with a moral dilemma: who deserves to live and who to die?

title: News of the World
actors: Tom Hanks, Helena Zengel, Mare Winningham, Ray McKinnon, Elizabeth Marvel, Michael Angelo Covino, Fred Hechinger, Neil Sandilands, Winsome Brown
description: Five years after the end of the American Civil War, Captain Jefferson Kyle Kidd, a widower and veteran who fought three wars, travels from city to city as a storyteller, telling stories of presidents, queens, glorious feuds, devastating catastrophes and thrilling adventures from remotest places in the world. On the plains of Texas, he meets Johanna, a ten-year-old girl who was welcomed by the Kiowa six years earlier and raised as one of them. Hostile to a world she has never experienced, Johanna must be returned against her will to her biological aunt and uncle. Kidd agrees to accompany the baby but, as they travel hundreds of miles into the wilderness, the two find themselves facing enormous challenges, both human and natural, as they search for a place they can both call home.

title: Shockwave
actors: Stacey Oristano, Rib Hillis, Ed Amatrudo, Bruce Thomas, Tyler Perez, Morgan Lindholm, Evan Sloan, Mike Capozzi, Jason Cabell, Soufiane El Khalidy
description: Huge volcanic storms affect the Earth overnight. Geophysicist Kate Ferris tries to convince the Defense Department of the strangeness of the phenomenon, which is anything but natural. According to her, it is the result of experiments on a seismic super weapon, which emitted shock waves capable of destroying major cities around the world and killing millions of people. Unheard, Kate is forced to take matters into her own hands and, with the help of her daughter and husband, travels to the San Andreas fault to find a way to stop the apocalypse.

title: Primal
actors: Nicolas Cage, Famke Janssen, Kevin Durand, Michael Imperioli, LaMonica Garrett, Tommy Walker, Braulio Castillo hijo, Rey Hernandez, John Lewis, Brian Tester
description: Frank Walsh, a hunter and collector of rare and exotic animals, manages to capture a priceless white jaguar, to be sold to a zoo for a large reward. But things are not going as they should: the ship carrying the animal is also home to a political killer who is about to be extradited to the United States. Freed, the man also opens the jaguar's cage forcing Frank to a new unpredictable hunt through the narrow corridors of the boat.

title: 6 Underground
actors: Ryan Reynolds, Mélanie Laurent, Corey Hawkins, Adria Arjona, Ben Hardy, Dave Franco, Shubham Saraf, Sebastian Roché, Manuel Garcia-Rulfo, Sitara Attaie
description: Six individuals from all over the world, each the best in their field, were chosen not only for their skills, but for a common desire to erase their past to change the future. The team is brought together by an enigmatic leader (Ryan Reynolds), whose only mission in life is to ensure that while he and his teammates will never be remembered, their actions surely will be.

title: Bloodshot
actors: Vin Diesel, Guy Pearce, Eiza González, Sam Heughan, Alex Hernandez, Lamorne Morris, Toby Kebbell, Talulah Riley, Jóhannes Haukur Jóhannesson, Siddharth Dhananjay
description: Ray Garrison, a soldier recently killed in the field, is brought back to life with superhero skills by a hyper-tech company. With an army of nanotechnology in place of blood, Ray becomes an unstoppable force capable of instantly healing any injuries he may have sustained. But in controlling their body, society also manipulates their mind and memories. Ray no longer knows what is real or what is not and his main goal is to find out.

title: Halloween Kills
actors: Jamie Lee Curtis, Judy Greer, Andi Matichak, Will Patton, Cameron Elam, Thomas Mann, Anthony Michael Hall, Kyle Richards, Robert Longstreet, Nancy Stephens, Charles Cyphers
description: The Halloween night that marked the return of Michael Myers is not over yet. Minutes after Laurie Strode, daughter Karen and granddaughter Allyson leave the masked monster Michael Myers trapped and engulfed in flames in the basement of Laurie's home, she is rushed to the hospital because she is badly injured, but is convinced she has finally killed his lifelong persecutor. But when Michael manages to free himself from Laurie's trap, his bloodbath ritual begins again. As she struggles with pain and prepares to defend herself against him, Laurie convinces all of Haddonfield to rebel against this unstoppable monster. The Strode women join other survivors of Michael's first rampage and decide to take matters into their own hands, forming a group of vigilantes who intend to hunt down Michael, once and for all. Evil will die tonight.

title: Trauma Center
actors: Nicky Whelan, Bruce Willis, Steve Guttenberg, Texas Battle, Tito Ortiz, Roman Mitichyan, Heather Johansen, Tyler Jon Olson, Lynn Gilmartin, David B. Meadows
description: Left alone and trapped in an isolated hospital ward at night, an injured young woman must flee a pair of vicious killers in search of the only evidence that could frame them for a horrific murder: the bullet lodged in her leg. With a veteran agent becoming his protector, the night will become even more dangerous.

actors: Miranda Cosgrove, Kate Walsh, Omar Epps, Angus MacFadyen, Jorja Fox, Enver Gjokaj, Haaz Sleiman, Brent Yoshida, Audrey Looye, Faith Alexis Oliver
description: After Earth experiences an apocalyptic event, four abandoned astronauts on a drifting space station must embark on a desperate struggle for survival. In the horror that surrounds them, they will understand what it means to be the last survivors of mankind.

title: Fantasy Island
actors: Michael Peña, Maggie Q, Lucy Hale, Austin Stowell, Portia Doubleday, Jimmy O. Yang, Ryan Hansen, Michael Rooker, Kim Coates, Charlotte McKinney, Parisa Fitz-Henley
description: The enigmatic Mr. Roarke makes his lucky guests' most secret dreams come true in a luxurious but secluded resort on a tropical atoll. But when the fantasies turn into nightmares, guests must solve the mystery behind the island to save their own lives.

title: Antebellum
actors: Janelle Monáe, Kiersey Clemons, Jena Malone, Jack Huston, Eric Lange, Gabourey Sidibe, Robert Aramayo, Lily Cowles, Marque Richardson, Devyn A. Tyler, London Boyce
description: Veronica is a successful researcher, sociologist and writer whose books deal with the denial of civil rights to black Americans. Devoted to her loving husband Nick and her daughter Kennedi, Veronica will soon discover a horrible secret that binds her to Eden, a young slave who lived during the Civil War who was a victim of harassment and abuse.

title: The Night House
actors: Rebecca Hall, Sarah Goldberg, Vondie Curtis-Hall, Evan Jonigkeit, Stacy Martin, Allie McCulloch, Samantha Buck, Patrick Klein, James W. Meagher, Amy Zubieta
description: A widow slowly discovers the aberrant secrets kept by her recently dead husband.

actors: Guy Pearce, Devon Sawa, Michael Bellisario, Dwayne Cameron, Jacob Grodnik, Barbie Blank, John Lewis, Terence J. Rotolo, Michael Sirow, Kelly Greyson
description: Jim Dillon, a small town officer, hasn't touched a gun since leaving the Texas Rangers following a tragic shooting. However, he finds himself taking back his gun to fight against a gang of outlawed motorcyclists who have invaded the city bringing violence and crime.

title: Fast & Furious 9

description: Dom Toretto is leading a quiet life out of the loop with Letty and her son, little Brian, but he knows that danger is always lurking beyond his peaceful horizon. A new threat will soon force him to confront the sins of his past if he wants to save those he loves most. His team reunites again to stop a world-wide conspiracy led by the most skilled assassin and high-performance driver they have ever met: Dom's renegade brother, Jakob.

To prove himself, he decides to hunt down a dangerous bandit with the help of a grizzled right arm.

actors: Liam Neeson, Jacob Perez, Juan Pablo Raba, Katheryn Winnick, Teresa Ruiz, Ming Wang, Dominic Cancelliere, Dylan Kenin, Chase Mullins, Luce Rains, Grayson Berry

He lives in Arizona on the US-Mexico border, has just lost his wife to cancer, and the bank is about to mortgage his vast property. His life is further disturbed by the unexpected arrival of two illegal immigrants: a mother with her little son, fleeing a brutal Mexican cartel. After seeing the woman die under the blows of a violent shooting, Jim takes little Miguel under his protective wing, finding himself overnight pursued by relentless murderers and corrupt cops.

actors: Ron Perlman, Billy Zane, Bates Wilder, Edgar Damatian, Jordan McFadden, Hiram A. Murray, Judah McFadden, Andrew Stecker, Cody Fleury, Jeremy Michael Pereira

After managing to escape, one of them is invited to join a group of white troops to try to find and rescue the rescued comrades. Putting racial differences aside, the squadron will have to demonstrate how courage and unity are the key to finding the missing.

actors: Annabelle Wallis, Maddie Hasson, George Young, Michole Briana White, Jake Abel, Ingrid Bisu, Paula Marshall, Jacqueline McKenzie, Patrick Cox, Rachel Winfree

actors: Ryan Phillippe, Casper Van Dien, Jack Griffo, Lexie Simonsen

The daughter of a Supreme Court judge, friend of her son, is the target of an armed group that will stop at nothing, kidnap her and use her as leverage for a still pending legal case concerning the Second Amendment.

title: Impact Earth
actors: Bernard Curry, Brooke Langton, Caitlin Carver, Lew Temple, Tom Berenger, Michael D. Anglin, Gralen Bryant Banks, Karen Boudrie, Caitlin Brimer, John Ceallach

description: A shootout in a hotel room between two killers kicks off a long night of intertwining lives of three strangers, not ready for a conflict involving corrupt cops, gangsters, femme fatales and a former mercenary.

actors: Ryan Merriman, Perrey Reeves, Adam Hampton, Katie Burgess, Cate Jones, Luke Wyckoff, Erika Daly, Kyle Penington, Rett Terrell, Tiger Sheu

With nothing to lose, he searches for answers among the most dangerous and corrupt people in the city. Thus crosses the path of a detective determined to discover the truth. As their investigations go deeper and deeper into the world of crime, they will have to confront the local mafia and a mysterious criminal turned businessman.

title: The Assent
actors: Robert Kazinsky, Peter Jason, Florence Faivre, Caden Dragomer, Hannah Ward, Douglas Spain, Eileen Dietz, Margarita Reyes, Luca Bleu Darnell
description: Joel (Robert Kazinsky), a single father with dependent children, experiences a series of unexplained events occurring in his home. As the demonstrations proceed, Joel suspects that the little son is possessed by an evil entity.

actors: Stephen Lang, Chris Mulkey, Will Yun Lee, Jermaine Love, Rory Markham, Bertrand-Xavier Corbi, Katie Keene, Fernando Chien, Gina DeCesare, Michael Blalock, Mike McKee

While conducting his investigation, a retired policeman discovers that a secret sect is attempting to summon a terrifying supernatural entity. Soon his life and that of those around him will be in grave danger.

title: Nobody
actors: Bob Odenkirk, Aleksey Serebryakov, Connie Nielsen, Christopher Lloyd, RZA, Michael Ironside, Billy MacLellan, Gage Munroe, Paisley Cadorath

When two thieves break into his suburban home one night, he refuses to defend himself or his family, hoping to prevent more violence. Teenage son Blake is disappointed with his behavior and his wife Becca begins to drift further away from him. In the aftermath of the incident, the anger that Hutch explodes, pushing him to manifest all the violence he is capable of. He will then find himself having to defend his family as best he can from a dangerous opponent and making sure he is never underestimated by anyone again.

actors: Vince Vaughn, John Malkovich, Liam Hemsworth, Vivica A. Fox, Michael Kenneth Williams, Clark Duke, Brad William Henke, Barry Primus, Patrick Muldoon, Jeff Chase

During the day they work as fake forester, at night they operate as drug couriers under the watchful gaze of Frog's servants. However, after a couple of bad decisions, Kyle and Swin find themselves directly in the sights of Frog, who sees them as a threat to his empire.
notes: From a book by John Brandon.

actors: Dean Imperial, Madeline Wise, Babe Howard, Ivory Aquino, Dora Madison, James McDaniel, Frank Wood, Arliss Howard, Violet Adams, Jason Babinsky

After a series of unsuccessful gimmicks, he sets out to work on behalf of a new economic giant. His job is to go deep into the forest by pulling a cable to connect large metal cubes. He will soon have to choose between helping his workmates or getting rich.

actors: Russell Crowe, Caren Pistorius, Gabriel Bateman, Jimmi Simpson, Austin P. McKenzie, Sylvia Grace Crim, Anne Leighton, Lucy Faust, Michael Papajohn, Gregory Hobson, Devyn A. Tyler
description: An innocent everyday accident quickly turns into a nightmare when a woman honks the horn at the wrong time to the wrong kind. The expression "anger at the wheel" does not convey what the stranger will do to her and everyone she loves.

He thus gets to know Jess Washburn, a young man from Philadelphia wrongly accused of being the killer of an overseer. Saved by Gannon, Jess decides to follow him and together they find work on the ranch of the beautiful widow Beth Cross. The rivalries between the local farmers will lead the paths of the two men to divide and fight on opposite sides.

title: Hollow Point
actors: Luke Goss, Dilan Jay, Juju Chan, Jay Mohr, Bill Duke, Michael Paré, Roger Guenveur Smith, Natalie Burn, Gary Cairns, Anthony Hull

title: Corona zombies
actors: Cody Renee Cameron, Russell Coker, Robin Sydney

But discovering disturbing secrets, they challenge the way they were formed and begin to rediscover their most primitive nature. As the ship plunges into chaos, they will be consumed with fear, lust, and the lust for power.

title: Body Cam
actors: Mary J. Blige, Nat Wolff, Anika Noni Rose, Theo Rossi, David Zayas, Demetrius Grosse, Sylvia Grace Crim, Sue-Lynn Ansari, Ian Casselberry, Lara Grice

As assaults and strange deaths escalate, he will wage a fight against time to figure out what supernatural force is behind it.

actors: Azhy Robertson, Gillian Jacobs, John Gallagher Jr., Winslow Fegley, Jayden Marine, Gavin MacIver-Wright, Rachel Wilson, Alana-Ashley Marques, Ish Morris, Ana Araujo, Kate Fenton

When a mysterious creature uses Oliver's tablet and cell phone to break into the world of humans, Oliver's parents must fight to save their son from the monster.

title: Project Power
actors: Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Jamie Foxx, Rodrigo Santoro, Machine Gun Kelly, Amy Landecker, Courtney B. Vance, Tait Fletcher, Yoshi Sudarso, Allen Maldonado, Dominique Fishback

You don't know what's going to happen until you catch it. While some develop bulletproof skin, the gift of invisibility, or superhuman strength, for others the reaction is lethal. When the Pill causes a dangerous rise in crime in the city, a local cop (Joseph Gordon-Levitt) teams up with a young drug dealer (Dominique Fishback) and a former soldier motivated by secret revenge (Jamie Foxx) to fight power with guns. even, taking the pill in the hope of being able to find and stop its inventors.

A few days later he is kidnapped by aliens and wakes up without any memory but with the entire video of the event in his possession. Despite the video posted online, no one really believes the boy except Sara, herself a victim. The two begin to investigate and are kidnapped by a secret agency from which they manage to escape with the help of hacker Zed. In an adrenalin-fueled race against time, Isaac will have to find all the answers and surpass his human limits.

title: Hard Kill
actors: Bruce Willis, Jesse Metcalfe, Sergio Rizzuto, Natalie Eva Marie, Tyler Jon Olson, Texas Battle, Jacquie Nguyen, Swen Temmel, Lea Hutton Beasmore, Leslee Emmett

Trapped, chased by the police and the FBI, he realizes he has to run for cover: taking the situation in hand, he will launch into an explosive revenge.

title: Time Trap
actors: Andrew Wilson, Cassidy Gifford, Brianne Howey, Reiley McClendon, Olivia Draguicevich, Max Wright, Sabin Smith, Rich Skidmore, Chris Sturgeon, Hans Marrero

The mystical dagger that the man uses causes the two to awaken in each other's body. Millie will have only 24 hours to regain possession of her body and not get stuck in that of a middle-aged maniac.

title: The Lie
actors: Peter Sarsgaard, Joey King, Cas Anvar, Dani Kind, Mireille Enos, Devery Jacobs, Patti Kim, Nicholas Lea

actors: Chris Pratt, Yvonne Strahovski, J.K. Simmons, Betty Gilpin, Sam Richardson, Edwin Hodge, Jasmine Mathews, Ryan Kiera Armstrong, Keith Powers, Mary Lynn Rajskub, Seychelle Gabriel, Felisha Terrell, Rose Bianco, Mike Mitchell

The only hope for survival is that soldiers and civilians of the present will be transported to the future and join the battle. Among the recruits is high school teacher and family man Dan Forester. Determined to save the world for his young daughter, Dan joins a brilliant scientist and his estranged father in a desperate quest to rewrite the fate of the planet.

title: The Craft: Legacy
actors: Michelle Monaghan, Cailee Spaeny, David Duchovny, Gideon Adlon, Nicholas Galitzine, Lovie Simone, Charles Vandervaart, Donald MacLean Jr., Hannah Gordon, Zoey Luna

description: Marquis is flying with his family to go to his father's funeral in the Appalachian countryside. A very strong storm causes the plane to lose control and crash. Marquis wakes up injured and trapped in the attic of Mrs. Eloise, a woman who claims she can cure him with a hoodoo ritual. Unable to call for help, Marquis will desperately try to outsmart the woman and free himself from her magic in order to save the family from a sinister ritual.

title: The Old Ways
actors: Brigitte Kali Canales, Andrea Cortés, Julian Lerma, Sal Lopez, Julia Vera

Once there, she is kidnapped by a group of locals who claim that, as possessed by the devil, she needs an exorcism. As she tries to escape from a nightmare situation, Cristina slowly begins to believe that her captors may be right.

title: Willy's Wonderland
actors: Nicolas Cage, Beth Grant, Caylee Cowan, Grant Cramer, Emily Tosta, Terayle Hill, Ric Reitz, Chris Schmidt Jr., David Sheftell, Taylor Towery
description: In a remote village in the deepest of America, a man (Nicolas Cage) punches all the wheels of his roaring Camaro and is forced to become the keeper of Willy's Wonderland, an abandoned and dilapidated place that was once frequented by local families: a finished cleaning, your car will be refurbished. He does not in the least imagine that the diner is cursed and that its mechanical puppets guard, among their gears, the souls of a sect of Satanist serial killers who long ago sowed panic in the area. For the new keeper of the venue, all this will turn into a gory bloodshed as well as an unparalleled fun ...

title: Godmothered
actors: Jillian Bell, Isla Fisher, Santiago Cabrera, Mary Elizabeth Ellis, Jillian Shea Spaeder, Willa Skye, Jane Curtin, June Squibb, Stephnie Weir, Utkarsh Ambudkar, Artemis Pebdani, Carlease Burke

After finding a lost letter from a troubled 10-year-old girl, Eleanor tracks her down and discovers that the little girl, Mackenzie, is now a 40-year-old single mom who works for a Boston news bulletin. Having lost her husband many years ago, Mackenzie has almost given up on the idea of ??"happily ever after", but Eleanor is adamant about giving Mackenzie a happy twist, whether she likes it or not.

title: We Can Be Heroes
actors: YaYa Gosselin, Lyon Daniels, Andy Walken, Hala Finley, Lotus Blossom, Dylan Henry Lau, Andrew Diaz, Isaiah Russell-Bailey, Akira Akbar, Nathan Blair, Vivien Blair, Pedro Pascal, Christian Slater, Priyanka Chopra, Boyd Holbrook, Taylor Dooley, JJ Dashnaw, Christopher McDonald, Sung Kang, Adriana Barraza
description: Aliens kidnap superheroes from Earth. Their children are taken to a government-protected shelter. Missy Moreno, a bright and intelligent teenager, has no intention of standing by and is ready to do anything to save her superhero father, Marcus. He then teams up with the rest of the super children to escape Ms. Granada's vigilance. Each of the little superheroes will thus have to learn to put their power at the service of others and to do their best to form an extraordinary team.
notes: Sequel to The Adventures of Sharkboy and Lavagirl in 3D.

actors: Michael Shannon, Alex Pettyfer, Patrick Schwarzenegger, Lesley Ann Warren, Oliver Cooper, Hayley Law, Leslie Stratton, Kelsey Edwards, Karli Hall, Gilles Geary
description: Fresh out of college, Lance Zutterland soon realizes that a group of peers is fighting the system by stealing from the rich and dividing the spoils. With nothing to lose, Lance joins the group leaving behind a trail of destruction. As the police get closer to the truth, tensions within the group will increase and Lance will find he has no way out.

title: The Suicide Squad
actors: Margot Robbie, Idris Elba, John Cena, Joel Kinnaman, Jai Courtney, Peter Capaldi, David Dastmalchian, Daniela Melchior, Michael Rooker, Pete Davidson, Nathan Fillion, Flula Borg, Viola Davis, Alice Braga, Juan Diego Botto, Joaquín Cosio
description: Welcome to hell, that is, to Belle Reve, the prison with the highest death rate in the United States, where the worst supervillains are held, willing to do anything to get out: even join the super secret and dark Task Force X. And so that Bloodsport, Peacemaker, Captain Boomerang, Ratcatcher 2, Savant, King Shark, Blackguard, Javelin and the most beloved psychopath of all, heavily armed Harley Quinn, are dumped on the remote island of Corto Maltese, full of enemies. Venturing into a jungle teeming with militant adversaries and guerilla forces, the Squad will be involved in a search and destruction mission, under the leadership of Colonel Rick Flag on the territory and with the directives of the technology experts of Amanda Waller's government in their ears, who from the base they guide them.

title: Flora & Ulysses
actors: Matilda Lawler, Alyson Hannigan, Ben Schwartz, Kate Micucci, Danny Pudi, Bobby Moynihan, Benjamin Evan Ainsworth, John Kassir, Nancy Robertson, Christine Lee, Craig Haas

notes: Adaptation of the novel of the same name by Kate DiCamillo.

title: Saving Flora
actors: Jenna Ortega, Martin Martinez, David Arquette, Leonor Varela, Galen Howard, Tom Arnold, Rhea Perlman, Guilford Adams, Carlos Ragas, Mars Crain
description: Flora is a circus elephant who can no longer perform and complete her numbers. The night before her planned killing, 14-year-old Dawn, daughter of the circus owner, takes the animal away with one goal in mind: to lead her to the nearest reservation. To separate them from the final destination are two hundred kilometers of woods, a rushing river, two elephant hunters and the fear of not making it.

title: Deep Blue Sea 3
actors: Tania Raymonde, Nathaniel Buzolic, Emerson Brooks, Bren Foster, Reina Aoi, Alex Bhat, Siya Mayola, Avumile Qongqo, Brashaad Mayweather, Ernest St.Clair
description: Dr. Emma Collins and her team of researchers are spending their third summer on Little Happy Island studying the effect of climate change on the great white sharks that approach the shores each year to reproduce. Together with the last two inhabitants of what was once a fishing village, scientists see their peaceful existence shattered by the arrival of another "science" team led by Richard, Emma's ex-boyfriend and marine biologist looking for three. dangerous shark specimens.

title: Finding Ohana
actors: Kelly Hu, Owen Vaccaro, Chris Parnell, Ricky Garcia, Kea Peahu, Alex Aiono, Lindsay Watson, Marc Evan Jackson, Branscombe Richmond, Ke Huy Quan, Kyndra Sanchez, X Mayo, Ryan Higa
description: A summer in a rural part of the island of Oahu turns into a big adventure for a brother and sister, both of whom grew up in Brooklyn. Following a diary with directions to an ancient treasure, they will have an epic experience finding new friends and rediscovering their Hawaiian roots.

title: Army of the Dead
actors: Dave Bautista, Garret Dillahunt, Ana de la Reguera, Ella Purnell, Hiroyuki Sanada, Omari Hardwick, Theo Rossi, Tig Notaro, Lyon Beckwith, Matthias Schweighöfer
description: After a zombie invasion, Las Vegas remained in ruins and isolated from the rest of the world. When Scott Ward (Dave Bautista), former zombie war hero who now cooks burgers on the outskirts of town, is approached by casino boss Bly Tanaka (Hiroyuki Sanada), he receives an incredible proposition: enter the infested quarantine zone. zombies to recover $ 200 million buried in the casino vault before the city is bombed by the government within 32 hours. Driven by the hope that the reward will help pave the way for a reconciliation with daughter Kate (Ella Purnell), Ward accepts the challenge, putting together a disjointed team. Maria Cruz (Ana de la Reguera), a mechanic ace and old friend of Ward; Vanderohe (Omari Hardwick), a zombie killing machine; Marianne Peters (Tig Notaro), cynical helicopter pilot; Mikey Guzman (Raúl Castillo), an extravagant influencer and Chambers (Samantha Win), his ride-or-die; Martin (Garret Dillahunt), head of casino security; a daring warrior known as the Coyote (Nora Arnezeder) who recruits Burt Cummings (Theo Rossi), a slimy security guard; and a skilled German burglar named Dieter (Matthias Schweighöfer). Scott finds an unexpected emotional hurdle when Kate joins the expedition to search for Geeta (Huma Qureshi), a missing mother in the city. With the ticking of time, a notoriously impenetrable vault, and a horde of smarter, faster Alpha zombies approaching, only one thing is certain in the biggest heist ever attempted: Survivors take it all.

title: Bliss
actors: Salma Hayek, Owen Wilson, Nesta Cooper, Madeline Zima, Joshua Leonard, Jorge Lendeborg Jr., Ronny Chieng, DeRon Horton, Steve Zissis, Mercy Malick
description: Greg is a recently divorced man whose life falls apart until he meets the charming Isabel, who lives on the street. Isabel is convinced that the world around her, so polluted and corrupt, is not real. The woman believes she is living in an ugly and hostile simulation in a world that is instead beautiful, peaceful and blissful. Greg, initially dubious, will eventually find himself discovering that perhaps Isabel's crazy conspiracy theories are hiding a grain of truth.

title: Things Heard & Seen
actors: Natalia Dyer, Amanda Seyfried, Karen Allen, Rhea Seehorn, James Norton, F. Murray Abraham, James Urbaniak, Michael O'Keefe, Jack Gore, Alex Neustaedter
description: A couple from Manhattan move to a historic suburb in the Hudson Valley. He discovers that their marriage has a dark and sinister side, which rivals the story of their new home.
notes: Based on a novel by Elizabeth Brundange.

title: The Dark Red
actors: April Billingsley, Kelsey Scott, Conal Byrne, Rhoda Griffis, John Curran, Jill Jane Clements, Bernard Setaro Clark, Katie Hahn, Blaire Hillman, Robert Mello
description: Sybil Warren is a psychiatric patient who has now learned to declare herself as such despite not being at all convinced. Her version of the story is very different from that told by doctors: born with telepathic powers, she was seduced by a man who gave her a son and then took him away with the help of a mysterious secret society and reduced her to being believed crazy by almost everyone. On the day of her discharge from the hospital, Sybil is more lucid than ever and has a very specific plan in mind.

title: Cosmic Sin
actors: Bruce Willis, Frank Grillo, Adelaide Kane, Lochlyn Munro, Luke Wilson, Johnny Messner, Costas Mandylor, C.J. Perry, Brandon Thomas Lee, Eva De Dominici
description: Seven rebel soldiers launch a preemptive strike against a newly discovered alien civilization. The hope is to end a war even before it begins.

title: The Unholy
actors: Jeffrey Dean Morgan, Cary Elwes, Katie Aselton, William Sadler, Cricket Brown, Marina Mazepa, Christine Adams, Diogo Morgado, Gisela Chipe, Kiara Pichardo, Janelle Feigley
description: Alice, a girl with hearing problems, receives a visit from the Virgin Mary and can suddenly hear, speak and heal the sick. As people flock to witness his miracles, events take an increasingly terrifying turn. A journalist, who hopes to relaunch his career by investigating what happens to Alice, begins to wonder if there is something more sinister behind the alleged miracles.

title: The Forever Purge
actors: Will Patton, Josh Lucas, Ana de la Reguera, Cassidy Freeman, Leven Rambin, Veronica Falcón, Susie Abromeit, Anthony Molinari, Tenoch Huerta, Sammi Rotibi
description: Adela (Ana de la Reguera) and Juan (Tenoch Huerta), fleeing a drug cartel in Mexico, find relief on a ranch in Texas. Their peace will not last long because a group of rebels, during the night of the "Vent", arbitrarily decides to extend the time provided by the law to break every rule and give free rein to violence and evil actions without being punished.

title: Stay
actors: Ashley Park, Jesse LeNoir, Dre Davis, Simone Posey, Alisa Levinson, Brendan Martin, JamieLee Ackerman, John Alton, Ana Bergman, Jasmine Chinnaphan
description: Olivia (Ashley Park) is a model, also a web-influencer, with a strong career growth. Consumed with ambition, she rents a beautiful loft in Manhattan. Extensively refurbished over the years, the cozy-looking apartment hides a dark secret. When Olivia decides to live there, a chain of events is triggered by a terrifying bloody event that happened many years ago. Unable to sleep and reluctant to leave the apartment, Olivia shares her mysterious and disturbing experience with the public (on the Internet).

title: Reminiscence
actors: Hugh Jackman, Rebecca Ferguson, Thandie Newton, Cliff Curtis, Daniel Wu, Natalie Martinez, Angela Sarafyan, Brett Cullen, Teri Wyble, Renes Rivera
description: In the near future, Nicolas Bannister has a business that allows his customers to relive all the memories they want. His life changes when he meets Mae, a woman who consults him only to remember where she left her keys. A passionate love story soon arises. However, one day Mae disappears for no reason and Nick is devastated. He will then do everything possible to find her, even going back in time to find out what truth lies behind the woman he is madly in love with.

title: Awake
actors: Gina Rodriguez, Shamier Anderson, Jennifer Jason Leigh, Ariana Greenblatt, Barry Pepper, Frances Fisher, Gil Bellows, Finn Jones, Sebastian Pigott, Sergio Di Zio
description: After a sudden global event knocks out everything electronic and takes humanity's ability to sleep away, chaos quickly begins to consume the world. Only Jill, a former soldier with a troubled past, can hold the key to a cure in the form of her daughter. Can Jill be able to keep her daughter safe and save the world before she too loses her mind?

title: Fear Street: 1994
actors: Gillian Jacobs, Sadie Sink, Darrell Britt-Gibson, Ashley Zukerman, Charlene Amoia, Kiana Madeira, Emily Brobst, Benjamin Flores Jr., Fred Hechinger, Olivia Welch
description: After a terrible tragedy in Shadyside, Ohio, a group of teenagers realize that the series of brutal events was no accident and that they could be the next victims.

title: Fear Street: 1978
actors: Chiara Aurelia, Gillian Jacobs, Sadie Sink, Drew Scheid, Ashley Zukerman, Kiana Madeira, Ryan Simpkins, Michael Provost, Benjamin Flores Jr., Ted Sutherland
description: Campers and instructors split into Camp Nightwing, a camp inhabited by people from Sunnyvale and Shadyside. But, when terrible events begin to occur in their cities, the inhabitants of the two areas must unite to solve the mysteries.

title: Fear Street: 1666
actors: Gillian Jacobs, Ashley Zukerman, Charlene Amoia, Kiana Madeira, Ryan Simpkins, Benjamin Flores Jr., Mark Ashworth, Olivia Welch, Randy Havens, Jana Allen
description: In 1666 a witch hunt will cause a curse that will continue for centuries and centuries, until, in 1994, a group of teenagers try to put an end to it.

title: Born in Flames
actors: Honey, Adele Bertei, Jean Satterfield, Florynce Kennedy, Becky Johnston, Pat Murphy, Kathryn Bigelow, Hillary Hurst, Sheila McLaughlin, Marty Pottenger, Lynne Jones, Ron Vawter, John Coplans, John Rudolph, Warner Schreiner, Valerie Smaldone, John McLearen, Pat Place, Julia Hanlon, Maria David, Toviana Starks, Cat Hightower, Veronica Campbell, Mayumi Sakaguchi, Ryan, Chris Brewer, Bill Tatum, Jorge Ramos, Julio Peña, Merián Soto, Mark Boone Junior, Dana Johnson, Jerry Nixon, Gary Valdes, Dirk Zimmer, Jacques Sandulescu, Gary Hill, Sis McQuader, Susan Sawyer, Sherry Rosso, Donna Allegra Simms, Valerie Jones, Ramona Galindez, Katy Taylor, Marion Benjamin, Joan Ellis, Carolyn Fitzgerald, Alice Sullivan, Belle Chevigny, Paul Zonghetti, Alexa Evans, Malick N'Diaye, Dolly Udemzue, Barbara Scott, Hanita, Diane Jacobs, Felice Rosser, Hal Miller, Peggy Lee Brennan, Michael Sullivan, Nancy Reilly, Rosemary Hochschild, Vanessa Zannis, Sheila Carr, Ed Bowes, Allan Ryan, Kathy Gunst, Amy Chen, Patrick Brogan, Edmead Smith, Daniel Edelman, Mike Bencivenga, Walter Scheuer, Eric Bogosian, Paul Chevigny, Joel Kovel, Gregory Samuels, Bill Sturgis, Tom Whittaker
description: In New York, 10 years after the "Social Democratic Liberation War", various groups of women organize a feminist revolt to achieve the coveted equality.

title: The Unhealer
actors: Natasha Henstridge, Lance Henriksen, Adam Beach, Gavin Casalegno, Branscombe Richmond, Chris Browning, Angeline Appel, Elijah Nelson, Cristi Harris, Corbin Timbrook
description: A bullied boy lives alone with his mother in precarious conditions and for him there seems to be no way out of a life of hardship. Following yet another beating, Kelly seems unable to recover. With the best of intentions, his mother decides to have him treated by a shaman who inadvertently transmits his power to the boy. From this moment on, anyone who touches him will feel the pain he is inflicting himself, as well as any other sensation the boy decides to obtain and transmit as he pleases. His revenge against those who tormented him begins and the limits of self-inflicted pain will soon be overcome.

title: Jolt
actors: Kate Beckinsale, Stanley Tucci, Lili Rich, Susan Sarandon, Jai Courtney, Bobby Cannavale, David Bradley, Laverne Cox, Christian Brassington, Constantine Gregory
description: Lindy is a beautiful and ironic woman. But she has a painful secret: due to a rare permanent neurological disorder, she has murderous impulses which she calms only thanks to a special electrode device which is permanently applied to her and which, in the event of a crisis, blocks her with mini-electric shocks. . Unable to find love and stable bonds due to her unusual condition, when she thinks she has finally fallen in love, she finds the murdered man the next day. Heartbroken and in a rage, she will hunt down the killer to take revenge while the police are on her heels believing her to be responsible for the murder.

title: The Other Wife
actors: Kimberley Hews, Tonya Kay, Christine Sclafani, Nick Principe, George Stumpf, Lisa Goodman, Molly Berg, Doug Burch, Kiki del Vecchio, Mark Grossman, Haurjie Gunn, Clint Jung, Candice Bolek, Melanie Martin, Sophia Thomas, James Adam Tucker, Phillip E. Walker, Steve Jacques
description: Kate discovers to her dismay that her husband has a second life that he has always kept from her. As if that were not enough, a thug who is willing to do anything and convinced that she is the one to hide the money that her husband has stolen, sets out on her trail.

title: Old Henry
actors: Stephen Dorff, Tim Blake Nelson, Richard Speight Jr., Max Arciniega, Brad Carter, Trace Adkins, Scott Haze, Gavin Lewis, Kent Shelton
description: Henry (Tim Blake Nelson), a widowed farmer, and his son Wyatt (Gavin Lewis) welcome an injured man named Curry (Scott Haze) into their home who carries a bag full of cash. But when a gang hunts for money arrives at their farm, Henry will have to decide who to trust.

title: Aftermath
actors: Ashley Greene, Shawn Ashmore, Sharif Atkins, Britt Baron, Diana Hopper, Jamie Kaler, Travis Coles, Susan Walters, Ross McCall, Jason Liles, Alexander Bedria, Soraya Kelley, Sandra Prosper, Juliette Jeffers, Freddie Basnight, Josiah Lipscomb, Debbie Fan, Jessica Winther
description: In a desperate attempt to save their marriage, a young couple moves to their dream home, but disturbing events reveal the building's troubled history.

title: Atomic Shark
actors: Alex Chayka, William 'Bill' Connor, Sean Dillingham, Ben Edwards, Melissa Farley, David Faustino, Seth Gandrud, Mark Justice, Karlie O'Hearn, Adam Ambruso, Stacy Baker, Jose Cureno, Charlotte Lilt, J. Lyle, Steve Marmon, Calion Maston, Jeremiah B. McQueen, Keith J. Obit, Victoria Marie Ortiz
description: A shark threatens swimmers on the San Diego coast. When locals learn of an unidentified threat in the ocean, rumors spread about the presence of a Russian submarine. However, the reality is even more terrifying: a giant "atomic" shark approaches destroying everything in its path. A lifeguard then asks for help from a band of unlikely heroes. And that's how they set out on a suicide mission together.

title: The Stairs
actors: Kathleen Quinlan, John Schneider, Russell Hodgkinson, Trin Miller, Stacey Oristano, Brent Bailey, Adam Korson, Josh Crotty, Tyra Colar, Thomas Wethington, Karleena Gore, David S. Hogan, Robin Cheung, Aubrey Corsetti, Giovanna Cossaller-Sandberg, Elena Flory-Barnes, Mark E. Fox, Gordon Frye
description: 1997: during a hunting trip, a boy (accompanied by his grandfather) comes across a mysterious staircase, located deep in the forest. The couple's subsequent disappearance leaves locals baffled, unsure of what might have happened to them. Twenty years later a group of hikers embarks on the same path, crossing the same stretch of wild nature. As they move away from civilization, dragged deeper and deeper into the endless forest, they find themselves facing the mysterious stairs.

title: Abandoned Dead
actors: Ivan Adame, Hannah Johnson, Sarah Nicklin, Judith O'Dea, Christopher Parker, Carlos Ramirez, Stacy Snyder, Jackson Stafford, Robert E. Wilhelm
description: Rachel (Sarah Nicklin), despite working as a security guard, is literally terrified of the dark. However, he receives a new assignment: to supervise an abandoned medical rehabilitation clinic. That place is at the center of macabre legends and stories, due to the unclear disappearance of several people. Anguished, alone and scared, Rachel experiences a terrifying night due to the paranormal phenomena she is forced to experience.

title: Monstrosity
actors: Marjorie Eaton, Frank Gerstle, Frank Fowler, Erika Peters, Judy Bamber, Lisa Lang, Xerxes, Bradford Dillman, Margie Fisco
description: Ms. March (Marjorie Eaton) is an elderly woman, with strange ideas about the possibility of going back in time, in physical aspect. Using the research on atomic energy, carried out by a mad scientist in his service, he hires young and attractive girls as maids with the intention of transplanting his brain into a young and provocative body.
